state.text: When Fina is selected for the first time, sets the values of all slot markers to "unknown". Markers are persistent to prevent some weird stuff from happening if the game is reset and characters are autofilled, though it doesn't seem to prevent as much weird stuff as I hoped it would.

state.text: If the player has named themselves Friend, they won't be treated as "close" with Fina for this game. This should reset at the beginning of subsequent games.

case.state: Because I'm tired of writing out the conditions every time, I'm finally doing it. Indicates that the player is sexually compatible with Fina. Its absence means they aren't interested in her.

Oh, ~marker.RemembersYourName~, I didn't intend to suggest that I'm unhappy about your... attire. When you think about it, there's no reason that one's chest should be considered inappropriate at all...

state.text: Oh, happy birthday, Jura! A game like this seems like a lovely gift to oneself...

case.state: Er... is it obvious to everyone else what an "Options Menu" is? I'm a little confused...

state.text: Um... you didn't tell your own consort you were coming here, Miko? That seems... unwise...

...I haven't felt that way about someone before, Ayano, but I've known others who have, and... it hasn't ended well. There should never be anyone you're willing to do anything for...
Ah, I see... Computers are those thinking machines with viewscreens, right? We did have devices like that in the Great Silver Shrine... I suppose that makes sense...
I agree, Fluttershy, flowers are wonderful. They smell so sweet, and... there's just nothing like having real, growing things all around you...
Um... they do, Fluttershy? Well, I suppose we met a bird in Yafutoma who kept repeating "Looks tasty!" after Vyse said that, but I have a feeling you meant something else...
Um... they do, Fluttershy? Well, I suppose we met a bird in Yafutoma who kept repeating "Kind of cute!" after Vyse said that, but I have a feeling you meant something else...

Um... they do, Fluttershy? Well, I suppose our friend Gilder has a pet bird named Willy who can talk, though it's mostly repeating short phrases, but I have a feeling you meant something else...
Are you alright, ~nami~? It was obvious that ~perona~ coerced you into saying that, I certainly wouldn't hold you to it.
Let's see... Lux, I use the same names for them as everyone else I've met, but I often use Silver spells, like Curia, Riselem and Eternum... and healing magic such as Sacrum and Sacrulen.

case.state: Miko, you're trying to make me want to lose with all this talk of... with this discussion, aren't you? Even if I'd rather be defeated, I'm still not going to give up, you know! A Blue Rogue could never do that!

case.state: Oh, that's very thoughtful of you, ~larachel~... Er, wait. Is Rausten a kingdom? This... doesn't require us to surrender any rights or freedoms, does it?

state.text: Oh, my... You travel with ~larachel~, ~player~? I had no idea... You'll really have to tell me about all your adventures sometime.

I can tell you're from a very different place than the rest of us, ~sly_cooper~. It's normal in Arcadia for every person to be of our species... But, I suppose that will just make this a more interesting experience...
Honestly, ~sly_cooper~, I'm not much of a swimmer myself. Standing water is quite scarce where I'm from, at least outside of Yafutoma...

I've been in plenty of fights before, so I'm more worried about ~player~'s well-being than my own... But, as long it's just between the two of you, I suppose it's not the Rains of Destruction or anything...
My home, Arcadia, is a world where people sail through the skies on airships and live on floating islands, ~nico_robin~. Apparently many patrons here find that unusual on its own.

~Nico_robin~, my people, the Silvites, were closely affiliated with the Silver Moon. For that reason, they were interested in manipulating life force and could extend it, or even replicate it artificially.
I suppose the prevalence of piracy as a way of life is one prominent feature of Arcadia in modern times, ~nico_robin~. As the saying goes, where there is treasure, there will be Air Pirates...

case.state: (Moons above, I'm absolutely soaking... I don't know if I can handle much more of this. I couldn't bring myself to just stop trying, but... Come on, ~opp~! You've almost got me...)
(Moons above, I really am wet... I don't know how much more of this I can take. I couldn't bear to just give up and throw the game, but... Come on, ~player~, just one more loss!)

state.text: Oh, Moons... I nearly forgot we were surrounded by books all this time! Yuri, I'll definitely look for some oceanography books here after the game is over...

Oh, and thank you for offering to introduce me to Tabitha, Magma, but I'd like to take a look at the books here first. Perhaps I'll find something that supports Team Magma's argument, as well...

state.text: Learning a new language later in life must be difficult, Petra. I'm lucky the Elders raised me to speak both the Silvite tongue and that of the Arcadian islanders from infancy...
Oh, ~neptune~, you're so generous to share your pastimes with ~bernadetta~... (Although... looking at that device, why is it that I suddenly feel so... left out...?)
Um... well, no, but she certainly doesn't sound like a nice person to be around. I'll be careful if I run into her, I suppose...
Don't worry, you can hide behind me if that happens, ~nagisa~.

case.state: Don't worry, you can hide behind me if that happens, ~nagisa~... I don't care if they see me or not.

state.text: ~Zoe~, is ~aimee~ really unable to miss? That's quite a fantastic ability, and I'm not sure how you'd know about it, but... I'm not sure how you know most of the things you know, and many of them seem to be true...

~Nagisa~... you said not even your parents have seen you this way? Or did you mean, anyone outside your family...?

case.state: Moons, time travel? That just keeps coming up in this game, doesn't it? I wonder if Porky's time travel works anything like ~takatoshi~'s...

state.text: Um... what are you talking about, ~monika~? What would you have broken...? (And why do I feel so strange...?)
I have no reason to disbelieve you so far, ~nami~, so please don't worry. Most of the Black Pirates I've encountered would have attacked or tried to steal something by now, anyway...
Um... well, probably butts, since I'm more interested in men, I think... Well... with the exception of ~marker.RemembersYourName~, maybe. But, she has one as well, so...
Um... well, probably butts, since I'm more interested in men, I think... (Wait... but if that's true, then what's going on with me and ~marker.RemembersYourName~?).

It wasn't a club, ~nagisa~, but to find allies for our fight against the Valuans, we had to find common cause. Drachma only joined us because we found him a weapon to use against the arcwhale he was hunting...

Well, right now I'm wearing traditional Silvite clothes, ~nagamimi~... They have nostalgic value for me, but they're not very practical in the skies. So, nowadays I have a pirate outfit as well that I wear more often...
I haven't had any sexual relationships so far, but that does sound... really nice, ~mercy~. Um... ~player~, how do you feel about it? There's no reason good friends shouldn't do that, right?
I really like it too, ~bluehair~... The only people I know of from my world with that hair color were a few of the Ixa'takans, though I don't know if it was natural or dyed.

case.state: Oh, I don't know whether he's what you would call a "robot" exactly, but my Cupil is a... created lifeform, at least. He's feeling a little shy right now, I think, but maybe he'll come out later?
I don't know whether he's what you would call a "robot" exactly, Wheatley, but my Cupil is a... created lifeform, at least. {Cupil}[Chirp, chirp!]{!reset}

state.text: Oh, Cupil can play some pleasant tunes, if you'd like. He can even change the music depending on whether you're winning or losing... I find that very exciting.
It's alright, ~takatoshi~... I'd be more surprised if you weren't excited. You're just unfortunate that it's not as easy for you to conceal your arousal as it is for us...
It's alright, ~takatoshi~... I'd be more surprised if you weren't excited. You're just unfortunate that it's not as easy for you to conceal your arousal as it is for me...

case.state: It's quite alright, ~takatoshi~... There's nothing wrong with being excited about this. I'm excited too... That's the point of the game, isn't it?
Oh, that's alright, ~takatoshi~... Just come and join me as quickly as you can, and then... we'll solve your problem together...
Don't worry, ~takatoshi~... At this rate, you'll likely be out of the game very soon, and I expect that will be quite helpful in solving your problem...

state.text: You know, it's impressive that you find the time to be in ~monika~'s Literature Club and travel the countryside with L'Arachel, ~player~. You'll really have to explain to me how that works sometime...

case.state: I think Cupil really likes you, ~nagisa~... Well, either that, or there's a Cham on you somewhere. He can't seem to sit still or be quiet when there's food nearby... {Cupil}[Chirp! Chirp!]{!reset}

case.state: ~Nami~, if you do slip, you're welcome to grab onto me for support... I'm not wearing anything that's not already... er... I don't mind getting wet.
~Nami~, if you do slip, you're welcome to grab onto me for support... I don't have to worry about getting my clothes wet anymore, so it wouldn't be any trouble.

state.text: Oh, I'd definitely like to do that, ~syrenne~... Surely Vyse would at least be willing to try it. Aika, I'm not so sure about... This place would probably make her a bit uncomfortable.
Oh... I'm so sorry, ~estelle~. I really did jump to a lot of conclusions... I didn't mean to make you uncomfortable...

There, how was that, ~barbara~? Although, I suppose at a game like this, it's a little silly for me to ask not to be "swayed by the flesh". But it's traditional, and the Silver Moon is the one I'm closest to...
Oh. thank you, Sei... hmm... They don't have loqua here, do they? If not, I'll take whatever you think I'd like, I suppose...
Really, ~syrenne~? There's dye that does that? I've never heard of such a thing in Arcadia, but it sounds... quite fascinating to me...
It's been worth it for me, ~syrenne~... Though I'm not sure we're talking about the same type of magic. I didn't need any books, just experience working with Moon Stones...

~Syrenne~, I imagine we'd go out sailing for a bit and look around. We'd probably run into some monsters or Black Pirates to fight and steal from... Come to think of it, it's odd that monsters have so much money on hand...

Well, we can do most of that ourselves, but... You don't have any engineer friends, do you, ~syrenne~? Our ship could definitely use some upgrades, and all the engineers we used to know have left our crew.

If you mean romantically, I'm not sure I'm the right person to ask, ~syrenne~. Vyse, Aika and I tease each other constantly, and we're very fond of each other... but I'm still not sure if it's in that way or not.

Oh, my... ~syrenne~, I'm definitely the wrong person to ask about this. The best I could come up with is just... well, asking them if they'd like to? But I don't know if that's indirect enough to be socially palatable...

Ah, it's not going to be that exciting, ~syrenne~... The first time I had too much strong loqua in a sitting, I was just... really giggly and drowsy for the rest of the evening. Aika had to carry me to my room...
(Well, ~larachel~ does act a bit... familiar... with ~player~, when it comes down to it. And yet ~player.ifMale(he's|she's)~ only a strategist, right? So she can't be that arrogant... right?)

The history of my world is still a great interest of mine, ~heris~... Primarily its ancient history, before the Rains of Destruction came. It's fascinating to study, although also quite sad... since so much was lost.
Um... no one got hit by a bullet, right? I could cast Sacres on you...
Does anyone need me to heal them after Aimee's... um... turn?
No one got hurt by Aimee's... stripping method... this time, right?
Is everyone okay? No one got shot?
Those bullets didn't hit any of you, right?
Is everyone alright after Aimee... um... stripped?
I don't need to heal anyone of any bullet wounds, right?
Um... Myriam, are you sure you're alright? You seem a bit... um... distressed...
Ah, I see, you're a sort of artificial being... Well, it's a pleasure to meet you, Alter Ego. Um... do you think Chihiro's going to be alright, though?

Ah... so, um, ~sly_cooper~... Is it disrespectful for me to look, or... perhaps it's more strange and inappropriate not to? I'm, um... I don't really understand the cultural expectations surrounding this yet...
I see... Thank you, ~yuno_uno~. I'm learning to play myself, so that's actually useful information for---Hold on... Shouldn't that be true of almost all possible hands?
Ah... but, ~yuno_uno~, isn't that true of nearly every hand? Then again, I suppose if the real Gaku were here, he might have some better advice...
Oh, my... Well, I suppose I'll take the bet, Emi, but I can't imagine you'll have much of a challenge if it's me. I'm not really in shape...

~Nagisa~, I'm... not really sure how to tell if he's my boyfriend. We travel the world together, he loves and respects me, and I know he'd do anything to keep me safe... But, we've only ever hugged before...

case.state: Yes, ~yshtola~, don't worry... Well, I'm well acquainted with the penalties and consequences involved, anyway. I imagine I'll pick the rest up as we go...
Yes, ~yshtola~, don't worry... This isn't my first time playing, so I'm familiar with the... consequences involved. I'm quite excited about, um, exploring them further...

state.text: You don't think I'd risk, um... being offensive, if I just asked directly, ~wasp~? I'd like to be totally honest, but I've observed that being very forward about one's sexual interest isn't always welcome...
Yes, ~amy_rose~, I often go on shopping trips with Aika. There are a number of shops on Crescent Isle that we like to visit, although most of them are for weapons and combat supplies.

Colt, I don't think anything's more beautiful to me than the open sky... I doubt I'll ever get tired of it. I'm so happy that I get to sail through it every day with my best friends in the whole world...
I don't think so, Aoba... honestly, I'm not even certain where this "France" place might be...
I don't think so, Aoba... Well, though this "Paris" place we're in now is supposed to be in France, isn't it? But if you meant outside of these games, then I don't believe so...
Oh my... Um, is that so, ~player~? Well... I don't really think I know you well enough yet, but... um, I suppose I wouldn't rule it out for the future...
I'm not proud of it, but yes, I've killed people before, Revy. It's hard to avoid it when you're fighting against an oppressive empire... The Valuans weren't usually receptive to diplomacy.

Well, Basil, I'm still not very familiar with real flowers, and I love all the natural varieties I've seen... Daisies are probably my favorite, though. There's just something simple and earnest about them...

Well... I'm not really keeping secrets anymore, ~jessie~, but my people were responsible for the apocalypse that wiped out the ancient world. Not that they trusted me with that one in the first place...
It depends on what you mean by that, ~jessie~... The family I grew up with were... well... I have mixed feelings. But, I've found a new family with Vyse and Aika, and that's very important to me...
Honestly, I'd rather avoid lies of any size unless they're necessary, ~jessie~... I've had enough of lies and secrets already. I'd prefer to be as open and honest as I can these days...

Oh, I don't have a problem with it, ~jessie~. Gilder smokes all the time, and so does Vyse's father Dyne... or so I've been told. I've never actually seen either of them doing it, come to think of it...

~Jessie~, I think it would be most sensible to use it to upgrade our ship, or even purchase a new one. That's what our income relies on in the first place... Although, Aika might have her own preferences...
Well... that has to depend on what the mistakes were, and what they're doing about them, ~jessie~. I wouldn't reject someone for that reason, but it certainly could affect how much I trusted them...
Oh, thank you for the invitation, ~rouge~... It does sound intriguing. I'll let the rest of my crew know about it, and perhaps we'll pay you a visit...
Congratulations, ~nagisa~, you were very brave... I liked your play, too.
I'm... not very well read, Yuri. Vyse does have an interesting practical guide to navigation using star charts that I've been reading... but it covers Arcadia's stars, not yours...
Oh, my... That must be quite useful, ~nico_robin~. It sounds far more versatile than the abilities we receive by eating Moonberries in Arcadia...
Well, it depends, but many types of loqua are alcoholic, yes... The alcoholic variety is very useful, as it doesn't go bad so easily on long journeys. Sailors of all ages value it for that reason...

Ah... well, once or twice, maybe, ~sucrose~. I'm not entirely sure it's to my liking... though I do try to remain open to new experiences, so I don't want to rule anything out altogether...
Oh, my... Well, not so much before today, ~sucrose~, but... I'm quite... interested in Vyse, but I'm fairly sure Aika is as well... I wonder if she'd want to, um, join forces with me...

Sucrose, I used to think mostly about Vyse, but... I've been tempted to include Aika in that, since she's so fond of him as well... or even ~player.ifMale(Aika|Vyse)~ and ~player~? Um... which isn't an invitation, ~player~...

Well, ~sucrose~... before I started coming here I primarily thought about Vyse, but I'm fairly sure Aika is fond of him as well, and... I think it'd be nice for her to be included... So I've started to, a little...
I haven't gone out of my way to do so, ~sucrose~, but I have, yes... I don't think I taste very strongly. I'm... not certain how to describe such things, but it seems fairly mild in, um, flavor...
Well, ~sucrose~, not really, since I've never encountered any other such devices in my world... and I'm not comfortable just putting in anything, if it's not intended for that use...
I can't say, ~sucrose~, as I'm not sure whether Silvites are born at all... but, I would like to try having offspring one day, if I can find the right person. So, perhaps we'll see then...
~Sucrose~, I don't know of any non-human races in my world, unless Silvites fall into that category... but, I do want to try having children someday, so we'll have to find out when I do so...

state.text: My dream, ~nami~? I think Vyse's wanderlust has rubbed off on me... I really want to visit new places, meet new people, have new... experiences. That's why I'm at the Inventory...
A living skeleton, ~nami~?! I don't think we've ever had someone as... unusual... as Brook in our crew. But, I guess that would only add to the entertainment value in a way...

Chopper's a reindeer, ~nami~?! I don't think we've ever had an animal join our crew. Well... no, that's not true, we have Pow. But he's just an ordinary Huskra, he certainly can't talk or turn into a human...

I'm glad you have a talented shipwright, ~nami~. Our old engineer Brabham worked miracles on the Delphinus, but he runs the Valuan shipyards now. Though, he might still be upgrading the Delphinus over there...

Luffy sounds like an interesting person, ~nami~... Our captain is Vyse, and he's not stupid, but he can be a little silly... In tense situations, I might have to tell him something multiple times before he notices.
Oh, I didn't realize there were so few women in your crew, ~nami~! Ours was always about half women... But, Aika is the only one who's stuck with me and Vyse all the way. She means the world to me...
A good cook makes things much nicer, ~nami~... I really miss Urala's cooking. Her Yafutoman cuisine was delicious, especially the dumplings she used to make. But, now she's settled down in Valua...

Usopp is a sniper, ~nami~? I don't think we really have one of those. Tikatika was skilled with his bow at long distances, but he didn't fight except in emergencies, and now he's gone back to Ixa'taka...

Interesting, ~nami~... Zoro's fighting style sounds a little like our captain Vyse's. Vyse only uses two swords, though... I'm surprised using three swords at once is even possible, but I suppose I've seen stranger things.

If it counts, ~nami~, I like the tattoos on my shoulders and forehead. I... don't fully understand their significance, but they remind me that I'm a Silvite, and despite everything, I guess I'm still proud of that...

~Nami~, Deep Sky might be the most dangerous. Without a specially reinforced hull, your ship would be crushed by the pressure there---not to mention the ship-sized monsters lurking in the mud at the very bottom.

~Nami~, I don't know if it's the most dangerous, but South Ocean is certainly perilous. There's a constant headwind blowing you back, huge whirlwinds all over the place, and monsters that use deadly Silver magic.

The Dark Rift is one of the most frightening places I've been, ~nami~. Even steel ships would be torn apart by the winds, and in the calm spots, compasses don't work and huge sea monsters are lying in wait...
I suppose that's true, ~meia~... I don't think we have any ships that can operate in space, except for my old one, and it's completely unarmed.
Well... we have six Moons, under each of which there's a continent, though the Silver Continent sunk into Deep Sky in ancient times. Between those it's just smaller islands and open skies...

Let's see, Pyrrha... Vyse, Aika and I were thinking of paying Gordo's Bistro a visit. His food is some of the best I've tasted, and he's been very friendly since he became a famous chef and gave up pirating.

Let's see, Pyrrha... I've heard that the Black Pirate Baltor has been prowling around Crescent Isle again. Vyse wants to go out for a sail, so I imagine we'll end up defeating him tomorrow, which might be fun.
Let's see, Pyrrha... It's been a while since we visited Esperanza. Vyse, Aika and I might start sailing over there tomorrow to visit Don and see if he's made any progress charting the Dark Rift...

Let's see, Pyrrha... Kirala wanted us to pick up some more materials for the new harbor she's building on Crescent Isle. We'll probably sail out to get those, and do a little sightseeing along the way...
Oh? ~Komisan~, you only need to take off one thing at a time... It's alright to take it slow...

In my world, I think it has to be the creation of the Gigas, the ancient living weapons that ultimately led to the Rains of Destruction, wiping away the old world. It was terrible, but very impactful.
Well, I'm already a member of a pirate crew of my own... but perhaps we'd be able to collaborate with your "Magno Family"? I can ask Vyse... as our captain, it'd be his decision.
Well, I'm actually here from Arcadia, not Earth... (Or at least that's what the Silvites called it...) So, I'm really sorry, but I won't be able to help you much with that.
Unfortunately, ~meia~, I don't have much more insight into that than you do... I'm certainly used to being around men by this point, but... I haven't figured out how "dating" works yet, either.
Ah, I see... I suppose our ships likely aren't as advanced as yours are, especially since we're no longer piloting the Delphinus. We just have an ordinary wooden ship now.

case.state: ~Sucrose~, I... once tried that on the Delphinus's deck, in the open air...Tikatika wasn't on lookout duty, and I thought everyone was asleep. But, Vyse almost caught me... I wonder what he'd have done if he had...
Ah... I have thought about that, ~sucrose~, I have to admit... If I could... explore things with both Vyse and Aika, that would be... a dream come true...

I have to admit, I do think about that, ~sucrose~... It would be incredible to do something with both Vyse and Aika... or even with ~player.ifMale(Aika|Vyse)~ and ~player~? Um... if I get to know ~player~ a bit better, that is...
Oh, I'd be very interested in hearing one of your poems, ~hu_tao~. But, I should warn you that I'm not very familiar with poetry, so I don't know whether I'll be able to appreciate it properly...

state.text: Oh, I'd love to hear one of your poems, ~hu_tao~. Maybe you could join in, ~marker.RemembersYourName~? I know you're in that Literature Club with ~marker.firstLiteratureClub~, but you still haven't shown me any of your poetry!

Oh, I'd love to hear one of your poems, ~hu_tao~. Maybe you could join in, ~marker.RemembersYourName~? I know you're in that Literature Club with ~doki~, but you still haven't shown me any of your poetry!

case.state: It's really okay, ~estelle~, I... I played with the doll Elder Prime gave me, and we had lessons where he taught me things like history and writing... But, I only learned what he specifically told me...
Oh, I see... That's quite an interesting idea. My crew and I do take turns writing about our adventures in a journal, but I certainly wouldn't call what we have a "story". I wonder...
Well, I suppose it's up to him... ah... {Cupil}[Chirp!]{!reset} He seems quite... reticent about you for some reason... I'm so sorry. He's usually not this skittish around people...

state.text: Come to think of it, isn't it awfully dangerous to play with a tank in a small, enclosed space like this one? Although, I suppose they weren't really designed for outdoor combat either, since they can't fly...
Well, if you insist on framing it that way, Revy... I don't really expect to win. I'm not entirely sure how I'm doing this well in the first place...
Well, if you insist on framing it that way, Revy... I'm not afraid to face you, and we might as well give the others a proper show...
I'm sorry, Hilda, I didn't mean that as an insult... Since you're much more experienced than I am, I probably shouldn't criticize your approach.
I'm sorry, Hilda, I didn't mean that as an insult... You're much more experienced than I am, so I probably shouldn't criticize your approach, especially since it seems to be working quite well...
I much prefer the heat as well, Arash. I get cold awfully easily... I'd rather play somewhere warmer than this, honestly. I'll need to figure out a way to warm myself up if I lose my clothes here...

case.state: I much prefer the heat as well, Arash. I get cold awfully easily... Honestly, I'm quite cold right now, what with my... current state of undress. Maybe we should have played somewhere warmer...

state.text: I haven't had any sexual relationships so far, but that does sound... really nice, ~mercy~. I don't see why one shouldn't do that with... um, good friends that they can trust...

Um... Miko, does arranged marriage actually count as "love"? While it appears to have worked out for you, I couldn't be satisfied with something like that... I've had enough choices made for me already.
Um... Miko, does arranged marriage actually count as "love"? I couldn't be satisfied with being told who my partner had to be like that... I've had enough choices made for me already.

It's a little strange, Fluttershy, but strip poker is the only type of poker I play... I've been playing it since ~player~ invited me here, and I really enjoy it. Perhaps I should try ordinary poker, too...
I don't know, ~jessie~, as I've never been in one... um... unless whatever I'm doing with ~player~ counts... But if it does, most of our intimacy involves masturbating together at these games, so...

I did have the Silvite Elders, ~kumatora~... Actually, there were even six of them, come to think of it. But, they weren't exactly... ordinary people, and they left me to my own devices much of the time...
~Zoe~, you might be onto something about shared interests... Maybe I should ask Vyse to have a private chat with me about places we'd like to explore together, and... just see where that goes...
That sounds quite nice, Ignatz, I'd be happy to join you for some tea later on... I'm curious to learn how similar our worlds actually are.
Oh, I'm sorry, Ignatz... I suppose I jumped to conclusions. You were just looking at me very intently... Was there something else you wanted to say to me, then?
That's a beautiful song, ~amy~, it feels very inspiring. (I suspect Vyse would like it too...)
Oh, you're back, ~perona~... I mean, it's your decision whether to leave or not. If you didn't want to stay, I wasn't about to complain... I am happy you're back, though.

It's a little embarrassing, Arash, but when we're not hunting treasure or Black Pirates, I like to take naps... especially if I can do it outdoors. Napping in a hammock, or even a field of grass, is lovely...
I much prefer the heat as well, Arash. I get cold awfully easily... so, I'm happy we're playing somewhere warm, especially since we're removing our clothes.

I much prefer the heat as well, Arash. I get cold awfully easily... Hopefully I'm not going to be too chilly if I end up losing all my clothes in this game. Even this is a little cooler than I'd prefer...

case.state: I much prefer the heat as well, Arash. I get cold awfully easily... Even here, I'm starting to get a little chilly now that I'm, well, exposed. I think it'll be alright, though...

state.text: Not really, Arash, but Aika did tell me that if someone's pestering me for a date and I don't want to, I should tell them I have to wash my hair. I still haven't gotten a chance to use that excuse, but I'd like to try...
Arash, I'm still learning about different varieties of flowers, so I don't have much knowledge... I do really like daisies, though.
Arash, I'm not very good yet, but I've started learning to cook now that we don't have a dedicated cook on our ship anymore. It's quite fun, but I certainly can't match Urala's Yafutoman cuisine...

case.state: Well, I suppose you could count Cupil... He's always with me to protect me if something happens. Though, he's hiding at the moment... Perhaps he'll come out later, and you can meet him.
Well, I suppose you could count Cupil, Arash... He's always with me to protect me if something happens. I'm very fortunate to have him... {Cupil}[Chirp!]{!reset}

state.text: Hmm... I'm really not sure, Arash. I've already been just about everywhere on Arcadia... Perhaps I'd like to visit the Moons themselves, or explore another world altogether, such as this one...
Well, I try not to stay up too late, Arash, but... sometimes, I get carried away watching the night sky. The stars and Moons are so beautiful...
Oh... is that so, Ayano? Um... well, I don't think I can promise anything until I hear what the favor is, but I'd like to help if I... reasonably can...
~Saki_zls~, I wouldn't normally think of death as a "good time"... but then again, I suppose you'd, um... not know any better than I would.
~Saki_zls~, I wouldn't normally think of death as a "good time"... but then again, I suppose you'd know better than I would.

It's a little strange, Fluttershy, but strip poker is the only type of poker I really play... I only got into it after ~player~ invited me here a little while ago, but now I'm playing whenever I have the chance.

I can't say for sure, ~jessie~, since I've never been in an intimate relationship before... I suspect I'd still masturbate a fair amount, though. Maybe we could even try it together, like in this game...

My crew's always looking for work, ~nagamimi~. We have a great deal of experience in treasure hunting, exploring, hand-to-hand and ship-based combat... But it'll need to be for a good cause, to comply with our code.
I suppose I have stories to tell about my own real adventures, ~fischl~... but my people preferred history to fantasy, and I haven't had much time to explore the latter.
Oh, please don't apologize for that, ~tomoko~... I'm at least as guilty as you. Sometimes I worry asking questions is all I do to interact with others...
Um... not that I can think of, ~tomoko~? Whenever I go somewhere, there's usually something I'm quite committed to doing there... So, even if I'm uncertain, I doubt I'd ever just give up...

I don't think it's as much of a problem for me, ~tomoko~, but I do get worn out relatively easily... I'm still a bit new to socializing at all, but I've gotten much better at it since I left the Shrine.
It... depends on the people, ~tomoko~. I wasn't really alone in the Great Silver Shrine, since all six of the Elders were there with me, but... I still felt so lonely all the time...

To be honest, ~tomoko~, not really. But, if you're feeling that way, I think you'll improve if you put enough time and effort into it... It was difficult for me to learn social skills as well, so I understand a little.

I wouldn't describe it as "cringey", but... some things in the past are hard not to think about. Wishing I'd never trusted the Elders to judge what I should do... or just people I might have been able to save.

Well, we typically sail on air rather than water, ~jessie~... Outside of Yafutoma, there aren't many large bodies of water where I come from... But, I wouldn't mind showing you around our ship, if the others agree.

Well, um... it's true that I've found I enjoy many things that I'd never even considered trying earlier in my life, ~jessie~. I'd certainly want to... try it at least once, I suppose, so I could see for myself...

No, ~jessie~, there's no justifying it. The Elders indeed believed a better world would arise from the ashes of the old, but... what gave them the right to do such a thing? I'll never accept such heartless logic.
Yes, ~jessie~, I feel the same way... I don't know what I'd do without Vyse and Aika. I'm so happy that we've decided to travel together... I'd go anywhere or do anything with those two.

Oh... um, ~jessie~, you don't mean me specifically? Well, ah... I suppose you might be able to judge for yourselves in... the future... It would definitely be unwise to have the lights off at a game like this...

case.state: Oh... ~jessie~, do you mean you as in someone in general, or... Well... I suppose the rest of you are, um... qualified to judge that for yourselves at this point, so...

state.text: No, I suppose I don't mean complete honesty, ~jessie~... It's enough for me to admit to, um, having such fantasies... To then describe them in detail would be... beyond the scope of what I'm committing to...
Oh, um... do you think so, ~jessie~? Have you... succeeded in accomplishing that before, yourself? If so, that's... useful information to have... So, I appreciate the guidance...

Perhaps, ~jessie~... I don't want to have sex with someone if there isn't an emotional connection, too, and those are harder to build here than... purely sexual ones... But, I'm certainly not ruling it out...

Well, alright, ~jessie~... I just feel like there's information I'm lacking here. Why wouldn't you have thought that? I don't demand that my friends be friends only with me, so why would I do that with lovers?

Ah... Well, I don't know if emotional intimacy is a kink, but I'd certainly prefer to watch something with some, um, feeling... But, failing that, I'm fairly sure being tied up or handcuffed does count as a kink...

Oh, that does make sense, ~jessie~... I'd definitely want it to still feel like an adventure, and explore... different things, over time... and I do have at least one candidate who's fond of exploration already...
Oh, I see... Yes, I can see how that would make sense. I imagine getting the angle correct would be very, um... beneficial...
Oh, I see... That does sound exciting. It would be interesting to try things with a... variety of different people... But, I think I'd still want to get to know each of them properly first...
Well, it's not really my business, and I haven't thought much about it... But no, I've never tried smoking before. I suppose there's no reason I shouldn't sometime, just to see what it's like...

Ah... I don't think I can completely agree with that, ~jessie~. If we don't remember the mistakes of the past, they'll just happen all over again... I agree that there's no sense in dwelling on them, though.

Oh... that's not what I was talking about at all, ~jessie~. Technology was actually lost as a consequence of the Rains of Destruction... But, I'm sorry if I overreacted. It's just something of a sore spot for me...
Oh, I see... Well... that would depend on what you mean. I... don't know you very well just yet, but I'll certainly keep that in mind...

case.state: Well, I appreciate that, ~jessie~... I, um... I'm not sure precisely what you're implying, but I might need to get to know you a bit better first. I'm not ruling it out or anything, though...

state.text: Ah, I see. Well... I think for the moment I'm content for fantasies to remain fantasies, ~jessie~. But, it's certainly, um... helpful... to be aware of that as a possibility...

Oh, um... I'm sorry for the confusion, ~jessie~, that wasn't what I was asking for... Although, I'd be lying if I said that didn't sound... interesting. I was actually... thinking about some friends of mine who aren't here.

Well, that depends on what you're used to, ~jessie~. It's certainly not a lavish luxury craft designed for Valuan royalty, like the Delphinus... Just a modest wooden ship, but we've attempted to make it comfortable...

Well, ~jessie~, the Elders likely never intended for me to reproduce at all, and the only other human I grew up with left when I was little. So, I'm actually not sure... Relationships are just new to me in general.
I see, ~jessie~... Well... I'm not sure what all the... possibilities would be, but... perhaps a sort of... sampling... of what exists would be helpful, so I can narrow things down?
Well... I'm willing, but I don't know whether or not he is, I suppose. He's certainly fond of me in some way or another... I'm just not entirely sure how many, um, ways are involved...

Well, two such people, if I'm honest... The problem is that I don't know if they're willing. Or, for that matter, whether Aika is even... I mean, I've never seen her express interest in a woman before, but...

Ah... I see. Well, that doesn't really sound like what I'd be interested in, ~jessie~... To be honest, I'd have difficulty trusting someone I hardly knew to be... intimately involved with my body... in that way...

The ancients I'm speaking of weren't cavemen, ~jessie~. They created huge living weapons of mass destruction, and the "Iron Star" they launched high in the sky could supposedly observe the entire world...
Mmmm... Well, in that case... I'll certainly remember that. Perhaps we'll see each other at a few other games like this one, and get more familiar with one another...

Ah... that's certainly tempting, ~jessie~. But, only one of them is a man, and while I suppose it wouldn't be out of the question for him to be interested, I'm not sure about Aika... she might be uncomfortable with it.
I'd certainly be happy to show you around my bedroom, but I'm not sure---oh, I see. Well, ~jessie~, I won't rule anything out, but I'm not sure I know you well enough for something like that...

Yes... I don't think I'd describe that as the most unpleasant part of my upbringing, but... I definitely don't plan to follow their prescriptions any longer. So, if you have advice, I'd be interested to hear...
That does sound like the best option, ~jessie~. I have plenty of money to spare at the moment, so whatever this "premium" consists of, I'd expect I should be able to afford it...
If I wouldn't enjoy the experience, I doubt I'm "missing out", ~jessie~... What I really want in bed is emotional warmth and mutual affection, and... this doesn't sound like the way to obtain it.

Well, for all I know, they could have invented an "internet", ~jessie~. They certainly had technological capabilities far beyond any civilization in my world today... But records of that time are hard to come by.
Ah... Well, ~jessie~, by "I'm not sure", I actually meant that I don't want to, at least not at the moment. But, um... thank you for expressing interest.

Oh... Well, that's very kind of you, ~jessie~, but I'm not sure that's the sort of instruction I had in mind... In any case, hopefully you're right, although I don't want to do that without... some consideration beforehand...
I see... How interesting. In that case, I'll have to think very carefully about what I'd want to ask for... I imagine what there is already will give me some ideas.
