Ah...! Selective breeding? Oh, my... Even with someone I knew well, I'd prefer to think of it as... Oh, wait, but you're probably talking about Pokémon...
Well, I suppose solitude would be the harshest punishment for me, ~senko~. After all the years I spent alone, I'm not eager for more of it... You're not actually going to punish us, right?

case.state: Ah... I don't know about punishments that would cause me suffering, ~senko~, but what with the... present situation, I can think of a number I'd enjoy... Do you want to hear those, too?
Cupil's a little of both, Noire... He's an artificial being who was created by my people with Silver magic, and he can transform into many objects, such as weapons for combat. {Cupil}[Chirp!]{!reset}

state.text: A "dragon", ~nagamimi~? Is that similar to a Gigas? Those were terrible living weapons of mass destruction created by the ancients, powered by the Moon Crystals... but they're all gone now, or so I hope.
~Nagamimi~, that certainly sounds like something Vyse might be interested in... and if dragons are similar to Gigas at all, we even have experience fighting them. I'll let him know...

case.state: ~Nagamimi~, the Moon Stone Cannon was the best weapon we had for fighting the Gigas. We don't have one anymore, but we could put you in touch with some Valuan engineers who know how to build one...

state.text: I'm quite partial to New World Loqua, ~nagamimi~. It's hard to find, but Gordo's Bistro always seems to have a good supply... I'm not sure if the Inventory even serves loqua, though, so...
~Nagamimi~, I'm from Arcadia, which is a world of vast skies and floating islands. It's much safer than it used to be, too, now that the Valuan Empire is no longer trying to conquer everything.

I... see, ~nagamimi~... Well, it's mainly ignorance that I struggle with. Even now, I've had only a year to learn about the world... and I'm a bit uncomfortable in casual conversation, too, without a mission to focus on...

Oh, that's quite unfortunate, ~yusuke~... I'd be more than happy to lend you some money, since our treasure hunting has been quite successful lately. Although, I don't know if you use the same currency we do...
Hmmm... perhaps, ~yusuke~. I've never heard of this "Triple Seven" establishment, and I'm always interested in new experiences. Do they sell any magic crystals or boxes? We can always use those...

I don't really know any, ~fischl~... Stories about the Gigas are often told as fairy tales in Arcadia, but unfortunately those ancient behemoths were very real, and nearly destroyed civilization a second time.

If I understand your use of the term, ~trixie~, I'd say Daccat's Island. The treasure wasn't what we'd hoped for, but Aika and I finally reunited with Vyse, and friends are more important than any treasure...

I don't know if I have a specific one, but I've grown to love the sheer variety of fish that swim our skies... Which is good, because it's most of what we eat. Silverfish are my favorite, but hard to come by...
Does that mean you're particularly attuned to the Yellow Moon, ~misaka~? I have a variety of magical abilities, but Silver magic, which affects life force, comes most easily to me.
Instead of aer, ~estelle~, my world uses the power of the six Moons... Specifically, the Moon Stones that fall from them. Each is associated with a different element and a different type of magic.
If you really want to, Lyralei, I suppose you're welcome to do so... but there's really nothing wrong with your breasts, you know...
I'd really like to be able to fly the way ~flyer~ can, Joey... It would be so useful, and make sailing much safer if you could just fly back up to your ship.
~Msfortune~, you can remove your head? Are you a zombie, or... how is that possible?
Leonie, you're correct in guessing we don't have knights or horses in Arcadia... Is a horse a sort of ship? Or is it a beast of burden, like the Dhabus they ride in Nasr?

I suppose I haven't met many immortals who didn't have... questionable motives, ~miko~... But, if you couldn't do it without allying with dark forces, why not just... not do it? Is death that terrifying to you?

case.state: ...So, I guess since ~nami_szs~ left, you and I are the only players left, aren't we, ~player~? That's sort of nice... I'm really looking forward to playing with you.

state.text: That's a good point, ~polly~... I don't remember anyone apologizing on the occasions I mentioned, and surely Vyse would forgive me if I was offensive. I'll just have to proposition him as respectfully as possible...

Well, not really, ~jim~... the only gambling I've done so far has been in these games at the Inventory, and I have yet to win one. Although, honestly, it sort of feels like winning something even when you lose here...

Well, ~jim~, I've only ever gambled here at the Inventory before, but... being able to win a game with ~player~ in it, I suppose, might count as "winning big"... I certainly enjoyed the prize, anyway.

Oh, I was invited by ~player~ a while ago, ~neptune~... and now, I really enjoy coming here to see ~player.ifMale(him|her)~. Um, not that ~player.ifMale(he's|she's)~ the only reason I come here, of course...

I don't know if I can "look the other way" in this case, ~rouge~. It's against the Blue Rogues' code to steal from innocents, and as far as I'm aware, no one else in this game has done anything wrong...
Well, not really, ~jim~... This is my first time ever playing a game like this. I'm... surprised people actually bet things like marriage... That seems unwise.
(Hmm, I wonder if ~amy_rose~ would have any insights about how to approach Vyse. She seems to understand this Sonic's feelings better than I do Vyse's, if nothing else...)
Lux, Demacian courtship sounds not unlike the way that Enrique and Moegi behaved, but they were royalty... this would be for a close friend of mine. I'll have to work out something less formal...

Polly, just asking for sex does sound appealing, but what if it's offensive? Vyse and Aika have each been on the receiving end of... similar propositions in the past, and they've never reacted positively to it...
Maybe you're right, Wikipe-tan... Should I just tell him that I'd like to bed him? I suspect that's what he'd do in my place... I might be making this more complicated than it needs to be.
Oh, I was invited by ~player~ just the other day, ~neptune~... I'm quite grateful for the invitation. I'm having a good time so far...

Oh, I was invited by ~player~ some time ago, ~neptune~... and thankfully, it seems the island where I found the entrance the first time leads here reliably. It's such an odd situation that I wasn't sure...
(Oh, my... Those are real wings ~winged~ has, aren't they? I've never met someone with those before...)

Magma, I'm skeptical that simply asking to see someone's genitals is a good approach. Or their breasts, which aren't technically genitals, I suppose... Has... that typically worked for you in the past?

Magma, the direct approach is certainly appealing, but do you really think Vyse will just disrobe if I ask him to? Though, he'd probably forgive me even if he was offended... I suppose it could be worth a try...
~Magma_grunt~, that was actually an excellent idea. If I attempt to proposition Vyse, but I do it awkwardly and incorrectly like you did, I imagine he'll pity me too much to feel offended...

case.state: Um... Magma, I don't suppose you'd be interested in sharing any more information about that bet you said you lost? I'm... not very experienced with... bets.

state.text: I'd really like to be able to fly, Joey... it would be so useful, and make sailing much safer if you could just fly back up to your ship.
The Blade Breaker... Two? Does that mean there was another Blade Breaker earlier? I'm not sure I fully understand the context here...
"The Raging Bear"? That sounds... hmm... passionate and intimidating, but also like someone who fights to protect others. I think I like it...
The... Executioner? That doesn't sound like the sort of mercenary I'd want to have anything to do with... It doesn't even sound like a mercenary, so much as some... minion of an oppressive state...
I'm not entirely sure, ~jim~. ~Player~ invited me to come here, and I flew to the island marked on the map ~player.ifMale(he|she)~ gave me, but how exactly that brought me here, I couldn't say...
Sucrose, I'm not very experienced with innuendos yet, but I'd love to hear from the rest of you. Maybe I'll get all flustered and start losing every hand... You'd like that, wouldn't you, ~player~?
That's your Devil Fruit ability? Drawing power from special fruit reminds me of Moonberries... Wait, are you threatening the rest of us? You shouldn't attack other players!
Hmm, I'd say a ideal mercenary should be a caring person who will only accept jobs that improve people's lives. I couldn't respect someone who would do anything for money, even hurt the innocent...

...I don't think they could be, ~takatoshi~... If I hadn't been so fortunate to meet Vyse and Aika when I did... I'm not sure how I would have turned out in the end. Or if I'd been raised the way Ramirez was... I think about that a lot.
For me, I think the cutest thing was visiting Hamachou Island. One of the little Hamachou birds there looked just like Vyse, and it was so adorable! I think Vyse was a little embarrassed, though.

... You were naked for that entire time? Oh my, I... I've never been naked for more than half an hour or so... even less in the Great Silver Shrine, since bathing was so efficient. But... I wonder what it would be like...
...Unfortunately, this question isn't a hypothetical one for me. Yes, I would... even if that person had been very dear to me...
Um... ~perona~, are you threatening the rest of us? You shouldn't attack other players!
Um... where did you get that bracelet, ~rouge~? You really shouldn't steal from the other players here... Aren't there any oppressive governments you could steal from instead?
You know, ~rouge~, if you put that back where you found it, I could tell you about some much more interesting treasures from Arcadia. Wouldn't you prefer a pendant with magical properties?
...A crown, ~rouge~? Where did that even come from? Honestly, I can't think of any legitimate reason to own a crown, so I can't object to that one. But please, stop stealing from us, alright?

(~Rouge~ definitely just took someone's bracelet... Did it belong to ~villain~, though? Stealing from people like that isn't really a problem under the Blue Rogues' code. I'll just keep an eye on her for now...)
Oh, I see... I'm sorry to hear that, ~yuno_uno~, but it's good that you're getting it treated. The glove just makes you look more attractive anyway, so far as I'm concerned...

That depends on what you mean by spirits, ~miki_miura~... I've heard certain monsters described that way, and those certainly exist. But I don't know if I "believe" in any that I haven't seen myself...
~Msfortune~, you can remove your head? How is that possible...? I suppose you don't look like an ordinary human, but...

case.state: ~Hu_tao~, Cupil does, um, help me with a wide variety of things, including... Well, I suppose it makes sense as a practical function. There certainly wasn't much else to do in the Shrine when I was growing up, so...

state.text: Ah... well, actually, ~estelle~, I don't shave... It seems I'm this way naturally. Silvites are... a bit different from the other peoples of my world, so... perhaps that's the reason...

case.state: Oh, is that so, Sucrose? Perhaps your Visions are the equivalent of the Moon Stones from my own world, then... Although, ordinary Moon Stones fall quite often, whereas it sounds as though Visions are rare...
Is a "Kuriboh" a Silver animal like Cupil, ~dark_magician_girl~? I'm sure Cupil would love to meet him, if so... He doesn't really have any friends of his own, well, nature. {Cupil}[Chirp!]{!reset}
~Yusuke~, while it would be quite interesting, I doubt any artistic functionality is built into Cupil. The Silvite idea of art was, at most, making practical devices aesthetically appealing...

So, um... ~Rouge~... Since you've been understanding about this... I could at least let you look at me and... maybe touch me a little... where my Silver Moon Crystal is, if you'd like. It's right here, in my chest...

I doubt you'd be able to buy anything like Cupil, ~critical_darling~... I'm the only Silvite left, and I don't know how to create such a being. The secrets of his creation are probably lost now. {Cupil}[Chirp?]{!reset}

Oh, my, time travel? I don't think anything like that is possible where I'm from... I can't imagine how you would even go about opposing an enemy with such an ability. Even the Silvites could never do that, as far as I know...

state.text: Um... handcuffs, Bobobo? I... I don't think I can agree to that... we barely even know each other!
Moons, you said your world was destroyed, Chara? That's terrible... How did something like that even happen...?

case.state: Um... thank you, Wikipe-tan, you... certainly know a great deal of information about poker. I imagine I'll learn a great deal from watching the other players, as well.

state.text: Thank you, Ignatz... I haven't had many people offer to paint me before, so... the honor is really mine.

case.state: No, you didn't, Ignatz, I... my imagination is a little too active, I think, under these circumstances... I'll agree to be painted clothed, and... I won't make any other decisions yet.

state.text: I don't know if I'm a "regular", ~kumatora~... I've been here before, but I'm still getting used to it. I do quite enjoy it, though, so perhaps I'll end up becoming one...
Am I a regular? Hmmm... at this point, perhaps so, ~kumatora~. I've grown really fond of attending these games, especially when ~player~ is here to share them with me...
Fluttershy, Cupil is an artificial creature created by my people, the Silvites. Like other Silver creatures, he can change into a variety of forms, and often turns into weapons when we have to fight.
Haha, yes, indeed, ~kumatora~... And it makes sense, I suppose. This is quite a strange place, after all... It's no surprise it attracts weird people like us.
Oh, my... That's quite lovely, ~hu_tao~, I'm flattered... Very, um... inspiring...

Oh, my... I'm not sure it's as... exciting as you're implying, ~rouge~... Not that I'd object if it was, but... It's more that I'm not as fit for physical combat as the others in my crew, and we end up doing that a lot...
Oh, my... That sounds like more excitement than I'm usually involved in, ~rouge~... Well, sexually, I mean. I suppose there's self-pleasure, but... that doesn't really take a lot of energy, so...

case.state: Ah, well... I don't think it's anything all that... spectacular, ~rouge~... though I have learned a lot from it, I suppose. But, when it comes to pleasuring one another, as opposed to just myself, I'm a lot less... practiced...

I don't think it's as... impressive as you're describing, ~rouge~... I do understand my own body quite well, but that's to be expected, right? I suppose I've also had a bit of practice doing it in secret, now that I'm on a pirate crew rather than sitting alone in my room all the time... um, and now some practice doing it in public, I suppose.

state.text: ~Critical_darling~, Cupil is an artificial creature from my homeland... He can transform into many different shapes, and change his size as well. He often turns into weapons when we're fighting.

~Penny_polendina~, I live on Crescent Isle... It was a deserted island Vyse got stranded on, but we ended up turning it into our base. I suppose it's a floating island as well, though that's pretty normal for Arcadia...

case.state: It doesn't seem like much fun to be exposed to others when it wasn't your decision, so I'm sorry that happened to you, ~nami~. I'd rather do it by choice, as an "exhibitionist", if that's the correct usage.

state.text: ~Rosa~, just asking does seem like the simplest approach... but, I'm concerned it will be offensive. It seems propositioning others without going through the proper channels is not socially acceptable...

Well, ~arash~, I suppose that's a reasonable way to describe Vyse, Aika, and me... We've resolved to continue sailing together, and explore as much of the world as we can. Even other worlds, since those seem to exist...

That certainly sounds stronger than any wooden ship I've come across, ~nami~... We went there in the Delphinus, which was a metal Valuan dreadnought, but even then we had to make special modifications.

No, I don't know that much, ~nami~... The Silvite Elders didn't tell me as much as they did Ramirez, and... most of what they did tell me turned out to be a lie. So, I can't assume anything I learned to be true...

Sucrose, Moon Stones do grant elemental magic, depending on their color, but... I'm not sure what else my Moon Crystal does for me. The Silvite Elders didn't even tell me it was there, let alone its properties...

The Gigas weren't originally created for that purpose, Cynthia... They were weapons of war, which the six ancient civilizations unleashed on one another. That war was what led to the end of the Old World...
~Lucina~, Ylisse sounds like a wonderful place to me... But, what do you mean when you say it wasn't like that in the past?

Well, not literally, no, Cynthia... When I say it was destroyed, I mean that all the ancient civilizations were wiped out and their cultures lost. However, ruins and ancient relics still persist from that time...

Arash, I think I'd give them some space, but I wouldn't want to just wait without finding a way to address the root of... whatever problem they were having. Being isolated forever is no way to live...
Arash, I do think Enrique and Moegi are really sweet together... though maybe more formal than I'd want to be with a lover. I miss seeing them, now that they're the Emperor and Empress of Valua...

That sounds... really unpleasant, Arash... I doubt I'd put up with it. I haven't had anyone obsessed with me that way, but I've seen it happen with... other people I know, and... it's never ended well.

Arash, Enrique had a really hard time not getting airsick when he started traveling with us. I know he was a sheltered prince, but I never had that issue, and I'd never even left the Shrine until last year...

case.state: Well, um... maybe I can give you some gold after the game, ~wikipe-tan~? I, um, don't currently have any on me, since...

state.text: Oh, that sounds just like Vyse, ~aoba~... I've practically never seen him get discouraged. Even when the Valuan Armada destroyed our entire base on Crescent Isle, he saw it as a chance to remodel...
I think Hamachous are my favorite, Aoba. They're so cute and round, such endearing little birds... or quite large ones, even; it seems that Moon Hamachous can grow to enormous size.
Oh, that sounds like Captain Drachma, Aoba... He always wanted us to think all he cared about was hunting down that arcwhale, Rhaknam, even though he'd always drop everything if we needed help.

Oh, dear... that sounds a lot like Vigoro to me, Aoba. I don't even know how many times he's challenged us in the hopes of impressing Aika, even though she's obviously not interested... it's sort of exhausting.
I quite like monsters myself, ~aoba~... Loopers are probably my favorite, they look so elegant. I always feel bad when we have to fight them, but unfortunately they're quite dangerous as well...

I quite like monsters myself, ~aoba~... but unfortunately, we end up having to fight a lot of them, since Vyse insists on never running from a fight. He's so concerned with his reputation as a pirate...
Oh... that makes me think of Elder Prime, Aoba. He was like a father to me for most of my life and always took care of me, but now that I know what... his plans for me must have been...

~Miko~, Gensokyo sounds like a fascinating place... How exactly does one get there? I'd be quite interested in visiting sometime... though, probably only if Vyse and Aika come too, as it sounds somewhat dangerous.

~Saki_zls~, I'd be happy to come and visit Saga sometime... I'm not sure if I have any questions that I need answered there, but I really enjoy exploring new places. I wonder if the Sailor's Guild knows about it...

~Saki_zls~, Moonberries taste a bit odd, but they are quite sweet... so perhaps you wouldn't like the taste. Most people eat them more for the supernatural abilities they grant than for their flavor, though...

Um... ~Saki_zls~, why would threatening someone's life make them want to sleep with me? Vigoro's attacked us over and over again, but I don't think Aika is any more interested in him than when he started...

You're in my heart, ~chara_dreemurr~? I certainly don't think I've ever felt... (Oh, no, but... All those monsters we've harmed, because Vyse didn't want us to run away... Was his pirate reputation really worth all that...?)
Chara, if defeating "enemies" simply because they exist isn't evil, I really don't understand how you define it. Especially if that defeat ends in senseless death...
You're always in ~player~'s soul, Chara? I... I'll still find a way... Even if I can't purge you completely, I can still reduce your influence on ~player~ as much as possible...

Yes, Cynthia, it does make sense. When technology advances faster than the people who wield it, dire consequences are only to be expected... but, I think we've avoided repeating history, at least for now.

I think you're right, ~saki_zls~... That's not how I've always thought about it, but Vyse and the others taught me never to lose hope, even if your home is burned to the ground, or you're facing impossible odds...

case.state: Well, Dawn, you could probably study Cupil if you wanted. He's the only remaining Silver animal I'm aware of, so he ought to be quite unique. I'll introduce you to him some time later, if you like...

Well, Dawn, you could probably study Cupil if you wanted. He's the only remaining Silver animal I'm aware of, so he ought to be quite unique... Would that be alright with you, Cupil? {Cupil}[Chirp!]{!reset}

state.text: ~Amy_rose~, it varies what we shop for, but most often crystals and glyphs for battles on foot, or repair kits and wax for our ship... Those are crucial for healing and enhancing our abilities.
I think you're right, Cynthia. Perhaps learning even more about the ancient civilizations of Arcadia should be my next goal... I'm sure there's a great deal more I could learn from them.

~Petra~, I'll happily give you a Moonberry... I'm sure it would help Brigid's people in combat. The effect is different for everyone, but Vyse can conjure blades of light, and Aika can create fiery explosions...
Oh, that's a relief! Thank the Moons you finally found them, Ignatz.
Ignatz, surely your goddess wouldn't call down wrath on you just because of something harmless like this...? If she cares about you the way you seem to believe, I can't imagine she'd be that cruel...
Oh no... um... what can I do to help you get viewers, Streaming-chan? I could show my breasts for a second, if that would help...

case.state: Oh no... um... What can I do to help you get viewers, Streaming-chan? I could pull down my leggings a bit for a second, if that would help...
Oh no... um... What can I do to help you get viewers, ~streaming-chan~? I could, er, play with myself for a second, if that would help...
Oh no... um... What can I do to help you get viewers, Streaming-chan? Is there a way you want me to pose or something to be more exciting?

state.text: Yes, based on my own experiences, I have to agree with you, ~nami~. I've gotten pretty good at taking care of myself by now, but I'd still rather travel with Vyse and Aika... The three of us can handle any danger.

It's very kind of you to offer some advice, Senko... I understand the, um, basic mechanics of... intimacy, but the social aspect is very confusing. It's so private that I've never seen a good example of, well... asking.

Senko, I should just be direct about it, and we can establish what we each want? I'm... not entirely sure what I do want, but I certainly know what feels nice... I suppose we could experiment together...
Wait... Hilda, you were playing badly on purpose? Wouldn't that just make it more difficult for you to win the game?
Hilda, you were playing badly on purpose? But... doesn't that just put you at a disadvantage?

Yes, ~meia~... Until last year, I'd only met a single ordinary person who lived in the Great Silver Shrine with me and left when I was little. And, I don't think the Elders intended me to do any dating...

case.state: Oh, this isn't my Air Pirate outfit, ~mari~... These are actually traditional Silvite garments. I've kept them because of the memories associated with them, but they're not terribly practical for piracy...

state.text: ~Mari~, I asked about you and Hero because I'm... wondering whether I'm in that situation myself or not. Vyse, Aika, and I are all very close, but we haven't really... talked about that sort of thing... in the past.
No, ~kumatora~, this is my first time playing here. It does seem quite intriguing so far, though... Depending on how this game goes, I might be interested in coming back.

case.state: Oh, that sounds quite unfortunate... "Pig King"? Was he literally a pig, or is that just a title? I'd assume the latter, but you never know with the strange worlds people here seem to come from...

state.text: I see, ~reimu~... Perhaps you could bring in bounties for the local authorities, instead? Though, I suppose that's already what you're doing in hunting youkai, so that might not be a new suggestion.
That makes sense, ~reimu~... Are there undiscovered regions of your homeland you could explore? In Arcadia, the Sailor's Guild will pay us for finding new relics, ruins, and curiosities...
Oh... were you talking about me and you, ~reimu~? Well, in principle, I don't see the need to limit myself in terms of, um, number of suitors, but... I also don't know you very well, so...

case.state: There's nothing pitiful about accepting help if you need it, ~reimu~... And, you're here for financial reasons anyway, right? It seems a bit more practical to acquire funds that way than by... um, marrying one of us...
~Hu_tao~, Cupil alerts me to his functions on his own. The first time, I was passing time alone in my room that way, Cupil transformed into an appropriate form, and he seemed... eager to help, so...

state.text: Hmmm... I suppose if you never intended to use them, that wouldn't be so bad... I still can't say it's a situation I'd prefer, though. I don't think I could trust anyone with such power, regardless of their intentions...
Ah... ~rouge~, were you implying... I still hardly know you, so I don't know how much I'd be able to "sweeten the pot"... Wait, were you implying that? Moons, this game is really getting to me...
Yes, it sounds lovely, ~syrenne~. I don't usually have the opportunity to bathe with others, and so I---Um, hold on. I'm not missing some of the implications here, am I?
Well, I suppose you could say that, ~syrenne~? At least, I'd like there to be... We certainly care for one another as friends, but I'm not certain about his... other interests...

Where I come from, they quite literally fall from the sky, ~syrenne~, but... I was actually considering giving a Silver Moon Stone to the winner of this game. So, if you're interested, why don't we make it a formal bet?
Hmmm, I see... Well, perhaps we'll find some other way to work together in the future, ~syrenne~. I'll let my crew know you're looking for work, and maybe they'll have other ideas...
Ah... I see. Well, um... I do have quite a bit of excess gold from our last treasure-hunting expedition. Why don't we continue this discussion after the game? I'm sure we can work something out...
Yes, that's what I was afraid of... This is part of why I'd really rather wait until I know someone well before I try anything like that. All these social rules are still a bit mystifying to me...
I couldn't tell you, ~syrenne~... Perhaps they just like the look of it, and collect it for that reason? I wonder if Aika would know, since she's our expert on treasure...
Oh, is that so? She sounds like a fun person to go drinking with... I'd love to meet her sometime.

Well, you could be right, ~syrenne~... It might be a sign of trust, and understanding each other's boundaries, to behave that way... And, those things are surely important for that sort of relationship, so...
~Estelle~, I'm not a noble, and... your prescription doesn't seem very logical. If you're agreeing to have sex only with one person, shouldn't you first find out if you like doing it with them?
Um... ~estelle~, I promise there's nothing dangerous about Moonberries... My crew and I have consumed many of them to enhance our abilities, without any adverse side effects...
~Yuno_uno~, we don't have a "New York" anywhere in my world I'm aware of... I suppose it could be somewhere in Valua? We haven't explored that much, since it was the seat of a hostile government.
~Yuno_uno~, I've never heard of an "America", no... I suppose such a place could exist in some undiscovered corner of our world, but we've explored it quite extensively.

~Mercy~, I find travel to be quite relaxing. Watching from the deck of a ship and flying wherever our whims take us... It's one of my favorite things to do. Though it does tend to invite monster attacks...

Oh, I know exactly what you mean, ~mercy~... I really like the idea of being completely at the mercy of someone I trust. But... I think I'd also be really honored if someone placed that trust in me...
Oh, my... Yes, I can certainly appreciate that thought, ~mercy~. I... wouldn't want to invite just anyone, of course, but if it was with... good friends...

Well, ~twisted_fate~, we haven't met any pirates returned from the dead, but we've certainly faced dangerous Black Pirates in the past... Do you have a ship to challenge him in? How does he usually operate?

Actually, ~twisted_fate~, my original mission after leaving the Great Silver Shrine was to gather the Moon Crystals and prevent their vast power from being claimed by the Valuan Empire... I imagine that qualifies.

~Twisted_fate~, I certainly have fond memories of being rescued from Admiral Alfonso by Vyse and Aika... They found me on his ship and decided to take me back to Pirate Isle, and my life hasn't been the same since...

~Twisted_fate~, there was the time we faced Admiral Belleza at the Temple of Pyrynn after she stole the Red Moon Crystal. She was so skilled with her magic cannons, we only barely managed to take it back from her...

~Twisted_fate~, as Air Pirates, we certainly use our skills to take what we need from others... but only from people who deserve it. It's against the Blue Rogues' code to attack defenseless merchant vessels...

case.state: ~Nami~, Cupil doesn't exactly talk, no... although I can understand him quite well, but it's not exactly speech. I think he can understand you, though. {Cupil}[Chirp!]{!reset}

state.text: I wish I had an answer for you, Sucrose... I'm very inexperienced with sexual euphemisms myself, but I do find them fascinating. Did you want to explain some innuendos to us, ~player~?
I can't help much with that, Sucrose, but... maybe you could explain some to us, ~player~? Who knows, maybe I'll get all flustered and slip up... You'd like that, wouldn't you?
I wish I had an answer for you, Sucrose... I'm very inexperienced with sexual euphemisms myself, but I do find them fascinating. I'm interested to hear what the rest of you have to say, though...
Er... I'm really sorry, Ini, I suppose I was staring at you a bit... I'm just a little taken aback at this sudden... change. May I ask what the purpose of this act has been...?
Oh, um... That certainly seems like a good cause, Wikipe-tan. Maybe I can spare a few gold?

It was certainly bad luck when we ran into both the arcwhale Rhaknam and Admiral Ramirez's flagship at the same time, ~saki_zls~... but then again, it was incredibly lucky that we survived that at all.

Vegetable juice, Miku? I don't believe I've ever tried that... My favorite thing to drink is probably loqua. It's a delicious juice drink, and it's alcoholic sometimes... That aspect seems to vary widely.
I'm certainly in favor of hair down there, Lyralei... I mean, mostly because it's so different from what I have. I've never been able to grow it anywhere but my head...
I do enjoy nature, Lyralei. When I lived in the Great Silver Shrine, everything was so artificial and... empty. I'd much rather live in a forest like yours than in a place like that again...
I don't think I know anyone like that, Lux. But if she's in need of heroes, perhaps the Blue Rogues would be able to lend her a hand...
Ignatz, I certainly don't see anything wrong with it. Pleasuring oneself doesn't harm anyone, and it's, well... pleasurable, and a good way to pass the time, I've always felt...

Spooky, I think my greatest fear is... being alone again. I was so lonely almost all my life, up in the Great Silver Shrine with no one but me and the Elders, and Ramirez before he left... I don't ever want to live that way again.
I enjoyed it a great deal, Hilda... I... wasn't really compiling proper feedback at the time, but I thought it was beautiful.

case.state: It was beautiful, Hilda, it really helped me a lot... Thank you so much...

state.text: Another... universe? Well, I think I'm in one now... as this appears to be a place where people from many realities can gather. But, I don't know how to perform such travel without an invitation...

Penny, my favorite view is the open sky from aboard our ship... Not only is it beautiful, but it takes me back to some of the most... treasured memories of my life. I doubt I'll ever get tired of it...
I've never thought much about it, Penny, but... the feeling of food in my stomach is quite a nice one, especially if I was very hungry before.

Oh... Penny, maybe I'd like to be able to talk to Loopers, and tell them to leave us alone? Or any dangerous creature that attacks our ship, I always feel bad that we have to hurt them to defend ourselves.
That's certainly part of why I'm here, Penny. I've... really come to appreciate the value of good friends...
~Takatoshi~, I wasn't in love with him, I don't think... but I never expected that Ramirez would do such... terrible things. We were children together, and... I thought he was a good person...

It's a little disconcerting to think you can just read our hearts, ~miko~, but... I just want to live a full life. I want to travel far with my friends Vyse and Aika, and to see and experience as much as I can...
Um... I'm not used to rating this sort of performance, but I thought it was wonderful, ~jessie~. I can tell you're... um... experienced...

Well, being a Blue Rogue does pay fairly well, ~reimu~. We rob from the rich, and we do use it to help the poor, but we keep quite a lot of it for ourselves. I don't know if I'd call it a "scheme", though...
It really does, ~kumatora~... but I'm not sure we have room to talk. Objectively speaking, we're quite unusual ourselves...

~Kumatora~, the Elders didn't teach me much of anything... They didn't really want me to... reproduce, I think. I had to piece things together by asking Aika and Moegi about it... That was enough to learn the basics.
I wonder that too, ~kumatora~. Ramirez was sort of like a brother to me, but he left the Shrine when I was a little girl... I imagine it would have been a lot less lonely, if nothing else.
I'd have to say Moon Stones, ~rouge~... Assuming those count as jewels. I'm more interested in their magical properties than in their appearance, to be quite honest...

I shouldn't tell you this, ~rouge~, but they're likely lost in Deep Sky forever, so... the Moon Crystals contained the power of thousands of Moon Stones. But, if you somehow found them, we'd be enemies...

My favorite way to pass the time is, um, napping, ~rouge~... It's not very exciting, but our work gets awfully tiring. And it's really... nice... to be able to sleep outside in the sun, in the middle of the day...

case.state: Well, honestly, I usually just nap to pass the time, ~rouge~... Unless you count, um... ah... No, it's typically napping... Out in the midday sun is nice...

I don't have very interesting hobbies, ~rouge~... I like to nap out in the sun in the middle of the day, and, um... masturbate, I suppose. I always did that to pass the time in the Great Silver Shrine, and I've gotten used to using it to relax, so...

state.text: Um... ~rouge~, what exactly are you doing back there? I definitely saw you take something just now...
Hmm... I'm not very experienced with nicknames, since my crew doesn't use them very often. I suppose you could just cut it short, and go with "Kum"? ...Well... on second thought, perhaps not...

case.state: I think being relaxed is what helps me the most, ~estelle~. If I'm too tense, it's much harder to maintain concentration... That's part of why I try to indulge in midday naps when I can.

state.text: Oh, um... Well, I'm going through one of Vyse's books on navigation right now... But, the one you mentioned sounds interesting, ~estelle~. Perhaps you could tell me more later?
I try not to let it bother me, ~yuno_uno~, but sometimes people do have negative reactions when they find out I'm a pirate. It helps that I don't look anything like a typical Air Pirate, though.

case.state: Um, since not everyone seems to know this when they get here... the losers of this game have to get completely naked and then masturbate. You should leave if you're not comfortable with that.
Um, this is... quite a place to hold a game, you know. But... maybe it'll be okay to give it a try... I'll let you all know if it's too much for me...

state.text: ~Marker.RemembersYourName~, I'd normally be happy that you invited people I already knew to this game, but frankly, I'm not interested in building a relationship with Chara. I think you're aware of that, though.
Chara... your eyes! What under the six Moons...?
(Her eyes have gone all black again... what is she??)
(I don't think I'm ever going to get used to that... What sort of being is Chara, anyway?)
(Chara's face is sending chills down my spine...)
(...What sort of creature is Chara, anyway? ~Player~, what have you done...?)
~Player~, why... why do Chara's eyes look like that? Do you know what's going on...?
(...I've faced many terrifying things in the past, but Chara is like nothing I've ever encountered before...)
(Moons... Who is Chara? What is she doing here? And why did ~player~ invite her...?)
(Chara's eyes... It's like staring into the Dark Rift... Could she somehow be connected to the Black Moon...?)

case.state: I am trying to flirt in this game, so I'll do my best not to be too... um, modest, about this... That would defeat the point of flirtation, right?

state.text: This is such an... um, intimate setting for a game... It seems very appropriate, though. But, just to clarify, I am going to be leaving when the game is over...
~Other~, do you frequently attend these games? Ah... hmmm. I'm sorry, I don't think that one was sufficiently flirtatious...
~Other~, while your attire is quite lovely on you, I believe it would be even more appealing off of you... Well... or rather, you would be more appealing, I suppose...
~Other~, I'm really looking forward to getting to know you better, if you know what I mean... hmm. That one was acceptable, I suppose...
~Other~, do you possess your own airship? That would make sense, as you've been flying it through my mind this whole game... ah... hmm. I don't think I did that correctly...

~Other~, your eyes are like Moon Stones... Well, but perhaps those are too common. Moon Crystals, then? But, while those are quite rare and beautiful, they're also used to bring about the apocalypse...
Your body is quite beautiful, ~other~. I'm really looking forward to seeing you strip again...
Are you having fun, ~other~? I certainly am, especially with you here...
Do you think you'll lose this round, ~other~? Because, I'm sort of hoping you do... I'd like to get to know you better.
You're not nervous that I'll get to see more of you this round, are you, ~other~?
You know, ~other~, one or the other of us is going to end up naked by the end of this game... I'm hoping it will be you, but perhaps both of us would be ideal...
Thank you so much for playing this game with me, ~other~... I really appreciate what you've shown me so far...
I'm really pleased that you decided to attend this game, ~other~... I hope you'll continue to play with us...
Is it alright if I stare at you a little, ~other~? You're so beautiful that I can hardly help it...
You're quite breathtaking like this, ~other~. I'm so sorry for staring...
I'm really glad to have you here, ~other~... And, I hope you'll stay with us... all the way to the end.
I appreciate your invitation, ~player~. I think I'm really learning a lot at this game so far, so... perhaps you can teach me more.
I know you probably only invited me here because you want to see me naked, ~player~, but... I don't think I have a problem with that...
I'm really grateful that you introduced me to this game, ~player~. Maybe I'll have the opportunity to express that gratitude better, in a little while...
Given my inexperience, the odds are that I'll lose this game, ~player~... Are you looking forward to that?
Thank you so much for bringing me here, ~player~. I think I'd be interested in attending again... If you're here, at least...
No matter how many times we play, ~marker.RemembersYourName~, there are always new things to learn about your body... and I hope you're learning a great deal about mine, as well...
So, ~marker.RemembersYourName~... if I happen to lose this game... do you have any special requests?
What do you think is your favorite part of my body, ~marker.RemembersYourName~? You've seen pretty much all of it, so you should be well prepared to decide...
What do you think, ~marker.RemembersYourName~? Am I going to be yours this time...?
If you win this game, I might let you hold me, ~marker.RemembersYourName~... So, you probably shouldn't win by too much, if you'd like to enjoy it as much as possible...
Thank you for inviting me to another game, ~marker.RemembersYourName~. I'm eager to learn new things here... especially if you're my teacher.
So, ~marker.RemembersYourName~... are you hoping to win this game, or lose it? Because, I think losing alongside you would be quite... exciting...
Thank you so much for introducing me to this game, ~marker.RemembersYourName~. I'm... really looking forward to expressing that gratitude...
Do you think you've got me this round, ~marker.RemembersYourName~? Am I the one you're hoping for?
I really enjoy these games, ~marker.RemembersYourName~. I'd like to come here as much as I can... especially if I can play with you...

This place really reminds me of Clara's ship, the Primrose. She decorated it with hearts just about everywhere she could... even the anchor was heart-shaped. I wonder if she's managed to catch poor Gilder yet...
They don't serve loqua here, do they? I know they have drinks at the bar, but I'm not familiar with most of the available options...
Even the air here feels different, it has such an odd, tangy scent to it... and the sound of the waves is so relaxing...
So, um... why did we decide to play here again? It's awfully cold, it's too dark to, um, observe properly, and all the ghosts are distracting... They don't seem hostile, at least?
This is really a lovely place to hold a game... The sound of the waves is so calming, and the sun is so bright outside. I wonder if the bar serves loqua...
Well, this place certainly lives up to its name, doesn't it? We were promised that it would be purple, and we weren't disappointed...
This is such an... um, intimate setting for a game... It seems very appropriate, though. Do they let patrons stay in these rooms after a game? Um, which I won't be doing, just to clarify...
This is such an... intimate setting, but it seems very appropriate... ~Player~, did you want to stay here with me for a little while after the game? Um, not overnight, just to clarify...
These solstice decorations are quite interesting... What's the reason for those pine trees covered in lights? Some local tradition, I have to assume...
Are those presents laid out under the trees? I'm guessing gift giving is part of the winter solstice traditions around here, right?
It's so calming to watch the snow fall... Especially when you don't have to feel how cold it is. I remember that all too well...

case.state: I'm so sorry, I know I probably shouldn't be covering myself so much, but... well... this is still a little much for me... I think it will get easier as time goes on, though, so...
Can you see me as well as you'd like, ~player~? Here, I'll make sure of it...
Please, don't be afraid to stare, ~player~. That's what I'm here for, after all...
I'd be honored if you would observe me as closely as you can, ~player~...
Am I not giving you a good enough view, ~player~? I'm so sorry... I'll remedy that at once...
You're entitled to look at me as much as you desire, ~player~. Just say the word, and I'll show you what you wish...
Did you want me to turn around for you, ~player~? In that case, I'll do exactly as you command...
You're welcome to look at me from whatever angle you desire, ~player~... Would you prefer this one?
The back of me is yours just as much as the front is, ~player~... So please, don't stop until you've seen all there is to see...

Moons, it feels wonderful to have all that off... My clothes were just drenched from the snow. Perhaps after this game, I should just stretch out in front of the fire and soak up the heat for a bit...
I really like how the Inventory has so many different locations for games... Some of them are a little... extreme, but I'm enjoying playing at the ~background~.

This place is called the "~background~", right? I wonder how the Inventory got permission to rent it out for strip poker games... It seems like the sort of thing that would be quite awkward to arrange.
The Inventory has so many different locations for games... I'm enjoying playing at the ~background~. Wait... is it really called the "~background~"? That can't be right...
I really like how the Inventory has so many different locations for games... Some of them are a little... extreme, but I'm enjoying playing at the... er... Inventory... room?
It's interesting that they call this place the Inventory... Quite an unassuming name for a bar. But, I suppose they're trying to keep attention away from the... activities... here?
I really like how the Inventory has so many different locations for games... I'm enjoying playing at the Paris rooftop. Though, I'm not entirely sure what "Paris" is...
The view from up here is really beautiful... If only it weren't so chilly up here at night, it would be perfect. I wonder if we're allowed to play here during the day as well?
So... is this a "honeymoon suite"? Aika never did explain to me what that was... (Which probably means I should be excited...)

state.text: (The Inventory must be doing something odd to our memory. They don't seem to remember me at all, and I can't remember exactly what happened in our games together... Maybe it's some sort of privacy measure?)

case.state: Um, I apologize for asking such a basic question, but... what sort of "hand" are we attempting to get?
So, if you don't mind... could you give me a brief overview of... how to play this game?
Um, by the way, I... don't actually know how to play this game yet. But that will just add to the experience... I hope.
I wasn't expecting to see quite so many familiar faces here... We've all played together before, haven't we? It's good to see everyone again.
It's actually rather nice that you invited someone else I've met to this game, ~marker.RemembersYourName~. I'd rather get to know one person well over time, as opposed to meeting many briefly...
I believe there's several others here I'm familiar with as well. It's a pleasure to play a game with you again.

(Based on what the others are doing, it appears that once you've got your final hand, you're supposed to give everyone clues as to what it might be. I don't know what's good, so that may prove difficult...)
(How am I doing so well? I still don't understand what I'm doing at all. Clearly, this game must be based heavily on luck...)
Am I... winning? But I have no idea what I'm doing! This isn't how I expected this to go at all...

(Based on what ~other~ is doing, it appears that once you've got your final hand, you're supposed to give everyone clues as to what it might be. I don't know what's good, so that may prove difficult...)
It's sort of appropriate that we're playing in a classroom... since I'm hoping to learn and grow during this game more than anything.
This will be an excellent place for the learning and growing I hope to participate in... or so I assume. I'm... actually not very familiar with classrooms...
Um... is someone playing music? No one else hears that?
Moons, this really is a... creative... choice of location. Shouldn't we be playing somewhere with fewer... um... distractions?
Moons, there are so many books... This puts the Sailor's Guild library to shame! Are we allowed to read these after the game?

state.text: I really never get used to the size of these liquid oceans... There's nothing like it in my world. It's like an entire sky full of water...
Moons, there's so much water out there... It's like an entire sky of liquid. I don't think even Yafutoma has bodies of water this large!

case.state: This ~background~ setting is quite warm, isn't it? ...Oh, I'm not complaining... In fact, it seems like an ideal temperature, since we're going to be removing our clothes today.
This ~background~ setting really is cold, isn't it? Um... are we sure we want to play a stripping game somewhere like this? I don't want anyone to be uncomfortable...
It's nice to play out in the sun... Lying in the sunlight is one of my favorite things to do. Maybe I'll just sunbathe for the rest of the game if I lose...

This ~background~ setting is a nice enough place to play, but it's a pity we can't be outside while the sun's shining... Though, I suppose that would make things a lot less private, too. Perhaps it's better this way...

You know, I think it would be nice to play this game outdoors... But not tonight, of course. It's far too dark out, especially if we're going to play a game where we'd like to be looking at each other...

I wouldn't have chosen to play outside this late in the day, but... maybe it's actually a good idea. This way, we can gaze at the Moons and stars... At least until there's something more interesting to gaze at.
The road seems awfully hard. Should we be playing somewhere that's a bit more comfortable to stand, if we're going to end up barefoot?
I'm sort of excited about getting undressed here... just because I don't get to be barefoot in the grass all that often. That's not part of your strategy, is it, ~player~?
This ~background~ is awfully dark... It seems a bit odd to play here since we can't see anything well. But, maybe that will help ~enf~ feel more comfortable?
To be honest, this ~background~ seems a bit too dark to be practical for a strip poker game. We all want to be able to see each other, after all...
Considering how dark this ~background~ is, it seems like rather an odd place to play, since we can't see each other very well. But, perhaps that will make things more comfortable for ~enm~...
Hmmm... If I lose my clothes really quickly, perhaps I should just go for a swim? It's tempting with the water right there, and I don't swim naked very often...
This ~background~ setting is quite cozy... Quite a nice place for a friendly game like this, in my opinion.
I like the idea of playing at a bar. It'll be nice to have drinks on hand, in case we need to calm down from all the excitement...
First you make me walk through the snow, then you bring me to this lovely, warm little cabin for the game... This isn't a ploy to make me eager to undress, is it, ~player~ ?

state.text: ...Oh, by the way, ~player~... I've been told you'd like me to say you're my "little pogchamp". I'm... not very familiar with pogchamps, but... I hope it makes you happy, nevertheless...
Are you familiar with Moonberries? They're berries fertilized by Moon Stones that contain the power of the Moons... We have more than we can use by now. Would anyone like to try one?

So, Moonberries are special fruit that can fuel special techniques powered by the energies of the Moons... Vyse, Aika and I have more than we can use by now. I'm happy to give you one if you'd like...
Our world has rare fruit called Moonberries that can grant special powers to those who consume them... and on our adventures we've found many more than we need. I can give you one, if you'd like...
You really lost this one spectacularly, didn't you, ~player~? Mmm... maybe you should have to do some sort of extra forfeit for me... What do you think, would that be fun?

case.state: One more round, ~player~, just the two of us... I'm ready for you, in every way I can be...
So it's down to just you and me, ~player~. Let's make something beautiful together...

state.text: So... what do you think so far, everyone? This is a new experience for most of us, but I'm having a good time, and I hope you are too. And, thank you so much for guiding us through this, ~player~...
With so many students here, it almost feels like I'm attending a school! I'm not complaining, of course... I've never gotten to do that before, and it sounds rather fun.

(I'm getting the impression that ~criminal~ is often at odds with the law... But, I doubt I can draw any conclusions from that alone. It all depends on whether the law is just or not to begin with...)
(~Notalky~ isn't saying anything at all this game... is she unable to talk, like Maria was when we met her? I hope that doesn't mean something awful happened to her, too...)
(~Notalky~ isn't saying anything at all this game... is he unable to talk, like Maria was when we met her? I hope that doesn't mean something awful happened to him, too...)
(...I'm staring at ~peek~ again, aren't I? Her hair is just... Well, it's right there, isn't it?)
(...I'm staring at ~peek~ again, aren't I? His hair is just... Well, it's right there, isn't it?)
Well, ~opponent~, it's just the two of us now... So, let's have one last adventure together...
I'm actually surprised I survived to this point... Now, I guess we'll see whether I can make it all the way... or whether it'll be ~opponent~ who ends up... on top...
(Oh, my... Does ~tailed~ really have a tail? I've never met someone with one of those before...)

I think I'm finally starting to get used to this... I'm so sorry for being, um... overly modest, everyone... I've just never done anything like this before, so... thank you for being patient with me...

~Player~, thank you so much for trying to break away from Chara's influence... If she's really in everyone's heart, then... maybe you'll never completely succeed, but... I'd still like to reward you for trying...

~Player~, I told you that I'd try to fill whatever hole Chara was filling in your heart if you turned away from her... so, at least as a start... I can try to be more... open with you... in these games, at least...
I... feel like I ought to reward you somehow for the progress you've made so far in rejecting Chara's influence, ~player~. I don't have much I can do for you so far, but... here's me, at least...

case.state: My dress has supports for my breasts built right into it, so there's no need for a separate item of clothing. It's convenient... most of the time.
My dress has a bra built into it, which usually makes things simpler and easier... Efficiency is---was very important to my people...
It's not exactly that I wasn't wearing a bra... My dress has something like that built into it for support. The Elders found it... inefficient... to wear more clothes than were strictly necessary...
So, I don't actually shave... hair just doesn't seem to grow down there. I don't know the reason... I was... never able to ask the Elders how or why they made me.
I've never been able to grow hair on... parts of me other than my head, even if I wanted to. Aika tells me that's not normal for others, but... it's normal for Silvites, I think...
Aika told me most others have hair growing down... here, but I never have. It's normal for Silvites, but... I don't think we're normal compared to others... (Do I even understand what I really am?)
My leggings are made of a soft and flexible material... They're easy to move in, and the texture is very gentle on... me. So, I really don't need much else...
Silvites don't generally wear underwear... It's viewed as inefficient to have more items than we really need. And Silver magic is useful for controlling... certain bodily functions, so...
Underwear was... not widely used among my people. The Silvites weren't interested in anything that wasn't strictly necessary... (Or anyone...)
Um, ~lonely~, if I'm not mistaken... you look a little lonely. At least, you look how I... used to feel. Is there anything I can do to help you feel welcome here? Or anyone else, for that matter...
So... your name is ~player~, right? Thank you so much for inviting me. ~Player~... I won't forget that.
Since it's on my mind now... How much, um, experience do you all have with things like this? Have you seen someone in my... position, or exposed yourself to others, before now?
Come to think of it, we all brought friends to this game, didn't we? It will certainly make things much more lively, I suppose...
So, um, ~taken~, you're supposed to be in a "serious" relationship, right? I was wondering... how did you... determine that? When did you first... realize... that was the case?
(I could remove my earrings next, but that feels like cheating... Everyone will be so disappointed if I do that, and it's not as though it matters if I lose... Losing might be nice, actually...)

(Should I remove my earrings next? That seems really against the spirit of the game, though... I don't want to be one of those players who stalls forever with small items, and losing might be... nice...)
(I think I just won't take off my earrings... It would probably be disappointing to the others if I removed anything that small. Besides, being... displayed... would be exciting, wouldn't it?)
~Poor~, you don't have much money, do you? I'd be happy to give you some of my share of the treasure we obtained on our last expedition... I already have plenty for my own needs.
Ah, ~camera~... Are you still planning to take pictures? Um... just be respectful, alright? And keep them exclusively for your own... benefit...

state.text: That device you brought is called a "camera", right, ~camera~? You can use it to create images of things around you? You're welcome to use it on me, if you want to...
Oh... I think I'm being a little too, um, modest. That's not really fair, since the game is all about getting to see... I'll try to relax a bit and let the rest of you see me properly.

case.state: Ah... I'm so sorry, everyone... I'm feeling a little self-conscious right now. I promise I won't just cover myself for the whole game, but... give me some time to get used to this, alright...?

state.text: Ah... let me see... What should I talk about now? I... think it would help me... relax... to keep talking about my crew and our experiences, but... that's not exactly what's on my mind right now. Um...
Moons, this is certainly starting to get a bit... distracting... I'm still not entirely sure what I should talk about, so... I hope you'll forgive me if my mind starts to wander toward, well...

case.state: Just the two of us like this, ~player~... If I'm going to be exposed and vulnerable in front of everyone... I'm really happy it's with you.
With you and me the only ones to be so completely exposed, ~player~... It almost feels like we're meant to, um...
From what I can see, ~player~, it... looks like you're enjoying being in this position with me... Well, it's harder for you to tell, I imagine, but... I'm enjoying it too...
I suppose you might like to see me from the other side as well, ~player~... Well... it's a little awkward while we're playing, but I could turn around for just a moment...
Um... I'd like you to be able to see everything, ~player~... So please, don't hesitate to look at me as much as you want to...

state.text: So, um, I was hoping you all could give me some advice... If I'm interested in being... intimate... with somebody I know, how exactly do I... bring that up? It seems there are many social rules involved...
I get the impression that most people here are from places very different from Arcadia... I've even heard of lands where they sail on water instead of air! What are your home worlds like?
I don't think any of you are from Arcadia, are you? It seems people from many different worlds gather here... would you tell me about the worlds you call home?
The Inventory seems to be a place where travelers from many different worlds can congregate to share their experiences. I'm from a world my people called Arcadia... what about the rest of you?

I'm... not entirely sure what to talk about at a game like this. I suppose I could tell you facts about my world? (I miss searching for the Moon Crystals... I could just discuss the mission, if I wasn't sure what to say...)

Why did I come to a game like this? Well... I've learned much about the world since I left the Great Silver Shrine, but learning what I want to know about certain topics has proven more... challenging. So...
I've been going to the Inventory for a little while now... so I know what sort of games are played here. And now... I've finally gotten up the courage to join one of them myself...

case.state: I'm not as inexperienced at this as I used to be, but... if you do manage to get me out of my clothes, I'm sure ~marker.RemembersYourName~ could tell you I won't mind at all. Especially not with ~player.ifMale(him|her)~ here...
I still don't really know what I'm doing... maybe that means you'll have an easy time getting me to... get out of these. I don't mind, though...
I'm a little inexperienced at this game... maybe that means you'll have an easy time getting me to... get out of these. I don't mind, though...

state.text: These clothes I'm wearing are the garments of the Silver Civilization... I don't wear them that frequently now that I'm an Air Pirate... but they're comfortable, and I'm still fond of them.

~Marker.RemembersYourName~, I had the strangest dream last night... I was a military nurse, and Vyse and Aika were soldiers in my unit... and for some reason, I had two identical twin sisters named Mina and Gina! Isn't that ridiculous?
Thank you for inviting me to come here, ~player~, the Inventory is a fascinating place. (I need to tell Vyse about this place, he'd be so excited to meet travelers from other worlds altogether...)
You know, I've shared stories about my adventures as an Air Pirate with some people around the Inventory, and so many of their stories are surprisingly similar to ours! I wonder why that is...
