{Cupil}[Chirp, chirp?]{!reset} Sorry, Cupil, I can't put my sleeves back on right now. If you're feeling shy, maybe you can hide over there?

state.text: {Cupil}[Chirp! Chirp!]{!reset} Oh, Cupil... there's a Cham nearby? Um... is it alright if I put these down for a moment and take a look? You won't peek, will you?
I... I considered asking my friends Vyse and Aika to come to this game with me, but I wasn't sure if they'd want to... and it's a little exciting to do something like this on my own.
In ancient times, each of our six Moons supported a different civilization... I'm a Silvite, a descendant of the Silver Civilization. (Well... or that's what the Elders told me, anyway...)
I travel the skies with my friends, Vyse and Aika... We're Air Pirates, Blue Rogues, specifically. Blue Rogues steal from the rich, and use the treasure to help people in need.
Using clothes instead of money makes this game more accessible to the poor, doesn't it? Maybe they should have tried it in Valua... The rich and poor would be on equal footing...
Gambling your clothes is an interesting way to play this sort of game. I've only seen the Blue Rogues use money, or else play drinking games with loqua...
I'm familiar with combat, but my skills are more support-oriented than anything else... You might say, my job is to prevent Vyse and Aika from getting themselves killed. They can be a bit reckless...

It's interesting that we've made a game out of this. If we're interested in each other's bodies, we could always just undress straight away... but that would definitely take some of the fun and mystery out of it.

This is the only place I know of that employs the... consequences for losing... that we're using in this game. I was a little taken aback at first, but... it's the sort of thing you can't get out of your head...
The Inventory is a fascinating place. I should really tell my friend Vyse about it... He loves exploring new places, and I suspect he'd be excited to meet travelers from other worlds altogether.

case.state: Haha, this is fun... I'm curious to see what will happen next.
The rest of you are having fun, right? It's so nice to play together like this...

state.text: I have no idea what I'm doing, but if I don't do it properly, I could lose all of my clothes in front of everyone. It's sort of comical when I think about it... (If I don't think about it too hard?)
(If I don't figure out how to play this game before too long, I could end up naked and... well, facing the consequences. Er... why am I being so indirect about it in my own thoughts?)
(I wonder what it would be... like... to have to masturbate in front of everyone... No, no, I can't think about that when I don't even understand what all these little letters and numbers mean yet.)

~Marker.RemembersYourName~, I had the strangest dream last night... I was a military nurse, and Vyse and Aika were soldiers in my unit... and for some reason, Don Patch was there! Isn't that ridiculous?

case.state: Cupil's been with me ever since I was a baby... He can transform into all sorts of things, even weapons. And... he kept me company when I was alone... which was most of the time.

state.text: Until quite recently, Vyse, Aika and I fought primarily against the Valuan Empire. With advanced technology granted by the Yellow Moon, and massive iron ships, they sought to conquer the entire world.
The Blue Rogues aren't so much a group as a set of ideals that unite us. Most pirates are Black Pirates, interested only in their own gain and going after unarmed ships.

I'd go anywhere with Vyse and Aika... We have gone most places in Arcadia, for that matter. We've had many others in our crew, but Vyse, Aika and I have always stuck together, and I hope we always do.
The Silver Civilization no longer really exists... I'm its last remaining member. It once flourished on the continent of Soltis, but now, even my former home, the Great Silver Shrine, is gone...
The Silver Civilization was skilled at wielding the power of the Silver Moon, which governs life, death, and void. With its power, they were able to create new life out of nothing...

I spent my childhood in the Great Silver Shrine, which was located high in the sky, close to the Silver Moon itself. There were no plants or animals, just me, Ramirez, and the Elders... it was awfully lonely.

In addition to fighting on foot, Vyse, Aika and I are often engaged in ship battles. In that case, I'm usually in charge of manning the Magic Cannon, or casting spells to bolster the ship's capabilities.

As you... might guess, I'm not exactly the most... resilient... combatant on foot. I usually try to stay back and use my abilities to protect Vyse and Aika, or to weaken the enemy with magic and Cupil's abilities...

case.state: Cupil's favorite food is "Chams". They're tiny little pieces of Moon Stones which help him with his shapeshifting... The more he eats, the better he can help me fight.
Cupil helps to protect me in battle. I don't have a lot of muscle, so he usually transforms into a weapon and attacks for me, or helps me use special techniques. {Cupil}[Chirp!]{!reset}

Cupil is an artificial creature created by my people. Like other Silver creatures, he's a malleable being with the ability to change his form... He can even grow to great size by inflating himself with air.
Cupil was the only company I had for most of my childhood in the Shrine. He can think for himself, but by now he feels almost like a part of me... {Cupil}[Chirp!]{!reset}

state.text: I was scared at first, but now I'm really happy I left the Great Silver Shrine. I had no idea what I was missing... It seemed fine at the time, but in retrospect... I'm happier now than I ever was.

It's wonderful to explore the world outside the Great Silver Shrine... It's almost become my reason for living. There are so many new places to see, and new things to try... and I've met so many kind people...

The Elders said outsiders were fools who bickered amongst themselves, and burned in the flames that they themselves set. But, I've met so many caring people out here... So, I'm glad I didn't heed them.
Vyse is our captain... he's probably the bravest man I know. Maybe a little too brave, sometimes, but I trust him with my life. And he's always so optimistic, even in the most hopeless situations.
Aika's probably my closest friend. She's... very enthusiastic about the "treasure" aspect of piracy, but she's generous to people who deserve it. And being around her always lifts my spirits...

We used to travel with an old sailor named Drachma... He was obsessed with hunting the legendary arcwhale, Rhaknam, but he had a good heart, and he'd drop everything to help us when we really needed it.

Gilder is one of the best-known Blue Rogues in Arcadia, and we've worked with him several times. He's... a bit of a charmer, but very experienced and clever... He can always get us out of a tight spot.

For a long time, we traveled with the Prince of Valua, Enrique... Well, he's actually the emperor now. He failed to reform the Valuan Empire from within, so he decided to join us and fight against them, instead.

case.state: (There's a man here, and he can see... well, just about everything I have. With his eyes all over me, I'm far too aroused to be able to tell everyone what my hand is... I hope that's okay...)
Oh my, ~marker.RemembersYourName~, you're really getting a good look at me, aren't you...? (Wait... I'm supposed to tell everyone about my hand, aren't I? I completely forgot...)
You're really looking me up and down, aren't you, ~marker.RemembersYourName~... Well, here you go, then. It's not as though you haven't seen everything before...
Oh my, ~marker.RemembersYourName~, you're not shy about looking at them, are you...? (I should be giving hints about my hand, but with ~player.ifMale(him|her)~ eyeing me like this...)
You're not shy about looking at them, are you, ~marker.RemembersYourName~? Well... I don't see any reason to obscure your view. They're certainly nothing new to you...
(There's a man here, and he can see my breasts as clear as day. How can I catch my breath long enough to tell everyone about my hand, as the rules appear to require?)

state.text: ~Marker.RemembersYourName~, I had the strangest dream last night... Vyse was racing in a little wheeled vehicle, and his opponent was... Actually, ~amy_rose~, I think it was you, and maybe even Sonic? Isn't that odd?

~Marker.RemembersYourName~, I had the strangest dream last night... Vyse entered some sort of race in this charming little wheeled vehicle, and his opponent was a blue hedgehog! Isn't that ridiculous?

case.state: I think Aika is the only one who'd seen me naked before I started coming here. We often share a room, and I didn't really see an issue with her... seeing me... I still don't see an issue, but it does... feel different now.

I know I'm still... new to many things, but... being alone so long didn't stop me from... exploring myself... In fact, it made it quite... useful. So, if you were concerned... I won't be out of my depth if...

There wasn't a lot to do alone in the Shrine... The Elders were very distant, and my doll and Cupil could only entertain me for so long. So, it was only natural for me to... well, you know. I like exploring new things...
Vyse has almost caught me... exploring myself... several times... I wouldn't be surprised if he knew what I was doing, either. Considering how, um, polite and apologetic he's sometimes been...

I'm... fairly certain I've heard Aika occupying herself before... We often room together or near each other, and I have to wonder if she's also... ah, why am I even bringing this up? This game is getting to my head...

There was no sunlight in the Shrine... It was an... incredible feeling, lying in a sunbeam for the first time on Vyse's spare bed. And since then, I've wanted to try... outdoors, in the sun, with no one watching...

state.text: Aika seemed to be particularly mad about the idea that I might run into Vyse while he was skinny dipping and see him nude. But, what would be wrong with that? I'd quite like to see Vyse naked...
Of course, if we did visit nudist Ixa'takans, we might need to... follow the local customs... in order to show them the proper respect. I'd certainly never want to offend anyone...

I wonder why Nasreans don't have any, um... nudist traditions? Nasr also has a very hot climate, after all... I suppose it must be the humidity. In the desert, you'd probably dry out if you didn't wear anything...

case.state: I didn't bathe for quite a while after I started traveling with Vyse and Aika, because I... wasn't sure how to go about it... But, Aika noticed and, um, helped me out. That was the first time she... saw me...

state.text: You know, it's interesting... Silvites are extremely concerned with efficiency, yet we have stronger nudity taboos than many others. But, isn't it very inefficient to worry about concealing arbitrary parts of one's body?

case.state: And now I... might get to try what I mentioned before... since we're out in the sun right now, and I'm not so far from losing... Although, it wouldn't be with no one watching. Oh, my...
I've... lost these games before out in the sun, so I suppose I've sort of gotten my wish... But, it's never been with no one watching. And, now I'm quite close to losing again... Oh, my...

I suppose I've been able to try things outdoors in the sun, actually... I've attended games like that where I... lost. But, it was never with no one watching... Ah, that's quite a nice memory right now...

I think I come off as... inexperienced, but... even before the games here, I'd had many opportunities to... explore myself. It was quite lonely in the Shrine... So, losing these games is well within my, um, expertise...

state.text: My crew spends such effort just to be... modest... with our bathing, taking turns with buckets and things... If we just stripped down and bathed in the lake together, that would be much more... efficient... wouldn't it?
Vyse apparently likes skinny dipping... Aika's told him off a number of times for bathing in our lake on Crescent Isle in the middle of the night. I... don't really understand the problem, though...
I've heard that certain Ixa'takan tribes don't wear clothes at all... It makes sense, because it's so much warmer on that continent. It would be... fascinating... to visit such a culture, I think...

Being modest was very easy in the Great Silver Shrine... We could bathe in an instant using the devices there, so we'd only have to undress for a minute or so. It took me a while to... adjust to not having that after I left...

It's... a bit strange, isn't it, having to cover yourself? In general, I mean... What an odd idea, having bits of your body that you can't let anyone look at. But, this game certainly wouldn't be as... exciting without it...

I suppose it makes some sense to cover one's vulva for protection... You wouldn't want to get it dirty or infected, and it's rather sensitive to the touch. So, it makes sense that over time, a taboo would develop...

I think the taboo that makes the least sense to me is the one about breasts. Humans of all varieties have nipples and... related regions... but then, some of us are allowed to show them while others can't?
It's rather amusing... Nudity is only considered sexual because of all the taboos we have, right? Which means attempting to be modest actually gives us more options for immodest behavior...

What's also strange is the taboos that don't exist... People wear shoes to protect their feet, so they're often hidden. But, no one finds bare feet sexually exciting... Or at least, I've never heard of that...

Since I've never had a penis, I'm not sure where the taboo about having to cover it would have come from, but... I suppose it's a bit fragile, right? At least, the testicles... but I'm far from an expert on the subject...

By the way, even if it'd have less fun and mystery, I don't think I'd object to just, um... agreeing to satisfy mutual curiosity with someone. But, I doubt that will be necessary by the end of this game...

I couldn't have passed up the opportunity to try something as... exciting as this... I mean, we're in danger every day when we sail. I don't know what will happen, and so... I'd like to live every day to the fullest...

Strip poker is the only context I've encountered where someone else is naked and you're supposed to look at them... I usually avert my eyes if Aika's changing, so... this is a bit of a mental adjustment...
It's definitely been a mental adjustment, getting used to a game where you're supposed to look at others while they undress. I'm used to averting my eyes whenever Aika's changing...

You don't mind me staring, do you, ~player~? I'm afraid you're quite distracting in this state... And, it's not as though I haven't seen you this way before, so... neither of us has anything to be ashamed of...

~Twisted_fate~, I think I'm willing to make this wager, under two conditions. One, you aren't allowed to use anything but your hands and mouth if you defeat me, and two... if I win, you have to give me your hat.

case.state: Just in case it gets missed somehow, if Sakura's head has come off this game and seenHeadOff is blank, puts "Sakura" into it.
Just in case it gets missed somehow, if Saki's head has come off this game and seenHeadOff is blank, puts "Saki" into it.
Just in case it gets missed somehow, if Ms. Fortune's head has come off this game and seenHeadOff is blank, puts "Ms. Fortune" into it.

state.text: W-what?! You can't be serious, Chara...! Why would you do something like that?!

case.state: So, um... just out of curiosity, Alter Ego, is Chihiro... watching us through some other viewscreen...?
Finally managed to earn yourself some skin, have you, "~player~"? Mmm... You'll have to forgive me if I'm not inclined to bow and curtsey in your rather undressed presence...
So you've managed to earn a look at my arms, "~player~"... Well, you'll have to forgive my lack of deference. Covered or not, I know you're on your last legs already...
Ah... well... This is it, I guess. I knew this was coming, but... it's different when it's actually happening...
Ah... well... This is it, I guess. I knew it was coming, and I'm not even the first, but... it's different when it's actually happening to me...
~Mercy~, it's a traditional Silvite pattern, but honestly, other than that... I'm not sure. I... never learned much about my own people, and... I'm not sure if I can trust the things I was told.
Well... it was certainly popular among Silvites like myself, ~kaz~. But among the Air Pirates I typically spend time with nowadays, it definitely stands out somewhat...

You're at a bit of a disadvantage this game, aren't you, ~player~? Well, I guess that's not a problem, but it'll be difficult for me to believe in this fantasy if you don't actually... um, dominate...
This is awfully close, isn't it, ~player~? Well, you're ahead of me now, so I suppose you'll preserve your dominance for the time being...
I have to say, ~player~, it's hard to feel appropriately subservient, given that we're so evenly matched at the moment... Or do you have more small items I hadn't noticed?
Should I really continue going along with this when we're neck in neck, even at this point? Mmm... I'll let it slide for the moment, ~player~.
Oh, you've done it at last. I was afraid you weren't even going to get me naked this game, ~marker.RemembersYourName~... Um, "~player~", I mean to say.
Alright, "~player~", you got me this time, but... how am I supposed to believe in this fantasy if you're doing so poorly?
Well, I've lost again, but... I don't know, ~marker.RemembersYourName~. Should I be taking this seriously?
Well, you do seem to be winning every hand thus far, despite being at a disadvantage, ~player~. You may just prove worthy of that title in the end...
Well, ~marker.RemembersYourName~, at least you won't have to lose the game without even seeing my breasts. That would be quite a sad fate for a self-appointed "~player~", wouldn't it?
Ah... ~marker.RemembersYourName~, I really didn't think you'd get me naked... Are you going to turn the tables on me at last?
Oh, my... Alright, we're at this point. It's not my first time, but even so... I'm not sure I'll ever feel prepared to do this...
I see... This is it, then. No matter how many times I do this, I never quite feel prepared for it... I think that rush of excitement is what keeps me coming back to this game...

("Fine-a"? That's not how it's pronounced, but it almost sounds better that way...) Um, thank you, ~saki_zls~... I'm a Silvite, from the Great Silver Shrine. Even in my own world, these clothes are considered unusual...
I'm not surprised to hear that, ~lucina~... I often wear something more practical nowadays, but today I brought my old outfit from the Shrine. It's the traditional dress of my people, the Silvites...

I agree, ~saki_zls~... and actually, I do have a proper Air Pirate outfit nowadays. I thought it would be fun to bring my old clothes to this game, but perhaps I'll come here in my Air Pirate attire in the future...

Well, I'm glad you like my outfit, ~perona~, but I don't see a problem with wearing skimpy clothing... It's more practical in battle than this dress is. At a strip poker game, though, that's not much of a concern...

A... holy woman, Colt? Not really... these clothes are just traditional Silvite garments. I actually don't wear them as much now that I'm an Air Pirate, but I thought it would be nice to bring them to this game.

Well, that's true, and I don't usually wear it into battle these days, but... it helps that it's embedded with Moon Stones. The magical properties it bears can be quite useful, especially for casting spells...
No, I'm not a princess, ~nagisa~, and you certainly don't need to curtsey... I'm actually an Air Pirate, believe it or not, though I know I don't look much like one.
I promise, ~nagisa~, I'm really not any sort of royalty... I wouldn't even want to be, honestly. It's difficult for anyone to hold that sort of power without being corrupted by it...
It's not rude at all to ask, ~nagisa~... I'm eighteen now. Though, I spent so much of that time sitting around in the Great Silver Shrine that... Well, it feels odd to think about being that age.
No, Cupil's not going anywhere, ~nagisa~... I could count him as an accessory---{Cupil}[Chirp?]{!reset}---but I've already "stripped" him off my arm, and... it seems unfair to stall any longer...
No hope? That's a rather dismal way of putting it... Please, don't worry, ~nagisa~. I've been in far more difficult situations than this... Not that it's not still embarrassing, of course...

A... nun, ~jessie~? I don't know what that is, so I imagine I'm not one... This is traditional Silvite dress, and while I usually wear my Air Pirate clothes nowadays, I decided to bring this here for old times' sake...
Well, this won't be very arousing, so... does anyone want to tell me about themselves? Some of you attend school, correct? I've never been to a formal institution of learning, so I'm curious...
So, where is your hometown, ~nagisa~? Perhaps my crew and I could pay you a visit...
Oh... I'm sorry, everyone, I, um... I'm still a little inexperienced at being the center of attention. I'm not usually the one who's expected to speak up among my crew, so...
Oh, finally. Thank the Moons... ah... Maybe it's a bit odd to be relieved, but... honestly, I think I'll be more comfortable with these off at this point...
Ah... well, ~player~, I don't seem to be able to defend myself against you, do I? This is my last small strip left, and so... perhaps I should resign myself to the inevitable...
Oh, Moons... Such a dominating performance, ~player~. I... suppose it's time at last for me to show you what has really been yours from the start...
Alright, then, ~player~... I have nowhere left to hide. It's time for me to unveil myself to you fully...

state.text: Oh, um... I didn't mean that to be insulting, Hilda... I agree that my strategy is probably lacking, as I'm still very inexperienced at this game...

case.state: "Space"... That's right, you mean the area where the Moons orbit. Jura, Silvite ships can traverse space, but I'm the only Silvite remaining, and I don't know how to create such a ship... only fix the one I have.
Not very often, ~yshtola~... Only at these games, anyway. There is a sort of thrill to it, though... and it's certainly safer than my more typical adventuring.

You might be surprised, ~yshtola~... I certainly didn't participate in this sort of adventure until recently, but thanks to ~marker.RemembersYourName~ and ~player.ifMale(his|her)~, um, interest... I've done this quite a few times.

state.text: My... hair is saying that? Well... the bits in front do slip over my face and get in the way sometimes... Maybe I could tie them back?

Ah... not really, ~mari~... I've never done anything like this before. But I've risked my life on countless occasions... This doesn't seem so frightening, compared to that. Or, so I've been telling myself...
Well, I've been to these games before, ~mari~... Though, I wouldn't say I'm "comfortable". I'm here partly because it allows me to be uncomfortable safely... There's sort of a thrill to it...

Ah... well, thank you, ~mari~... I don't know if I'm really as "comfortable" as you say, but I've always learned best on my feet... And I've certainly faced scarier things, with less... appeal... in the past...

Well... thank you, ~mari~... I have come to games like this in the past, so I suppose I've gotten used to it. Though, if I were completely used to it... I'm not sure it'd have the same thrill anymore...

I think I'm less unfazed than I look, ~mari~, but also... I'm tired of being sheltered. I wasted so much time sitting in the Great Silver Shrine, doing what the Elders wanted... I want to live for myself, you know?

Ah... well, it's only natural to be, um... interested, right, ~mari~? And, it's only recently that I've been able to choose for myself whether to be "naughty" or not... or to choose anything for myself, really...

Oh, my... Well, ~mari~, I'm... just glad to be able to decide to be "sexy" or not, I suppose. I didn't choose to be sheltered... or, really, anything about my life before I left the Great Silver Shrine...
Ah... well, yes, ~mari~, I suppose so. I've been very close with Vyse for a while, but we've never really... Well, I don't know if he's not interested, or if he's just too much of a gentleman...
Oh, my... Well, ~mari~, I certainly wouldn't mind doing that for Vyse. We've become very close, but I don't know if he's not interested, or... just not as forward as I'd like him to be...

Ah... well, I guess it's something like that, ~mari~... I've never really had a chance to explore anything sexual in the past, and... I'd like to know what I even want from Vyse. If he's interested, anyway...
Well, ~mari~... it's like when I left the Great Silver Shrine to gather the Moon Crystals. I just... started doing it, and learned as I went. And those were some of the best days of my life, so...
Ah... I suppose so, ~mari~. But, jumping in head first has always worked for me in the past... and I don't want to waste any more time waiting. I'm confident that I can handle whatever's coming...

Ah... well, ~mari~, I have some experience, but... I suppose it is a little bold. But, that's what's always worked for me in the past... Just jumping in and doing things, not sitting around and waiting...

Ah... well... I hope that's true, ~mari~... I'd certainly like to be able to... please someone I love, and I've found I learn best by doing. Er... but, that isn't a suggestion for anything... additional...
Ah... if I'm honest, ~mari~, I suppose there are two "special someones"... I've been interested in Vyse for some time, but... I've come to realize I might feel that way about Aika, as well...
Oh, my... Well, I certainly wouldn't object to doing that for Vyse. Or Aika, if I'm honest... but she's seen me undress many times before. I hadn't really thought much of it in the past, though...
Ah... no, not typically, ~yshtola~. I don't think anyone but Aika has ever seen me undress before... In childhood, I was taught to keep my body well covered, so...

state.text: Um... no, I don't have any idea what those are either, ~estelle~... That book certainly has some facts in it that are... quite strange to me...

Ah... well, perhaps it's not as obvious with me, but... I definitely wouldn't say I'm not affected, ~estelle~... I've never done anything like this before, and... it's quite a new experience for me...
That's... an overstatement, ~estelle~, but it does help that I've done this before. And ~player~'s been at all of my games, so... Well, it's easier to do it with someone you already know.

Oh...! Um... well, it's not rude, no... but, I'm not completely sure how to answer. I... well, I'm a Silvite, so I'm as human as the rest of my people were... But, I'm actually not sure how human that is...

Oh? No, Y'shtola, this tattoo marks those who descend from the Silver Civilization... As far as I know, it has no unusual properties, though I don't claim to fully understand my heritage.
Hilda, I can do magic, but I don't know if I'm a "priestess", exactly? I do revere the six Moons of my world, but I don't think I'm familiar with this "Goddess" you mentioned...
Oh, it's my turn to strip? I'm sorry, I was distracted... (Why is Sucrose looking at me so intently?)
A... Vision, Sucrose? I'm not quite sure what you mean by that... Is that a form of magic? I am quite experienced in channeling the energies of the six Moons, but...

Oh... well, it's alright with me if you ask, Sucrose, but... I'm not sure what to tell you. I'm an ordinary Silvite, as far as I know, but... I'm not entirely certain whether we're "fully human" or not...
Really, Sucrose? Moons, that was fast... how did you determine that?

Oh, none taken, Yuri... It's not a club, I'm an actual Air Pirate, but I don't seem that way to anyone back home, either. I've only been one for a year, after all... I spent most of my life in the Great Silver Shrine.
Oh, there's no need to apologize, ~mercy~... I hear that all the time, even from other Air Pirates. I did only become a pirate last year, after all...

Well, that's not far from the truth, Y'shtola... They're not related to me by blood, but I don't have any living relatives that I know of, and... after all the time we've spent together, we've become very close...

It depends, ~mercy~... A lot of it is just traveling from place to place, fending off monsters that attack our ship. But battles with Black Pirates can be much more interesting... and dangerous, of course.

~Mercy~, it's often fairly unglamorous, sailing from place to place and fending off attacks from hostile sky creatures as we go. It's more interesting if we're searching for treasure, exploring an ancient ruin or the like.

It's not always that exciting, ~mercy~, since we spend so much time going from place to place and fighting off wild beasts. But it's worth it if we discover something new in the sky---especially if it's valuable to someone.
I'm... lively, ~hu_tao~? I don't think I've been described that way many times before... But, thank you, I think...

Well, um... Not that I'm not interested in death, ~hu_tao~, but sex was more what I came here for... But I was alone in the Great Silver Shrine for much of my life, so I may not have much to contribute.

Well, I'm not sure what you meant by that last part, ~noire~, but as Blue Rogues, we avoid the more ruthless brand of piracy. We only raid ships that are armed and dangerous... usually other pirates, these days.

Becoming an Air Pirate has made me feel more alive than ever, ~hu_tao~. Sailing the skies, seeing the world, fighting against oppression, liberating treasure from those who don't deserve it... It's all quite exciting.

Ah, well... ~hu_tao~, I've only had a year outside the Shrine, and... the Elders didn't want me to have any involvement with outsiders. Let alone something sexual... Though, I became a pirate anyway, I guess...
Oh...? Um... ~tomoko~, correct? You don't have to be nervous... I realize it doesn't look that way, but I'm still a bit nervous about reaching out to others myself...
Ah, you'd be correct in guessing that, ~yshtola~... Don't worry, I have no regrets. This is, um... well within the realm of my expectations for the... outcome of this game, so...
Well... I'm not sure how I feel about appearing "regal", ~heris~, but... I'm here to explore sexual behavior. I.. haven't been able to do that for most of my life, since I was very isolated...
To be honest, ~yuno_uno~, I tend to spend my free time napping, but... Other pirates do play various card games, often with drinks involved. But I've never seen any that involve undressing...

Well, that... certainly sounds nice, ~rouge~... But, I haven't been that... assertive yet. Vyse and I are close, but he's always such a gentleman... So it falls to me to make a move, and... I'm not quite sure how.

Well, ~rouge~... I can't deny I'd want that, but... I still don't have any idea what I'm doing. I didn't even realize I was attracted to Aika before I started coming here... She's always been a close friend, but...
Mmm... I've definitely been thinking about that, ~meia~. I guess that's one of the reasons I came here, to... um... build familiarity with this sort of experience...

Ah... well, ~komisan~... Vyse has been so good to me the whole time I've known him, and I think he's interested in me... but, he still hasn't done anything, and I haven't been sure how to make a move myself.
Mmm... Honestly, ~komisan~, I'm still trying to figure out my feelings about Aika. I didn't even think I was... interested in women... before these games, but now I can't help but wonder...

I can't deny that, ~meia~... I've been coming here partly for the... um, practice... I've had my eye on some of my crewmates for a while, but... well, making the first move is difficult for me, I suppose.

state.text: Oh, my... Well, Zoe... I do think I'd like to find a way to, um, continue that bloodline... But, while I might be interested in "mating" in the future, for now, my goal is just to explore my own sexuality...

case.state: Oh. Cupil's not hard to take care of, Zoe. For the most part, I just have to feed him enough Chams to grow properly... Oh, and Cupil is an artificial creature who travels with me, for those of you who haven't met him...

Oh, yes, all that and more, ~mari~. It was particularly dangerous while the Valuan Empire was around... Thanks to their strict anti-piracy laws, they were even more of a threat to us than the rest of the world.

Yes, and those are only some of the dangers, ~mari~. Monsters often attack sailors... The arcwhale Rhaknam even brought his own fog and storm clouds with him, so he qualified as a natural hazard as well.
Oh, Captain Drachma was definitely that sort, ~mari~... He was always very gruff, and apparently he really gave Vyse and Aika a hard time when they met him, but he was really a kindhearted man.

Nowadays, it mostly means Black Pirates, ~mari~. That's what we call the majority of pirates, who will attack and rob anyone and have no code of honor. The Sailor's Guild often puts out bounties for them...

Oh, certainly, ~mari~... For instance, we've fought many dangerous Black Pirates for the bounty on their heads, or just because they decided to attack us... and some of them are frighteningly skilled.

Well, it usually means Black Pirates nowadays, ~mari~, but we often went against the Valuan Empire in the past... which was far more dangerous, considering how well armed and trained their ships were.

Oh, my... Have I mentioned Cupil to you before, Zoe? How do you know about him? Um... but he's not too difficult to take care of... For the most part, I just have to feed him enough Chams to grow properly.

state.text: Oh, my... Well, Zoe... it is true that I'd rather the Silver bloodline didn't die out... But, I'm still figuring out what I want to do, sexually speaking. I'm... not really at the point where I'm attempting to "mate" yet...

case.state: Actually, ~estelle~, the Elders were the ones who sent me out. I was the only one left who'd be able to gather the Moon Crystals before the Valuan Empire could use them to conquer the world...
Well... yes, ~estelle~. The Moon Crystals were responsible for a terrible war that brought the ancient world to ruin... They were so powerful, I doubt any human could truly be trusted with them.

state.text: Oh, my... Well, Emi, I'll do my best to attend, but I doubt I can give you much of a challenge...
Oh... yes, apparently so, Supernova. I mean, when the fate of the entire world depends on it, there's not much choice. Still... I wish I could have found a way to make him see reason...

case.state: That's right, ~mari~... Specifically, I'm a Blue Rogue. We attack other ships and steal their cargo, but we only do so if they're armed and a menace to others...

state.text: Well... I don't think we are, ~takatoshi~? I'm not sure how the Inventory interacts with other worlds, but I have gotten the impression that time and memory are affected in unusual ways here...

case.state: Oh, indeed, ~mari~. Gilder certainly qualifies as a "dashing rogue"... He just sails around in his ship looking for a good time, but he's actually very skilled and has helped us a great deal in the past.

Yes, ~mari~... We've often run into Domingo, the famed treasure hunter and explorer. He typically competes with us for credit on new discoveries, though he joined our crew for quite some time, as well.
~Mari~, our crew has been pretty evenly split in the past, and Vyse is actually outnumbered by Aika and me right now... and even Kirala, though she typically stays home at Crescent Isle nowadays.
That's just about exactly what ours looks like, ~mari~. Well... our current ship, anyway. We sailed in the Delphinus for quite a while, and that was a Valuan prototype, so it was quite different.

Oh, Cupil's not difficult to take care of, Zoe. I just have to make sure he gets enough Chams so that he can grow properly... {Cupil}[Chirp! Chirp!]{!reset} No, Cupil, I don't have any Chams on me now...
Well... the nonfiction I've enjoyed the most has been about large-scale historical developments. It would be fascinating to read about an entirely new, imaginary world, with its own history...

Yes, they are, ~yuri~... In fact, many of us revere the six Moons themselves, since Moon Stones fall from them. In addition to providing fuel, each has an element associated with it, and can be used to work magic...
~Barbara~, I'm not sure what a "cleric" is, but I do revere the Moons, if that's what you mean... Most of us on Arcadia pray to all six of them, although the Silver Moon is most important to me.
Perhaps, ~barbara~, depending on what a "cleric" is... Where I'm from, we pray to all six Moons, as I did earlier. But it's common to favor one of them, which for me would be the Silver Moon...
Well, as far as I know, ~meia~, only Silvite ships can function above the atmosphere anyway... and I don't know of any of those that are armed or able to carry more than a handful of people...

That's putting it mildly, ~meia~... The Shrine was located above Arcadia near the Silver Moon, and it was just me and the Elders who lived there. They said there was no point in having more of us than was necessary...

~Leonie~, I'm not entirely sure what a "bishop" is, but I do revere the six Moons of my world. Through the Moon Stones that fall from them, they grant us potent magic and enable us to create devices such as airships.
Well, Miko, I am somewhat... inexperienced... in matters relating to sexual intimacy. This game seemed an opportunity to, um, explore that... and potentially rather exciting, too.
That's right, ~takatoshi~... I spend most of my time sailing the skies with my friends, Vyse and Aika. Do you have sailing experience as well?

I'm actually an Air Pirate, ~critical_darling~... We attack armed ships and steal their cargo, though only if they're a menace to ordinary people. We use the gold to support ourselves, as well as people in need.
~Nami~, we've been nearly everywhere on Arcadia, even Deep Sky and the lost continent of Soltis... as well as crossing South Ocean to get to Ixa'taka, and the Dark Rift to reach Yafutoma.
Er... I see... That's a bit formal, though. I'm actually thinking about someone who's already a close friend of mine, and we live on the same island and travel on the same ship...
Currently, I'm traveling with my friends Vyse and Aika. After they helped me complete my mission to stop the Valuan Empire, we decided to continue sailing together, and now we sail the skies freely.

Currently, I'm traveling with my friends Vyse and Aika. After they helped me complete my mission to gather the Moon Crystals, we decided to continue sailing together, and now we sail the skies freely.

Well, I suppose you could say it's our livelihood, ~takatoshi~... We support ourselves by stealing from Black Pirates, or hunting for treasure and new discoveries that the Sailor's Guild will pay us for.

Oh... well, some are ruffians, especially the Black Pirates. But, Vyse and Aika certainly don't fit that description... They've done everything they can to help me feel comfortable in the world outside the Shrine.

That depends on what you mean by "valuable", ~nami~. In Deep Sky, we found a material called Velorium that Ryu-kan forged into a blade of incredible power... That was certainly valuable when we fought Galcian.

That depends... There are many types of value, ~nami~. Daccat's Treasure turned out to be only a single gold piece, but that adventure reunited Aika and me with Vyse... That was more valuable than gold to me.
~Nami~, if you mean monetary value, perhaps the Orb of Serenity? We found it deep within the lost continent of Soltis, after the Armada temporarily raised it out of Deep Sky.

Cynthia, I'm a Silvite, from the Silver Civilization. I'd be happy to tell you a bit about my people, although there's much that I don't know myself... Is there anything in particular you want to know?

~Lucina~, I'm happier than I've ever been now that I'm traveling with Vyse and Aika. My life in the Great Silver Shrine was certainly... peaceful, but there wasn't much to do... and it was a bit lonely.
Well, that doesn't surprise me, Fate, since I'm not like most of the pirates in Arcadia either... I only became a pirate last year, after Vyse and Aika rescued me from the Valuan Armada.

Yes, that doesn't surprise me, ~komisan~... I only became an Air Pirate last year, after all. I was saved from the Valuan Armada by Air Pirates, and we became such close friends that I ended up joining them...

It really is nice, ~komisan~... I don't know how I would have gotten through my childhood without him, honestly. I didn't really think anything of it at the time, but, in retrospect... I was always so lonely.
It was quite dramatic, actually, Y'shtola... I was captured by the Valuan Empire, but a band of Air Pirates showed up to attack the Valuan ship, and they were kind enough to rescue me...
Oh, my... I can just imagine Aika's expression if someone called her a "loose and bawdy woman"... but, I certainly find them charming. Vyse and Aika are much more outgoing than I am, though...

Well... no, not so far, ~saki_zls~... Um, unless you count the time Aika and I woke up in bed together on Clara's ship. But, that was only because Clara had just rescued us after our lifeboats were shot down...

Ah... I won't give up yet, Miko, not while I have even a small chance... but, if it was acceptable to both of them... Well, I've never wanted to lead. I prefer it when Vyse, um, takes charge, as our captain...
Oh, thank you, Lux... I'm actually surprised I've been able to keep it this way without the devices we had in the Great Silver Shrine. I think my hair just holds its shape unusually well...

Let's see... The Silver Civilization was located under the Silver Moon, which governs both life and death. Silvites didn't fear death, as it was simply a return to the void from which all things emerged...
Um... I don't have much of a chance to, ~monika~. Books are a bit difficult to come by where I'm from... It's a pity, because I'm sure I could learn much more about the world if I could read more.

I'd be happy to, ~nami~... I was captured by the Valuan Empire so that I could help them obtain the Moon Crystals. But Air Pirates raided the Valuan ship and rescued me, and I ended up a member of their crew...
Let me see, ~nami~... Well, I'm certainly quieter than Vyse and Aika. I also have a lot of knowledge of the ancient world, which is useful if we're exploring ruins or hunting legendary relics...
Hmmm... I suppose I do have keep others "in check" sometimes, ~nami~. Vyse is sometimes slow to react in the heat of things, so he relies on me to calmly assess the situation and keep us moving...

~Perona~, I wouldn't want to vacation there, but the Dark Rift is certainly scary. Inside the vortex of black winds, we found islands that seemed to be breathing, strange glowing bulbs, ancient monsters...

~Perona~, I suppose you could call Valua "scary", though it's not so dangerous without Empress Teodora in charge. But it's always dark there, thanks to the electrical storms created by the Yellow Moon...

~Perona~, maybe the ruins of Glacia qualify? It's a beautiful city built under the Lands of Ice... and it's a complete mystery what happened to the people who lived there in ancient times, which is a bit scary.

Yes, ~takatoshi~, the Black Pirates are dangerous rogues who attack and rob unarmed merchant ships, and we often fight them nowadays. But in the past, the Valuan Empire has been much more of a threat...

state.text: Well, it was relatively recently that I became an Air Pirate, Zoe... Vyse and Aika were born into an Air Pirate family, so it's not so new to them. In fact, they were actually born on an island called "Pirate Isle"...

case.state: I only know the basics, ~meia~... Most ships fly using sails to steer and remain stable, and engines fueled by Moon Stones for power and buoyancy. Even small craft like lifeboats run on Moon Stone fuel...

Yes, it was definitely unusual, ~takatoshi~... I grew up alone in the Shrine, with only the Elders for company after Ramirez left. And only we could reach the Shrine, since it was so high in the sky...
Hmmm... well, Cupil's not representative of the technology of our era, ~meia~. He's a Silver animal, created by my people using long-forgotten Silvite techniques...

I'm not sure, ~reimu~, but... I suppose I was once a "shrine maiden" in the literal sense... For most of my life, I lived in the Great Silver Shrine with no contact with the outside world. Does that qualify?

Well, sort of, ~kumatora~... Many of us on Arcadia revere the six Moons, because of the Moon Stones they send to us. Without Moon Stones, we couldn't work magic or fly our ships... So, there's much to be grateful for.
Well, I'm quite skilled with magic, for one thing. If we get into a battle---which happens quite a bit---the others can rely on me to heal and protect them...
I suppose one thing is, I learned a lot about ancient history as a child. If we're looking for ancient ruins or hunting lost treasures, that knowledge can come in quite handy...

U-Um... Oh, my. Well, Saki, I'm still trying to figure that out, to be honest. But I assume it would start with having a... discussion... I haven't said anything to Vyse about it, and I'm not sure whether Aika is even...

Um... not really, ~syrenne~? Not the way you'd normally define it, anyway. I suppose my people certainly felt that we ought to be in charge of the world, but... I'd never be willing to do something like that myself.

Is it that obvious, ~rouge~? It's true, I'm still quite inexperienced at this... but, I'm really enjoying it so far. I have friends who truly care about me, and we can go wherever the wind takes us...
Oh, um... yes, ~aaravi~. That's my primary role on my crew... But, I don't plan to leave anytime soon. We might be able to assist you as a group, but Vyse, Aika, and I have agreed to stay together...

~Rouge~, it varies quite a bit, but often treasures from the old world are hidden in ancient ruins... usually guarded by monsters. We generally enter the ruins to explore them and find whatever's hidden inside...

Er... what exactly do you know about my people, ~rouge~? I... I'm not entirely sure what the Elders did to create me, but I don't think I'm... that different from an ordinary human, apart from the Moon Cry---um...

I don't think I have my own bounty, though Vyse has certainly been on wanted posters, ~nami~... But, the Valuan Empire isn't in a position to enforce its anti-piracy laws right now, so it's more of a status symbol nowadays.
Um... well, I'm happy that I come off that way to you, ~estelle~... But, actually, I've read very few books in my lifetime...
You really don't need to, ~estelle~... um... Though, that does sound quite nice, if it's really not any trouble... But, I promise I'm managing just fine as things stand, so...
Oh... do you think so, ~yusuke~? I haven't thought a great deal about myself in that light, but I'm pleased that you feel that way... What would such work consist of?

It was, well... I have so many feelings about it, I'm not sure what to say. I was terrified at first, but the longer I was gone, the more hollow my existence there came to feel... and yet, sometimes I still miss it.
I'm not... completely certain, ~cynthia~, but... I believe the Elders used Silver magic and advanced technology to replace or augment parts of their body, so as to improve their efficiency.
No, I'm actually an Air Pirate, ~kyou~... Though, I realize I don't look much like one. But, I was raised in seclusion as a Silvite, which perhaps is responsible for the effect you've mentioned...

Ah, well... perhaps it's something like that, ~jessie~... Everyone I know seems very reluctant to discuss sex with me, but it's a subject I know little about apart from the basics, so it's somewhat frustrating...
Um... ~saki~... is there something wrong? I didn't say anything that upset you, did I...? I'm still not very experienced with... well, making conversation, so...
Cupil's role is to protect and support me in battle, ~cynthia~. He can transform into a variety of weapons and attack on his own, as well as assist me in performing magical techniques.
Religious? Well, I suppose you could say that, ~pit~... Like most people where I come from, I do revere the six Moons---particularly the Silver Moon, since I'm a Silvite. Why do you ask?
Ah... There's no escape for me, is there, ~marker.RemembersYourName~? I don't have a chance against your... desires...
Oh... ~Marker.RemembersYourName~, there's no use in resisting you, I see...
Oh, my... That wasn't enough? I guess there's no saving myself from you, ~marker.RemembersYourName~...
Moons, I just can't escape you, can I, ~marker.RemembersYourName~?
My power comes from the Moons, ~aaravi~. Anyone can learn magic once they've had their weapons attuned to a Moon Stone for long enough... a Green or Silver one, for healing magic.

state.text: Oh, yes, that's correct, ~larachel~... My companions and I travel all over Arcadia in our ship, searching for treasure and new discoveries. I'm glad to have met a kindred spirit here...
I think I'd like that, ~larachel~. We seem to have similar goals, and I certainly see little reason for us to be enemies...
Ah... that sounds rather ominous, ~larachel~. Is there a reason we can't be friends now? This is only a friendly strip poker game, after all...
You're correct, ~larachel~, I'm quite skilled in magic... I'd be happy to compare our abilities later on. It's been a while since I really tested them...

Well, so far as healing, I typically use Green magic, like Sacrum or Sacrulen... or Silver magic like Riselem, to revive the recently fallen. Though, honestly, magic stored in items is often more effective for healing...
And what exactly is that supposed to mean, ~larachel~? We're just playing strip poker, so regardless of your feelings about pirates, why don't we set that aside for the moment...

case.state: Well, I'm first, but that seems only fair, since I believe I'm wearing more than anyone else...
Oh my... It's already my turn, and I don't think I brought as many layers as the rest of you...

state.text: Moons, really? But I had... um... well, whatever this hand is called... I thought it was quite good, anyway...
Moons, really? But I had... um... this is called "~self.hand~", right? That's supposed to be quite good...

case.state: Mmm... A fine start, ~player~. I'm sure you'll have me at your mercy in no time... But, for now...
Just as I would have expected, your performance in this game is quite... commanding so far, ~player~...
Alright, ~player~, here I go... Just don't fall behind me, alright? It would be awfully silly if you lost to me after naming yourself that...

state.text: Oh... I lost? I thought this hand was reasonably good...
Oh, my... The rest of you had better hands this round than I was expecting...
Oh, my... You had a really good hand this round, ~opp~...

case.state: Oh... so I get to go first? I'm... not entirely sure what counts as a piece of clothing, though...
Well, if I'm first, I'll go ahead and remove something. Er... let me just think about the options. (Do I know what the options are?)
Oh... is it me? I'm so sorry, I wasn't paying attention... I forgot this could happen to me as well.
Oh, did I lose this one? That only seems fair... I'm doing quite well, after all.
Moons, it's about time, isn't it? I was starting to feel a little bad for the rest of you...
Oh, it's me... I suppose my lucky streak is over, then... I actually don't have much left at this point... I didn't even know what a bra was before I met Aika, so...
Ah... so it's me at last. But it is only fair that I show you something too, since you've all been so... generous... in showing me your bodies...
Well... I certainly didn't come here with the intention of remaining... modest... and it only seems fair to catch up with you a little bit...
I see, so it's my turn... Of course, I'll be happy to remove something.
Haha, oh, it's my turn. This is exciting...
Oh, it's me. I'm sorry if I don't have anything interesting to say... I'm not really used to being the center of attention...
Well, let's see... What should I remove next?
Um... sorry... I'm not used to everyone looking at me at once like this. Vyse and Aika usually do all the talking for me, unless they need me to tell them about Moon Crystals or something...
Oh my... it's me again... I actually don't have much left at this point... I didn't even know what a bra was before I met Aika, so I'm certainly not wearing one.
I see... well... given that I wasn't wearing anything under my dress... I imagine it won't surprise you that I don't have anything on under my leggings, either...
Ah... well... I certainly didn't come here with the intention of remaining... modest...
Oh, it's me already? I'm... not entirely sure what counts as a piece of clothing, but I'll do my best...
Oh, it's me already? I don't know if I've forgotten how to play or I'm just unlucky...
Again already? Oh my...
Um, you're all looking at me again... I'm sorry, I haven't really come up with a substantive comment yet...
Well, I suppose this is probably the way you all wanted this game to go anyway, isn't it...?
Oh... perhaps this means that my strategy isn't working... I actually don't have much left at this point... I didn't even know what a bra was before I met Aika, so...
Well... given that I wasn't wearing anything under my dress... I imagine it won't surprise you that I don't have anything on under my leggings, either... and so, I think I'll be the first to...
Well... this is what you wanted when you invited me to this game, isn't it, ~player~? You can be honest...
You were hoping you'd have me at your mercy like this when you invited me to play again, weren't you, ~player~? It's alright... I don't mind.
Oh, my... this is all happening so fast, but... I certainly didn't come here with the intention of remaining... modest...

state.text: ~Player~... and you're working with her?? Then, you must also be complicit in this...

case.state: Yes... they do seem to be getting along very well. It reminds me of when I met Vyse and Aika... We were comfortable together so quickly, and it was such a pleasant feeling...
Well, yes... Wearing a bra under this would be quite difficult, Senko, which is why, um...

Um... ~perona~, are you talking about ~nami~? I really don't see any issue with what she's wearing... Honestly, it's not terribly different from my Air Pirate outfit, though I suppose that has a jacket as well...

Well, honestly, that doesn't sound so different from my Air Pirate outfit... but I suppose it's not really a bikini top, there's a jacket over it, at least. But, I'm not really sure I see the problem either way...
Yes... and that's certainly easy for me to do here. I don't think anyone but Aika has ever seen me naked before today...
Yes... and it's not hard to achieve that at these games. When I first came here, no one but Aika had ever seen me undressing, and... I can't say I've really gotten used to it, exactly...
Yes, I suppose so... This is something so new for us both. It's a wonderful... journey that we're taking together...
Yes, I suppose so... I hope this will be... helpful to him, in broadening his horizons... It's lovely to have new experiences...
Aika is probably my closest friend... She grew up with Vyse, and I met them both when they rescued me from the Valuans. She's cheerful and fun to be around, and she loves hunting for treasure...

state.text: Aika is Vyse's childhood friend... She's cheerful and fun to be around, and she really loves treasure. She's probably my dearest friend... {Cupil}[Chirp?]{!reset} Okay, except for you, Cupil...

I... hmm. That's actually starting to make a disturbing amount of sense... The things we do here do feel a little... predictable? And, when you combine that with some of the things ~monika~'s been saying...

case.state: Yes, my feelings about the Silvites are... complicated, I suppose, but I never want to forget my connection to them. That's why I've kept these clothes, even after becoming an Air Pirate...
Alright... I'll do it slowly, but I don't want to make anyone wait too long. Are you ready...?
Yes, I think... sometimes your heart will never really be ready. You just have to... press on anyway, and trust that you'll make it to the other side...

No, don't worry! I'm a Blue Rogue, and Blue Rogues don't attack anyone who doesn't deserve it. Unless you start harming innocent people or robbing unarmed merchant ships, you have nothing to fear from me...

Perhaps most do, but when I was young, the Elders taught me how the ancient royal families and other rulers caused endless strife with their pointless wars, and... I just never wanted to be part of that.

Yes, you're right, and that's the attitude I try to have about it. But, sometimes I feel like I'm trying to squeeze in as many new experiences as I can, just to make up for---ah... Hold on a moment...

{Cupil}[Chirp?]{!reset} Oh, Cupil needs to do that least of all... He's been with me ever since I was a little girl, and I dress and bathe in front of him all the time... Though, really, it's fine for anyone to look...
But, I don't want to be saved... You can't be respected as an Air Pirate if you keep running from battles. And, even then... I wouldn't want to let go of this feeling, the way my heart is racing...
I'm not surprised you haven't heard of it... The Great Silver Shrine was located far above the clouds, close to the Silver Moon itself. We certainly did... "live life our own way"... up there.
Well, I'm... not exactly sure I have a mother, so not really, ~nagisa~... And, I suppose I had all the formal schooling I've had at home, but I've found that I learn better by experience.
Oh, don't worry, it's not very many people at present... It's mostly me, Vyse, and Aika these days. We don't have a huge crew anymore, the way we did when we were flying in the Delphinus...

state.text: Honestly, I think being called on is harder for me than the undressing, ~nagisa~, at least while I'm still removing small items---{Cupil}[Chirp?]{!reset} Oh? Did you want to be a small item, too, Cupil?

case.state: I wouldn't say it doesn't get easier, ~nagisa~... I think I'm getting used to it, little by little. But, it's never stopped feeling like... something I shouldn't be doing... and I sort of like that feeling, to be honest...

That probably depends on the person, ~nagisa~. For me, though... it's definitely in a good way. It has the thrill of being... in danger, and vulnerable to others... but without the dire consequences...
Um... no, they're not too tight, ~nagisa~. They're very comfortable and flexible, but... well, they've gotten a bit damp, so...
Yes, I'll admit my ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(aren't|isn't)~ terribly exciting... But it's still early in the game, so I ought to build a bit of suspense, right?
Yes, I suppose my ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(aren't|isn't)~ all that exciting, especially at this point in the game... I promise I don't have as much on as it appears, though.

Oh? I can't say I was thinking any such thing, not until now... Besides, where I'm from, magic is commonplace enough that I wouldn't be surprised to see anyone casting it, regardless of how they were dressed.

Is that so? That's interesting... I honestly hadn't thought much about how it would impact other players here. But, if my attire is enticing... given the nature of the game, I suppose I don't mind that.
Yes, ~ayano~, this is traditional Silvite wear... It's not what I typically wear nowadays, but it has sentimental value for me, so I thought I'd wear it to the game... Why do you ask?
That's a surprise to me as well, since you seem very confident about this game... Though, I suppose you haven't quite gotten to, ah, where I am yet...

Yes, it's an... intense experience. I'm very grateful that ~player~ introduced me to it... I suppose ~player.ifMale(he|she)~ had ~player.ifMale(his|her)~ own, um, motivations for that, but I don't think I mind...
Yes, I'm thinking about Vyse... It's true, I'd certainly be... very invested in helping Vyse enjoy himself if we spent time together... and I'm sure he would do his best to take care of me, too...
That's true... There are so many strange and interesting people here, with so many different stories to tell. And, well... being able to see so many different... bodies... is also appealing...
I think I have enough support just from your company. It's very... comforting... to meet someone as sweet and thoughtful as you for my first time here...
Um... yes, I suppose... I don't know if I'd say I've practiced for this, or even prepared... To be honest, it's the feeling of vulnerability that really draws me to this game. It's... exciting...
It's... helpful to know that others share your experiences, I suppose... It's quite... nice that we've ended up like this at the same time... in light of that...
That's a good point... I suppose I mean someone you already trust. Or, alternatively, someone who's already... um, seen what there is to see...
Yes, I've found it to be quite helpful so far, though I haven't been coming here long. But, I really enjoyed my last game here, so I hope you'll have a similarly pleasant experience...
Yes... I still have much to learn, but I'm certainly more experienced than I used to be, thanks to these games with ~marker.RemembersYourName~. And, it's been wonderful gaining that experience...
Well, I wouldn't say you're a hypocrite, but I suppose that's true... Actually, I'm not sure I've met anyone with winged armor like yours, whether a doctor or otherwise.

Yes... although Silvites aren't supposed to fear death, since it's only right and natural that we all return to the void. And... the Elders told me exposing myself was terribly dangerous, so it's oddly...
Yes, I suppose so... um... Though, I'd be lying if I said this didn't affect me at all, of course... But, the whole point is for the game to be... exciting...
Yes... especially when what they want from you turns not to be... in your best interest... or anyone's, really...
Ah... are you in a similar situation? Well... I shouldn't jump to conclusions about what you mean, but I certainly don't want anyone else to go through what I did, so...

Hmm... do you really think Vyse might be too shy? I can't imagine him lacking confidence in any situation... Then again, he's told me before that he gets scared like anyone, he simply doesn't show it...
Hmm... you might be right... When I think about it, Vyse has often followed my lead. He might be the captain, but it was my mission to gather the Moon Crystals he put his heart and soul into...
Yes, but it's important to have friends to support you as well. Without Vyse and Aika's guidance and protection, I don't know if I'd have lived long enough to do all that learning...

Oh, um... well, thank you... I can't take all the credit for that way of thinking, though. It was Vyse's unbreakable resolve in even the darkest times that inspired me to adopt that attitude as well...
Many things... Where to go, who to trust, and most of all, what to think. I've learned to question what I'm told, to be skeptical and curious... Those are things the Elders never wanted from me.

I'm still not used to... expressing myself. When I left the Shrine, I was told to keep my mission secret from everyone I met... to trust no one. But... I'm very glad that I decided to risk trusting others...
That's... true. I'm not really sure what I'm waiting for... Even if Vyse isn't interested in me that way, I don't think I'd be hurting him by confessing my feelings. Maybe I'm just afraid...
I hope so... Vyse has certainly shown attraction to women before. He's never really... flirted... with Aika and me, though? We connect on... a deeper level than that, I think... Maybe that's good...
That... sounds really nice, actually... The two of us just... feeling things out, exploring... each other... and learning what we'd like to do together...
I certainly am enjoying myself... ah... This... particular moment is a little overwhelming, I'll admit... since I'm not... wearing anything under... But in a good way, I think...

That's definitely the best part of being an Air Pirate for me... The freedom to go where you want and do what you like, as long as it doesn't hurt anyone who doesn't deserve it... Things that I'd never have thought to try...
Is that true? I hope you haven't had to go through... anything similar... You seem to me like someone in control of their own destiny, but... it can be hard to tell from outside.
You're probably right... I'm not sure what to ask for first, exactly, but... he already knows I'm not experienced. I'm sure he would be... patient with me, like he always has been...
Oh, I'd have a lot to lose if he... felt differently about me as a result... but I suppose that's not very likely. He's said he'd go anywhere with me, and... protect me, no matter what, so...
~player.ifMale(He|She)~ just seems... well, reliable, and trustworthy, and has always been kind to me... After all we've done together here, it's hard not to feel some sort of connection...
There's just something about ~player.ifMale(him|her)~ that's soothing... It helps that ~player.ifMale(he|she)~ was the one to invite me here in the first place, I suppose...
I suppose your research must keep you quite busy... I'm glad to have met someone like-minded on my first visit here. Perhaps we can join forces, and study the subject together...
Ah, I see... Yes, war can leave deep wounds. Though our conflict with the Valuan Empire is over for the moment, there are many who still mistrust all Valuans, because of their past oppression...
Sucrose, um... did you... want to ask me something?
Is that an unusual ability for you, then? Anyone can learn to do such magic with the aid of Moon Stones... but perhaps those are scarce or nonexistent in your world?

state.text: You also...? Are you saying you're not certain of the circumstances of your own---{Cupil}[Chirp!]{!reset} Cupil? You want to come out now?

case.state: Well, um, that's alright, Sucrose. Considering... the present situation, I'm... somewhat distracted myself...
Certainly not in the Shrine, since there weren't any other humans there at all... Not after I reached puberty, anyway. And... well, it didn't seem like a priority with the world in danger, so...

I primarily use magic granted by the Moons to protect and support my crew... I also have quite a bit of knowledge about our world's history, which can come in handy if we're exploring an ancient ruin.
Is that your impression? I won't deny ~player.ifMale(he's|she's)~ a bit... intriguing, but I don't know if I feel much more strongly about ~player.ifMale(him|her)~ than the others here...

state.text: Well, ~player~... since it doesn't appear as though anyone is driving that tank... I... suppose someone could be watching us remotely, but...
Well, ~player~... now that that tank has left, I suppose we... really are completely alone together. And so...

case.state: Aika did always find it a bit strange... But, I suppose I just didn't think about it very much. Before I came here, I hadn't had the opportunity to investigate the, um... undergarment choices of others, so...
Oh, um... you really don't need to, Lyralei... I'm more than happy to show everyone, regardless of how much clothing they're wearing. It's just a little embarrassing, that's all...
Oh, is that so? That's unfortunate... Air Pirate hideouts are usually in remote, secluded areas, so we end up traveling a lot even if we are busy. Um...
You really must try to play a little better, ~player~. If you end up forfeiting while I'm still clothed, I'm going to feel awfully silly calling you ~player~...
If you wanted to show me a truly dominating performance, ~player~, perhaps you should have worn more to this game... But, I suppose it'll make your victory that much more impressive when it comes?
Well... that's true enough. I think I'm a bit more... comfortable with myself... now, but nothing is really going to change unless I talk to Vyse about it directly... I'm not sure what I'm afraid of.

Well, at least it's given me some insight into... who I'm attracted to, I suppose, but... you're right, nothing is going to change for me with Vyse or Aika unless I talk to them... I don't know what I'm so frightened of.

I see what you mean, but... coming here has helped me in other ways. The Elders taught me to fear the... urges... of outsiders... But, I don't want to live that safe, lonely life they planned for me. And so...

I suppose that makes sense... Even when one of us... um... loses in this game, it's not going to be the same as... something collaborative... Though, I'm hoping it will be... pleasant in its own way...
There is... only so much I can learn from just watching others at a distance, I suppose. Not that... I'm not interested... or a bit curious about, um, trying it myself...
That's very kind of you, but... I'd rather not be intimate with anyone I don't already know well. At least... not more intimate than we're being in this game already...
That's kind of you, but... I wouldn't be comfortable just... jumping into bed with someone I didn't know. Even with ~marker.RemembersYourName~, I don't think I'm... quite ready for that yet...

Yes, we've been inseparable ever since she and Vyse rescued me from the Valuans... Knowing that she and Vyse will do everything they can to keep me safe, I'm not worried even in the most dire of circumstances.

state.text: Yes, ever since she and Vyse rescued me from the Valuans, we've been inseparable. I always feel so safe and loved around them... {Cupil}[Chirp?]{!reset} Well, I'm always around you, Cupil...

case.state: Mmm, perhaps so... But, I don't think I mind, myself. ~Marker.RemembersYourName~ has always been kind and respectful to me... ~player.ifMale(He's|She's)~ perverted, maybe, but... so am I, it seems...
There wouldn't be much to do in space, since only Silvite ships can travel through it, and I'm one of the few who has one. I've been to space, though... I spent most of my childhood there, I suppose.
"Space"...? I'm not entirely sure what that is, so I assume not... Nearly our entire world consists of open skies, so our operations take place aboard flying ships.

Well, when we met him, he started boasting about the treasures he'd found and the discoveries he was making... and he was so full of himself that Vyse immediately declared we'd have to beat him to it.

state.text: Well, he was just so boastful that Vyse couldn't stand him, and declared that we'd have to find all the discoveries before---{Cupil}[Chirp?]{!reset} Oh? You didn't like him either, Cupil?

case.state: Well, Gilder had found Vyse stranded along on a desert island. Apparently, Vyse decided to search for Daccat's legendary treasure with him, so he could use his share to buy a ship to search for Aika and me...

state.text: Well, he rescued Vyse when he was shipwrecked, and apparently they decided to search for Daccat's Treasure together. Vyse wanted to use the money to search for Aika and me---{Cupil}[Chirp?]{!reset} Yes, and you too, Cupil...

case.state: Well, in the end our friend Enrique took the Valuan throne with his wife Moegi, and with them in charge, the Empire has been much more peaceful. And busy rebuilding their capital, I suppose...

Well, after our friends Enrique and Moegi ascended the throne, the Empire has been much more peaceful, and they've been focused on rebuilding... Oh, hold on a moment. I think Cupil's getting restless...
I suppose so... but we're used to calling ourselves pirates, since that's what the Valuan Empire called us. Technically, what we do is still against their laws, but no one prosecutes us these days...

Probably, but the Valuan Empire called us pirates, so we still think of ourselves that way, I suppose. We're still technically breaking the law, but no one enforces it anymore... Ah, hold on a moment...
Kirala was one of the best architects in Yafutoma, but she joined our crew to study buildings all over the world. Now she works on our base on Crescent Isle...She's expanding our port right now.

Kirala is a Yafutoman architect who joined our crew to see buildings from all over the world. She's living at our base right now, working on expanding our port---Ah, hold on... I think Cupil's feeling cooped up...

Well, most arcwhales aren't as dangerous as Rhaknam... They're just wild animals, probably like the "whales" you mention. But Rhaknam was modified by the ancient Purple Civilization to be a weapon of war...

Rhaknam's unusually dangerous for an arcwhale, since he was modified into a weapon of war by the Purple Civilization of old. Most arcwhales are just wild animals... Ah, hold on. Cupil, what's the matter?

The Delphinus was the next generation of Valua's battleships, steel-hulled and armed with Admiral De Loco's ultimate weapon, the Moonstone Cannon. We stole it from the Valuans and used it against them...
The Delphinus was the most powerful of Valua's battleships, steel-hulled and armed with the Moonstone Cannon. After we stole it from the Valuans... Ah, one moment. Cupil wants to come out...
Well, the Delphinus was actually Prince Enrique's flagship. We used it while he was fighting with us against Valua, but it's now in his possession, since he's become the Valuan Emperor.

state.text: The Delphinus is in Valua now, since it belonged to Prince Enrique. Now that he's become the new Emperor, we're no longer traveling together... {Cupil}[Chirp!]{!reset} Yes, I miss him too, Cupil...

case.state: Well... the Valuan Armada went rogue and tried to conquer the world themselves. They laid waste to Valua and killed the Empress, so after we defeated the Armada, the Empire was crippled...

Well, the Valuan Armada turned on the Empire and destroyed the capital, even killing the Empress. After we defeated the Armada, the Empire was in shambles... Ah, I'm sorry. Cupil seems to be uneasy...

state.text: I... hmm. That's actually starting to make a disturbing amount of sense... The things we do here do feel a little... predictable? It's sort of an odd feeling...

case.state: Yes, each Moon is a different color, and has Moon Stones that grant a different form of magic. My people were particularly skilled in the magic of the Silver Moon, which governs both life and death...

They're not "out of whack", assuming I understand that expression. I don't think the Moons have much effect on the air in our oceans... The sun's heat has more impact on ocean winds, if I remember correctly.
Definitely... somewhat harrowing... But, I suppose we'll find out just how much, um... tolerance for this sort of thing I have, in just a moment...

Well, I suppose... it's important to me to... try new things, and test my boundaries. For most of my life, I was trapped in the Shrine, doing only what the Elders told me to... And so, now that I'm free of them...
Actually, some of it sounds accurate... I spent most of my life in the Great Silver Shrine. I was 17 when I first left it... But, I wasn't... provided with much reading material there...
Well, in that case... it does sound quite intriguing. I've been reading whatever I can find, but... books aren't particularly easy to find where I come from, so it's been difficult.

state.text: I didn't get anywhere myself until Vyse and Aika rescued me from the Valuans and supported me on my mission. Without their help, I... {Cupil}[Chirp?]{!reset} Yes, Cupil, you were very helpful, too...

case.state: No, that shouldn't be necessary... The threat of the Moon Crystals is over now, or so I hope. They're lost in Deep Sky, so with any luck, no one will ever again be able to misuse them...
Hopefully you can get by with healing items while you're searching. The crystals we use are often more effective than magic for healing, so perhaps that'll be enough for now...

state.text: There are many varieties... Hard-shelled Maroccas... agile, magic wielding Loopers... massive, fish-like Grouders... {Cupil}[Chirp?]{!reset} I don't think you count as a sky monster, Cupil...

Most often the former, but if you can find the right buyer for the latter... We were able to get quite a large sum from the Sailor's Guild for a single, antique coin. {Cupil}[Chirp!]{!reset} You remember that, right, Cupil?

Well, for instance, Spice Island... We found a dizzying array of rare spices growing by the spring there. I have to wonder if it was originally planted by the ancients... {Cupil}[Chirp!]{!reset} Not unlike you, in a way, Cupil...

case.state: Yes, sky rifts and clouds often block vision, and some interesting objects are very small. Tiny, moving islands can be nearly impossible to track down... Ah, speaking of tiny and moving, I think Cupil's getting restless...

Yes, many indeed, and most are more ruthless than we are... Some of our most difficult battles were against pirates on the Sailor's Guild bounty list. I'm glad I have Cupil's support for difficult fights like those...
That makes sense, ~lucina~... I can't say the fighting is my favorite part either, especially if we're in serious danger. I much prefer searching for new discoveries or treasure...
Oh, do you mean to say you could be from our future? How fascinating... And, if your technology is more advanced than ours is, hopefully that means we've succeeded in preventing another apocalypse...

Yes, the Silvite Elders weren't so different. I don't think they ever planned for me to leave the Shrine at all... and they saw the islanders as... children, who needed to be kept in line. Dangerous children...

state.text: Well, ~player~... since it's just the two of us... it would be silly for me to be shy about this, wouldn't it?

case.state: I would appreciate that, actually... I think it's primarily the social aspects that are confusing to me. It seems to be taboo to speak of sex at all, but in that case, how does one ask for it in the first place...?

Actually, my world is all sky, with islands and continents floating in the air. But, I suppose I'm from the sky even by our standards... I was raised in the Great Silver Shrine, not far from the Silver Moon.

I certainly wouldn't say that I was a typical Air Pirate... I've only been one for a year or so, since I came down from the Great Silver Shrine and met Vyse and Aika. We've been sailing together ever since.
That's quite understandable... I'm sure your strategy will be much more effective if you're able to refine it further, anyway.
That's quite understandable... I imagine it just needs further refinement. Oh, Moons, I'm already... Alright, just give me a moment here...
Is that so? Well, I'd be happy to ask Vyse if he'd be alright with that... Although, our airships do require Moon Stones to function properly. I'm not sure how common those are in other worlds...
So am I, honestly... While I didn't have a problem with it at the time, in retrospect being stuck in the Great Silver Shrine was... stifling. I'm much happier sailing the skies with my friends...

Hmmm... that sounds more promising, I think. Perhaps what I need is just to have a private discussion with Vyse about... well, who we are to each other. Even if he didn't feel the same, he'd surely hear me out...
