Not by pirates, if that's what you mean. I was sent out of the Great Silver Shrine to gather the six Moon Crystals, but the Valuan Empire captured me before I could get anywhere...

state.text: "Tainted"...? Well, I certainly wouldn't describe it like---{Cupil}[Chirp!]{!reset} Oh, I'm sorry, give me a moment... I think Cupil wants to come out now...

case.state: Oh, I never thought I'd be involved in something like this, either. For the first seventeen years of my life, I never left the Great Silver Shrine, so coming down to the surface was a... novel experience... for me.

I'm not familiar with any of those places... The Silvites once inhabited the continent of Soltis, which was located south of Valua and west of Nasr. But, Soltis sank into Deep Sky thousands of years ago...
Oh, we ended up selling it. Apparently it's now rare and valuable to collectors, so we got quite a lot of gold for it at the Sailor's Guild...
Yes, the place was full of traps and ancient Silvite guardians, and we had to fight off Lord Zivilyn Bane, who also wanted to claim it. But we were able to sell it for ten thousand gold, I think...
Yes, Lord Galcian was the head of the Valuan Armada, whose goal was to conquer the entire world using the Moon Crystals. We had to board his massive flying fortress, the Hydra, to challenge him...

state.text: Well, some of those things... I don't need a peg leg or an eyepatch, although I did get an eyepatch for Cupil---{Cupil}[Chirp!]{!reset} Oh, you haven't met Cupil, but I think he'd like to come out now...

case.state: Yes, we didn't encounter any fish men, though plenty of fish-like monsters wandering the skies... but the Empire was a greater threat. I'd barely set foot in the pirate base before they attacked it...

Um... Vyse is such a strong and courageous man, he taught me to stand up for what I believe in... and Aika is so cheerful, kind and fun to be around, she's so good to me... "Carnal pleasures"... I do wonder...
Well, um... that does sound... quite nice... Vyse and Aika are both so dear to me, and... I'd really like to share all my experiences with them... If that's what they want, of course...
That's true, actually, I'm not... Well, assuming you mean the seas of water that seem to be common in other worlds. Our seas are great expanses of air populated by floating islands.
I'm not sure what those are, so I assume not... We use ships. They're like watercraft, but empowered by Moon Stones to fly through the air...

state.text: That makes sense... Working together for a common goal forges strong bonds, and I certainly have those with Vyse and Aika. {Cupil}[Chirp?]{!reset} Oh, and with you too, of course, Cupil...

case.state: Oh... Well, actually, he passed away earlier this year. I... think his soul was at peace, though... He was finally able to settle things with the arcwhale Rhaknam, and spent the rest of his life fishing.

state.text: Oh... Well, actually, he passed away earlier this year. I... think his soul was at peace, though, since---{Cupil}[Chirp?]{!reset} Oh, don't worry, Cupil, I'm fine... You're coming out now?

Yes, it's still incredible to think that the Empire is gone... Well, not gone exactly, but since Empress Teodora and the Armada are---{Cupil}[Chirp?]{!reset} Oh, that's Cupil. He seems to be getting restless...

case.state: Yes, it was frightening at the time, but in retrospect it was a wonderful thing to have happened. Since then, I've met so many caring people on the open skies... I can't imagine my life without them.
Oh, that... Well, my objective was to gather the six Moon Crystals and return them to my people. But the Armada also wanted the Moon Crystals, so they could conquer the world with their power...

Well... I grew up in the Great Silver Shrine with only the Silvite Elders and Ramirez... and Ramirez left when I was quite young. The Elders didn't like having more people there than was necessary, so...

Yes, honestly, I also talked to the doll Elder Prime made for me... I guess he was sort of like my father, and the Elders like a family. But, they were always so focused on... their plans for me, and not what I wanted...

That sounds really nice, actually... What kinds of books do they have there? I've read a few of the books on engineering, navigation and geography they keep at Sailor's Guilds, but I'd be interested in other topics.

state.text: Moon Stones fall from each of our six Moons... They can also be used to work magic, or to grant elemental properties to weapons---{Cupil}[Chirp?]{!reset} Right, Cupil, and they'll grant you an element as well...

case.state: The Silver Civilization fell long ago, thanks to a world war between ancient nations. Some of us Silvites survived, but now, Cupil and I are all that's left... so, I don't think we can know for sure.

state.text: They were mainly interested in stealing the cargo and teaching Admiral Alfonso a lesson. But, in the process of doing so, they happened to find me... {Cupil}[Chirp?]{!reset} Yes, and Cupil, though they didn't meet him until later...

Perhaps my captain is more willing to listen? He's headstrong, but he always respects my opinion and gives me space to speak my mind... {Cupil}[Chirp!]{!reset} Oh, Cupil? You're certainly speaking your mind all of a sudden...

It sounds like Robin and I might have something in common... Though, while the Elders taught me a good deal of history, I'm not well read. Books are rare where I'm from... {Cupil}[Chirp?]{!reset} Not as rare as Cupil, though...

case.state: Well, most people stay away from the Dark Rift, since it tears most ships to pieces before they get anywhere, so... they don't have tours. But, our old helmsman Don is trying to chart a safe route through it...

I'm not sure what a "nerd" is, but fair enough... I don't like the cold, either, and Glacia was terribly cold. It didn't help that it was on the underside of the continent, and falling off was a real danger...

It's not made of cheese as far as I know... I assume the Yellow Moon is made of Yellow Moon Stones, since they often fall from it, but I guess it's so large that all sorts of other things could exist there...
And ~player.ifMale(he's|she's)~ treated you well, I assume, or you wouldn't have returned... That's why I've grown fond of ~player.ifMale(him|her)~... and I feel comfortable here.

Ramirez was there when I was a girl, but he left when I was still quite young... After that, it was mostly me and the Elders. It was... good to have their company, but they weren't exactly... ordinary people...

You'd... be right to be suspicious, I think... I was always told the islanders below were dangerous and barbaric, but... I've come to realize the real reason they kept me up there was to control me...

My people tended to treat death very... practically. Where life's not necessary, its absence is simply more efficient... Although, if it was necessary, they could also extend lives to span millennia, as the Elders did.

Oh, is that so? In that case, high fantasy does sound like the sort of thing that might interest me... I'd certainly like to give it a try, anyway. I imagine I can't know for sure until I see it for myself...

No, I suppose not... I'm not as fond of treasure as many pirates, since we didn't even use money where I come from. But, it's wonderful to be able to use it to improve our lives, and the lives of others in need...

That's an interesting question... As a Silvite, I was born outside of the hierarchies islanders often use, so I don't know if I really have one. There just aren't enough Silvites for us to have social classes...

I certainly think it's beautiful... But it's unlikely you'd be able to see all six Moons at once. Each Moon is localized over a different region of the world, which is part of what produces their different climates.
I see... Well, Silvites are raised from birth to avoid making wasteful motions, anyway... Or at least, that was how Ramirez and I were raised. So, I imagine it'd come easily to me...

Oh, I see what you mean... We typically fight our way through. Vyse can stand toe to toe with the strongest monsters, and AIka can wipe out hordes of weaker ones with her explosions, so I just have to keep everyone alive.

...~Rouge~, what exactly do you plan to do about any crystal that might be inside me? Removing it would result in my death... I don't... think you're the sort of person who would attempt to do that, but, well...

Do... you really think it's that simple? Well... I suppose the difficult part might come in how she responds... But, after all we've been through together, surely she wouldn't reject me just for, um... bringing it up...

Ah... Moons, that does sound nice... I suppose I'm mostly worried about what would happen if he didn't... want any of that from me. He definitely cares for me, but... I couldn't say whether it's in that way...

state.text: If that knowledge still exists, it's most likely somewhere in Soltis. Of course, that would be a dangerous expedition, given the many hostile artificial lifeforms such as---[{Cupil}[Chirp!]{!reset} Well, similar to Cupil...

case.state: Well... I suppose that's true. But, it also helps me feel... useful, and gives me purpose... It's only been recently that I've truly had that feeling, and... it's something I'd like to hold onto...
I think our situation is fairly unusual... especially since I grew up among Silvites, with knowledge few have access to. Although, now that we're well known, perhaps others will start copying us...

That really does sound similar to my situation... Even to the extent that I'm fairly sure Aika and I share interest in Vyse as well. It would be wonderful if the three of us could just... all be together, but...

It helps just that you've had similar experiences... Even down to your friend who's interested in the same person. But, Aika and I have never been competitive about it, so... perhaps we could simply share him?

Well, in general, Air Pirates attack other ships and steal their cargo. Black Pirates do so to anyone they encounter, but Blue Rogues like myself have a code of honor. We refuse to attack or rob any civilian vessels.

Black Pirate attacks have increased significantly... But, that's why it's important for Blue Rogues like us to step up and defend civilians against them... Ah, I'm so sorry... I hadn't noticed just how much I've...

It's not complete chaos... The Sailor's Guild continues to pay bounties to anyone who brings down ruthless Black Pirates. So, ironically, we've become the enforcers of... ah... I'm sorry. I'm a little distracted, since...

That could be it... I can hardly imagine Vyse being afraid of anything, but I'm not much like a dangerous storm or enemy armada... Perhaps I need to signal to him somehow that he shouldn't be intimidated?
In addition to physical attacks, together we can turn enemies temporarily to stone, and he can unleash a small windstorm to erode their defenses... Ah, I'm so sorry. I'm somewhat, um...

Oh, I ended up becoming an Air Pirate, since I was rescued from the Armada by pirates not longer after leaving the Shrine... and I've found that life suits me quite well, especially with the good friends I've made.
Um... yes, my bra... Well, so far as that's concerned...
Ah... I'd very much like for Vyse to enter me, but I wouldn't want to see Aika deprived of the opportunity, if that was her preference... Perhaps we'd just... take turns on subsequent nights...
{Cupil}[Chirp]{!reset} Hmm? Oh... no, that's just Cupil. Apparently he'd rather not stay on my arm if I'm taking my sleeves off...

Yes, there's no formal organization where I'm from that regulates such things... Well, not that I'm aware of. I suppose the Ixa'takans have a hierarchy of priests, but that's something specific to their culture...
It's a bit of a relief to have these boots off, honestly... I've been doing so much walking since I became an Air Pirate, and my feet still haven't gotten used to it, even after all this time...
This headdress wasn't really designed for battle, so I'm glad it's survived as long as it has... But, most things of Silvite make are more resilient than they look.
I know this probably doesn't arouse you much, ~player~, but regardless of what I'm calling you, I still plan to play in accordance with the usual rules...
Don't worry, ~player~, I'm not going to remove my earrings or anything as a layer. This will be the last insubstantial item I remove for you...

state.text: {Cupil}[Chirp?]{!reset} Oh, no, Cupil, don't worry. ~marker.RemembersYourName~ and I are just playing a game together... an additional game, I mean. There's no need to be concerned...

case.state: You've seen these so many times before... By now, perhaps you can imagine their every curve before they're ever revealed to you...

You know, I've never really wanted to be strong. I've trained my magic and hardened my will only because it was necessary... to complete my mission... or to survive in a strange world that was alien to me...
You're familiar with my clothing by now, of course, ~player~... I don't have anything new to show you today, so I hope that'll be acceptable.

state.text: I realize I could just start throwing all my hands, and let you win... But, if you really want me to call you "~player~", I think it's fair that you have to earn it. {Cupil}[Chirp!]{!reset} You agree with me, Cupil?

case.state: But... at least you haven't shown me anything... particularly substantial yet... And so, I'm starting to feel quite... um, lowly again, now that...
And, it'd be easier to lean into the fantasy aspect of this if you hadn't already begun displaying yourself... Ah, but I suppose now, that won't be quite so...
Well, close game or not, you've still got me on the ropes... And, I certainly can't complain that I've been seeing so much of you this game, either...
In a sense, it's quite courageous of you to call yourself "~player~" and then immediately begin losing. I suppose... one could consider that sort of free-spirited behavior a form of domination?

This isn't all some... obscure kink, is it? I'm still not very familiar with most kinks, but... Demanding obedience from a partner, yet failing to actually receive it... Does that sexually gratify some people?

There's a reason I wasn't willing to call you "~player~" for so long, you know... I'm not exactly in the habit of obeying authority figures. So, if you'd like me to treat you as one, you'll need to put in some effort...
There's... a bit of a rush to this now, I have to admit... since I'd thought I might keep my ~clothing~ this game... It would be sweet to topple me after the way I've been taunting you, wouldn't it?
In the end, we'll be naked together... This is it. Your one last chance to prove your dominance over me, and show you're worthy of being my ~player~ after all...

state.text: {Cupil}[Chirp! Chirp!]{!reset} Birds? Oh, no, that's only Cupil... For some reason, he's getting restless now that I'm taking these off. I suppose he could be included as well, though...

case.state: Well, yes, I suppose that's the idea, ~ayano~... I'm much happier living without their restrictions, although there's definitely some... courage... required in embracing that freedom...
This will be your first time seeing a woman's breasts, won't it, ~man~? Because, if that's the case...
Ah... they're all looking at me, I... No, I'm not going to back out. This... is a little more than I bargained for, but... I'm prepared to face it...
When I joined, I wasn't worried about this... Undressing didn't seem like a severe consequence compared to the dangers I've faced. But now, I...
Um, have you ever... seen a woman's breasts before, ~man~? Because, if you haven't...
Even after traveling with Vyse and Aika for more than a year now, I still need to be gentle with my feet... They're somewhat fragile, especially if I'm not wearing my boots.
My feet tend to get sore if I spend too long walking around without my boots... It's a little embarrassing, considering how much traveling I've been doing since I met Vyse and Aika...

Hopefully my feet won't get too sore with these off... They're still awfully delicate, even after all the traveling I've done with Vyse and Aika... Though a fair amount of that was flying in our ship.
I've traveled all over Arcadia with Vyse and Aika, so I suppose these boots have been a lot of places... Though, we travel on a ship, so it's not as though that was all walking...
I'll take off my headdress next, if that's an acceptable choice...
I like this headdress, but I was always worrying the veil would get torn in battle... As an Air Pirate, I usually wear a bandana now, and it's much more practical...
This headdress is a lot sturdier than it looks, since it's made with special Silvite materials... I'm not sure if I could make another myself, though, so I hope you'll take good care of it...

You'll take good care of this headdress, won't you? I'm not sure where I'd find another... Though I suppose I've seen similar things sold by Nasrean merchants, but certainly not in the Silvite style...
You're wondering how my sleeves even stay up in the first place? Well, you see... oh! Hold on a moment, I completely forgot...
If I wore something under my leggings, it would be harder to maneuver in battle... It's more comfortable this way, too. But, that doesn't change what's happening now...
The only other ordinary human in the Great Silver Shrine was Ramirez, and even he left when I was quite young. Until last year, I'd... hardly ever had anyone look at me with clothes on...

My childhood was spent far from other human beings... It was just me and Ramirez in the Shrine, and he left when I was young. So, for most of my life, I haven't even had others look at my body while I'm clothed...
Alright... I suppose it's time for me to show you a lot more of myself. I hope you'll be gentle...
The Elders told me that I should take care to keep my body covered outside the Shrine... because, if I didn't, I'd "incite the rapacious appetites of the islanders"...
I was told, growing up, that... revealing my body to others was sinful and dangerous... The Elders claimed the islanders wouldn't hesitate to molest me if I wasn't covered at all times...
Don't worry... I'm not going anywhere, now or later. I'm resolved to see this through to the end, even if it's... a little overwhelming for me...

If you're wondering, ~player~... no, I still don't have anything on under my leggings. It seems foolish to do that just to gain an advantage in strip poker, and I really prefer it this way... um, even though...
Well, ~marker.RemembersYourName~... you can see this any time you want to, thanks to that picture we took together... So, I couldn't be embarrassed about showing you now...
This won't be anything new for you, ~marker.RemembersYourName~... You can see them whenever you like, after all. You still have that picture we took together, right...?
How do my sleeves stay up at all, you ask? Well... {Cupil}[Chirp!]{!reset} Oh, you're coming out now, Cupil?
I suppose these sleeves could be a little more practical, but it's actually easy to keep them in place, since... {Cupil}[Chirp!]{!reset} Oh! That must be...
You don't think my sleeves look very practical? Well, they're actually very easy to keep in place, because... {Cupil}[Chirp!]{!reset} Oh, hold on... Yes, you can come out now if you'd like...
Well... it's not like any of you are strangers to me... and ~player~ and I have been through a lot together. So, in that case...
We've been through so much together, ~player~, and I've learned so much about myself... I've gained so much confidence thanks to playing here with you...
Fina's feeling shy because it's her first game or because she's never lost before. Triggers her "covering" set of poses.
Fina's played a number of games with the player where she ended up forfeiting, so she's not concerned about covering up anymore. Triggers her "uncovering" poses.
Fina's very close to the player and comfortable with the game. Not only is she not covering herself, she's going out of her way to let everyone see her body. Triggers her "showing" poses.
If Fina is close with the player and everyone in the game is familiar to her, she'll use her "showing" poses even if she doesn't meet the other requirements. 5-player version.
If Fina is close with the player and everyone in the game is familiar to her, she'll use her "showing" poses even if she doesn't meet the other requirements. 4-player version.
If Fina is close with the player and everyone in the game is familiar to her, she'll use her "showing" poses even if she doesn't meet the other requirements. 3-player version.
Fina's feeling shy because she's playing on an exhibitionist background. Triggers her "covering" poses.
If Fina's played at least once before and is attempting to flirt (currently, only happens in games with Wikipe-tan) she'll use her "showing" poses to try to be more flirtatious.
Fina's playing at the holiday lodge, and she's relaxed and relieved to have her cold, wet leggings off, so isn't thinking about modesty much. Triggers her "uncovering" poses.

state.text: I thought I could trust you, ~player~...

case.state: ...There's no need to hide anything from you. I... think I'm a bit too modest in these games sometimes, anyway, and I'd like to get better... So, perhaps we can practice that together...

...There's no need to hide anything from you. Besides, I... was a bit too modest at these events before, while I was still getting used to it, but... that's not really in the spirit of the game, is it?
You've... seen everything there is from me, after all... and you're the only one here.
...And, I'd like to share that confidence with all of you... So please, let me know... if anyone can't see properly, alright?
Oh, my... Just... just give me a moment, alright? I promise I'll be okay...

...Let them watch, if so. It certainly doesn't feel as though anyone else is really here, and... if that's the case, since you've seen everything already... why shouldn't I show you everything you could ask for, ~player~?

...Let's, um... enjoy the time we have together to the fullest. You've seen all of me already, so I won't bother with modesty... In fact, perhaps I'll... take this opportunity to show you as much as you'd like to see...

state.text: Hold on... Natsuki, did you just say you didn't know this was strip poker? Did you not know we have to masturbate if we lose again after we're naked?

case.state: Wait, Catria... you didn't know this was strip poker? Then I'm guessing you didn't know we have to masturbate if we lose the game, either, did you? (Why don't they tell everyone these things at the start?)
Alright, well... did you want me to handle ~nami_szs~'s cards too for this next round? We might as well make the most of this...
Thank you, Senko, I'm glad you think so... But yes, while there are supports built into that dress, I don't wear anything underneath it...
...No, Senko, I don't remove my hair... It doesn't grow anywhere but my head. I'm... not completely sure why, honestly... It seems to just be the way I am...
I'm not going to do that, ~perona~... She's just here to have a good time, like we are. Can't we just try to get along...?
I really appreciate it, ~saki_zls~... l'll be wishing you the best of luck with your "Egghead" friend, as well. And, thank you so much for helping me feel welcome here...
...But, I've since learned that nearly everything they told me, whether about the Silver Civilization or the world below, was a lie... and so... I won't heed their words any longer.
...But, they also warned me to trust no one, to stay forever distant and... alone. I'm no longer bound by their lies... and, I'd rather think for myself.
...I'm honored to be able to... help you have new experiences. I'm... glad that we're taking this journey together.
...I hope you'll... observe me closely from now on... I really enjoy learning and experiencing new things, and... I'm happy to be able to help you do so, as well.
So, you can imagine how new this is for me, but... I've found that seeking out exciting new experiences is one of my favorite things... and I'm honored to share this one with you.
So, I can't say I have a lot of experience with this sort of thing, but... I think the best way to learn something is by trying it yourself, don't you?

Oh, I have no intention of choosing, Miko... The three of us go everywhere together, and I'd never want to exclude either of them. (...I wonder if ~marker.RemembersYourName~ would want to be included, too...)
There... Ah, that feels so much better, actually. Now that it's all over, it's... quite invigorating, I think...
Thank you so much, ~nagisa~... It's a great relief to have that over with. I don't think this will be so bad after all...
Um... perhaps? But I believe police work on behalf of a government, while the Blue Rogues directly opposed the Valuan government when it was corrupt. That's probably why we're considered pirates...
That's very kind of you to say, ~nagisa~... I hope you're right, but I'd rather not risk it. I'd much rather live freely as an Air Pirate, and impose my will on no one, justly or otherwise...

Something like that... He's an artificial creature who can change his shape. He's usually a bracelet on my arm... {Cupil}[Chirp!]{!reset} Anyway, if nothing else, at least I've always had his company...
Maybe he could record the sound of me in the bath, but I'm not sure why he would unless I asked him to. Cupil can act on his own, but he's mostly designed to support me and follow my instructions...
Well, thank you, ~nagisa~... But, I haven't lost just yet. Vyse taught me never to give up, and even if it's only a strip poker game... as long as I have cards to play, I won't surrender!
Not quite... I meant that by exploring the world and seeing it firsthand, I learn much more than I ever did in seclusion. But, I do find the thought of being an apprentice pirate quite amusing...
Thank you so much for offering, ~nagisa~... I don't have any special requirements, and I think the same is true of Vyse and Aika. Although, Aika tends to eat quite a lot, just to warn you...

Oh, yes, this is Cupil... He's decided to come off along with my ~clothing~, apparently. Normally he's a bracelet on my arm, so I guess he already is a small item in that sense... {Cupil}[Chirp?]{!reset}

The Silvite Elders told me never to expose my body to others, so I know how you feel... But, the Elders meant for me to spend my whole life alone in the Shrine. I won't deny myself happiness for their... flawed precepts.
Ah... oh my... That's an interesting thought. I wonder if holding onto someone would be... helpful... in this situation...
Um... I'm so sorry, that was probably more than you wanted to know... I hope I didn't make you uncomfortable. This game is... well, I might be getting a bit carried away...
That does sound quite nice... I wonder if they sell hot cocoa at the bar here. All this talking about the cold has put me in the mood for it...
That does sound quite nice... I wouldn't mind some hot cocoa right now, actually. It's awfully cold here, and it'd be nice to warm up a bit before I have to take off anything bigger...
That sounds awfully pleasant... Now I'm tempted to get some hot cocoa after the game. Though it's so hot here that I might regret having a hot drink...
That does sound awfully nice... Actually, all this talk of cold places has me in the mood for some hot cocoa now. Perhaps I'll look for some after the game's over...
Oh? I'm... not entirely sure what you mean... I suppose expectations about clothing must be quite different where you come from.
Well... there's certainly at least one person I'd like to see me that way. But, while he definitely values me as a friend, I'm not... sure what he's interested in beyond that...
Well... there are at least two people I'd like to see me like that, I'll admit. But, I have no idea how they feel about that... And, I don't even know if one of them is interested in women, so...

Well... I suppose ~marker.RemembersYourName~ has seen me like that at these games before enough times. And, I've certainly enjoyed that, but... it's not exactly the limit of what I'd be interested in...
Mmm... well, I can't argue with that... This has been much easier for me than it would have been without you here, so you must be succeeding as well. Thank you so much, ~estelle~...
I don't enjoy it if I'm in actual danger... But, here, the only "danger" is others seeing my body. It lets me enjoy the thrill of being... helpless... but without the usual consequences...
I know what you mean... I'm happy that we were able to meet here, ~estelle~. It feels... so easy to become close to someone here, even after just a short span of time...
I see... Please, don't worry, ~estelle~. Even if he does come here, we can always join forces to drive him out. It sounds as though most patrons here would be happy to exclude him...

Yes, and it's important not to forget the past. My people... did some terrible things, but... I think it's just as important to have examples not to follow, if you're trying to make the world a better place.

It's quite true, Mercy... Falling from one's ship is terribly dangerous. If you're lucky, the winds will carry you to some island, but most likely you'll fall into Deep Sky and never be heard from again...

I can't deny that, Mercy... Having the ability to fly under one's own power would be much safer in my world, but I've never met a sailor who can do that... Falling overboard is most often a death sentence.
Ah... is that so? I... wasn't really thinking about that, but that does look... quite possible to me...
I suppose we are, um, also similar in that way... I've really enjoyed speaking with you as well, ~estelle~. It's quite nice how... well you can get to know someone... at a game like this...
Um... no, you won't do that, Miko. I'm sorry, but I'm looking for purely verbal methods of instruction at the moment.
I see... Well, I'm sorry, but I think verbal instruction would be preferable at the moment. What do you think, Tojiko?
Yes, I agree... I certainly see no reason to dislike you at the moment. I'll look forward to getting to know you better, Y'shtola...
Sucrose, are you alright? I didn't do something to offend you, did I...?
...Thank you for... investigating the matter, though... I appreciate it.
Ah, I'm so sorry... Cupil was quite insistent that I let him out. He's been hiding on my arm as a bracelet, but... did you say you thought we might be similar, Sucrose?
Thank you, ~meia~, I'm glad you think so... I appreciate your body, too.
Ah... you want to discuss death, ~hu_tao~? I suppose that is a topic I know a bit about... Though, I have to admit, not what I expected to discuss when I decided to come here...
I'm glad to meet you as well, ~noire~. I'm hoping the rest of this game will be quite enjoyable for us both...

Well, it's not boldness on my part so much as that it's not traditional among Silvites to wear such things... My dress was chosen by the Elders, and... I doubt strip poker was among the activities they were planning for...
Thank you, ~yshtola~... It's almost invigorating, in a way. I feel as though I've been... hiding myself so long that, well... it's a bit of a relief to not bother any longer...
Hmmm... Well, to be honest, I'm not entirely sure what you mean by that, but... given that sex appeal is part of the point of this game, I'm glad that you feel I possess it...
Well... I'm not completely sure what you mean by that, but I certainly appreciate the sentiment... I'd say you're quite appealing yourself, ~jessie~...
Um... Sucrose? I'm sorry, I... (Is she distracted again? I didn't say anything wrong, I hope...)

This is Cupil, everyone... {Cupil}[Chirp!]{!reset} He's a Silver animal, created artificially by my people. He's usually a bracelet on my arm, but I guess---oh, my, ~hu_tao~, that's...quite a forward question... um...

Oh, um... that's true, I suppose. Silvites usually don't bother with those things... It's viewed as an inefficient use of resources. And, I'm fairly sure the Elders never intended me to play strip poker, so...
Oh, um... I, ah... I appreciate the sentiment, ~ganyu~, but that... might be difficult...
Cupil's a Silver animal, not a Pokémon, Petra, but there are many similarities, I think. He can store himself on my arm as a bracelet, and even fights at my side in combat... {Cupil}[Chirp!]{!reset}

state.text: Oh, thank you, Magma... I'm looking forward to seeing yours, as well.
Oh, thank you, Magma... yours are quite lovely, as well.

case.state: I see... In that case, thank you so much for the recommendations. With any luck, it'll give me more options for the next time we have to make some long journey from one end of Arcadia to the other...

I see... Thank you so much for the suggestions, ~monika~. Perhaps I'll run into Yuri at one of these games in the future... If I do, I'll be sure to ask her for additional recommendations as I need them.
No, I don't think I have... Is that a common feature of your world, ~nami~? I'd be quite interested to see what that's like.
No, I don't think I have... Well, not until today, anyway, assuming you mean a great body of water like the one behind us. Is that a common feature of your world, ~nami~?
No, I don't think I have... Well, not until today, anyway, assuming you mean a great body of water like the one outside this building. Is that a common feature of your world, ~nami~?
Well, I've seen seas of water in this world before, but there's nothing like it in my own world, no... Is that a common feature of your world, ~nami~?
Of course, ~mari~... It's my pleasure. I'd be happy to talk about it more with Kel, if we're ever able to meet...
Are you saying you've heard of Cupil before, Zoe? You even know about his transformations... Do you have some sort of connection with the Silvites?
I guess you have a fan, Cupil... Do you want to do any transformations for us? {Cupil}[Chirp?]{!reset} Well, alright, we should probably wait until the game is over...
...No, the Elders just... didn't consider it important, I suppose. Perhaps they were... concerned about what I'd learn, if I did, so... most of the reading I've done has been after I left...
Oh, do you write books as well? I'd love to see what you're working on... Why don't we stay after the game and discuss further details?

I completely understand... Well, not completely, but I understand that you'll be all right without my help, at least. Just let us know if you run into a threat too large to face along, and perhaps we can lend you a hand...
Oh, my... That's a bit discouraging. But, considering the way that humans have abused their technology since ancient times, I can't be too surprised...

The Elders sent me down to finish Ramirez's mission, after he abandoned it to join the Valuans. I'm not sure what they'd intended for me before that, but... Well, it's probably best not to think about it.
Oh... um, thank you, ~meia~. I guess I'm getting a lot more exercise than I used to in the Shrine... Not that I'd call myself fit, exactly...
Well, I'm glad to be here with you as well, ~saki_zls~, but... the Shrine no longer exists, so I don't think you'd be able to tour it...

I can't disagree with you... Moon Stones fall from the six Moons of my world, and can be used as power sources or even to produce magic. There's a reason many of us have such reverence for the Moons...
I think Vyse already knows most of the interesting things that have happened in my life... He was there for many of them. But that's still helpful advice, Miko, so thank you...
It varies how many we have... I think we had at least twenty-five in the past, but now it's mostly Vyse, Aika and me. We're with the Blue Rogues, but we don't have a name for our crew specifically...

This is my friend Cupil... He was hiding on my arm as a bracelet. Anyway, Miko, I'm actually happier as an Air Pirate than I've ever been... and, if that makes me "tainted", I quite prefer to be that way...
Oh! Um... as a matter of fact, that's exactly what happened, ~lucina~. Moons, that sort of thing must be more common than I'd thought...
Hmm, perhaps so, ~cynthia~... If I tell you a little more about Silvite culture, maybe you'll be able to place them better geographically...

Oh, I have no intention of choosing, Miko... I don't know for certain what Vyse and Aika feel for me, but... I'd never want to exclude either of them. The three of us go everywhere together, after all...

state.text: No, I didn't mention it earlier, Magma... but I suppose it's self-evident at this point. My dress has enough support for my breasts built in, so...

case.state: I think I did mention it, Magma, but... there are certainly plenty of things in a game like this, to cause distractions...

Oh, do you think we didn't get a fair price? I don't know if gold is worth the same where I'm from, but... perhaps I should bring it up with Aika. I'm sure she'd want to make sure we got our money's worth...
That's right, ~nami~. We put an end to Galcian, as well as... ah. Actually, perhaps we shouldn't keep talking about this... I'd rather not revisit some of those memories.
Yes, and even if we did still have it, Aika would probably be the one who'd want to keep it. She's the one of us who cares most about treasure... Actually, ~nami~, you remind me of her quite a bit.
Er, but I... um... Well, in that case, ~perona~, thank you very much. (Is she even listening to what I'm saying...?)
Oh, I promise you, Y'shtola, our Empire had plenty of pirate attacks to worry about after that. I think it would have gone better for them if they'd left us alone...
How fascinating... It's impressive that your people have managed to create aircraft without using Moon Stones. I hope I have the opportunity to see one someday...
It's quite a transition, isn't it? To have lived in a single place all your life, and then suddenly discover so much to explore... But, personally, I'd never want to go back to the way things were.

Yes, no one's closer to me than Cupil... He's an artificial Silver creature who's been with me since I was a child. He's usually a bracelet on my arm, but he can change shape into many other things... {Cupil}[Chirp!]{!reset}

This is Cupil, everyone... Normally, he's a bracelet on my arm, but he can change into all sorts of shapes. We couldn't have defeated the Empire without his help in battle... {Cupil}[Chirp! Chirp!]{!reset}

I don't know about Seelies, but Cupil doesn't require much care... He just needs to eat Chams once in a while, so he can continue to grow. {Cupil}[Chirp! Chirp!]{!reset} Oh... I shouldn't say the C-word...

I suppose you're right... Even if this universe is simulated somehow, I'm not sure what we'd do about that. Besides, it makes sense for things to happen in a similar way if we return here and take the same actions...

Ah, Cupil's decided to come out. He 's usually a bracelet on my arm, but... Anyway, ~meia~, I did bring a Silver Moon Stone with me. When we're done, you're welcome to examine it and see if it's similar to Paksis...

And, I'd say that happy accident is one of the best things that's ever happened to me... Oh, and this is Cupil. He typically hides on my arm as a bracelet, but sometimes he just won't sit still... {Cupil}[Chirp!]{!reset}

I guess Cupil was getting restless. He was on my arm as a bracelet before, but now he's insisted on coming out... Anyway, repeating myself a few times is enough to get Vyse to listen, but every captain is different...

Cupil here is a Silver animal created by my people. He's usually a bracelet on my arm... Anyway, I'd love to read more if I could find more books. I've mostly seen practical ones about sailing and navigation...

I'd be quite interested to learn about your world's history as well... But, I'd love to try reading some fiction, too. I've just never had the opportunity before... so I'm excited to see what's it's like.

Yes, more than that, in fact... Together, we took the fight to the Armada and defeated them. It was a long journey, and it didn't all turn out the way we expected, but... I'm glad we took it together.
Yes, exactly. I hope to meet many other wonderful friends on future journeys, but no one will ever replace Vyse and Aika... and I hope we'll always be able to travel together.
You look so pleased, ~komisan~... I can't blame you, though. It makes me happy to think about it, too... I hope we'll both meet many more wonderful friends on our journeys, whatever those might be.

Yes, and... Moons, I don't know if I even believe they wanted what was best for me. After what we've learned about their intentions, I... well... It doesn't matter anymore. I'm glad those days are gone.
And besides, they sent me out to thwart that armada anyway, alone, in an unarmed ship... I mean, at that point they were desperate, but... Well, it doesn't matter. Things are so much better now...
That's very sweet of you, ~meia~... I've grown to like you, too. You're right, of course... I just need to speak with Vyse, and I'm sure we'll figure things out, one way or another.

Well, thank you, ~meia~... Last year was the first time I'd ever seen another human woman, so I hadn't had much chance to think about them that way. I... guess we're similar in that way too, aren't we?
No, I suppose not... How silly that it's come to this! Well, perhaps our families should have given us a little more room to grow... They clearly didn't accomplish what they were after.

I... think only Aika's ever seen me nude... I've certainly asked questions about sex, and had some... productive conversations... We did have some couples on our crew. But, in terms of... hands-on experience...

Oh, I masturbate on my own all the time, don't worry... It's the... public nature of this that's new to me. But in terms of other people's bodies, and how they... handle them... I'd like to learn more about that...

I suppose we might be able to take you for a visit if we can figure out a safe way to do it... But, without a metal ship, it'd be awfully dangerous to enter. It was fairly dangerous even when we did have one...
Perhaps so, who knows? Even the Silvites never actually landed on them, as far as I'm aware. It'd be quite an adventure to visit them...

Yes, I certainly wouldn't want to go back to that... so I'm glad you have someone to keep you company. As thrilling as my new treasure-hunting life can be, friends are more important than any treasure...

I suppose that might be true. There are many more ways to be atypical than there are to be typical... and I'd much prefer to have a wide range of experiences, rather than doing the same thing all my life.
I really appreciate it, ~saki_zls~... I hope you'll be able to achieve your sexual goals as well. And, thank you so much for helping me feel welcome here...
Ah, I see... I can't deny that sounds somewhat... intriguing... hmm. Perhaps if we all got to know each other well enough, I'd consider it...
Haha, yes, you're probably right... well... If they'd tried harder to attend to my needs when I was in their care, perhaps I'd feel guilty about what I've done with my life...

Oh, do you think so? This is quite normal for Silvites, and we're not particularly... open, sexually speaking... But, I don't think I really mind being perverted. As long as it doesn't hurt anyone, why not?

I know what you mean, but... Moons, I wouldn't want ~player.ifMale(him|her)~ to get too full of ~player.ifMale(him|her)~self. Perhaps we should arrange a special game where ~player~ is specifically not invited...

Ah... well, ~cynthia~, I want to argue with you on that, but considering some of the... things we've done... I really can't. Perhaps it was for the best that the Silver Civilization fell in the end...
Thank you, ~kyou~, I'm glad you think so... This is just quite a new experience for me, so I'll need a little time to adjust to it...
Ah, thank you so much, ~kyou~... Don't worry, I'll be all right. It just always takes a bit of time for me to adjust to this...
For me, ~rouge~, the most beautiful thing is the open sky, and green grass and trees beneath it... with the sun shining down from above. I'm just... happy to exist out in the world, I suppose...

Yes, this is Cupil... He's an artificial Silver creature. I don't know the secrets of his construction, either... But perhaps those, too, are hidden in Soltis somewhere. {Cupil}[Chirp! Chirp!]{!reset}

It's not even limited to a single civilization... I've never encountered a culture from my world that doesn't use Moon Stones to produce magic. So, if it's uncomfortable for you, that might be the best option...
Considering what many of our targets have done to innocent civilians themselves... no, ~kyou~, I don't feel bad. I'd rather follow our code than laws created by cruel dictators like Empress Teodora.

You wouldn't have been the first, so... thank you for reassuring me... Um... although, I'm not sure if I'd want to just agree to... Not that I'm not at all... Ah, I don't think I have a response to that right now.

Ah, that has been an issue before... Admiral Belleza often used such tactics to subvert us into furthering her own plans for the Moon Crystals. Come to think of it, you remind me of her in some ways...
Ah... I suppose that's true. I'm not sure if I'm prepared to... be quite that courageous right now, but... I'll certainly keep that in mind, ~rouge~...
Oh, my... Well, I'm glad you'd be interested in that, ~rouge~, since I suppose that's what I'm after... For Vyse to pin me down, I mean... Well, not exclusively him, I suppose, but...
That certainly sounds much easier than trying to imply something, but I've seen Aika get quite agitated when men try to be direct with her... Do men and women really work that differently?
Well... I suppose we are playing this game, aren't we? I'm already a pirate, so... I wouldn't really mind being a deviant, so long as it doesn't hurt anyone who doesn't deserve it...
It does feel like a piratical thing to do, but... I don't really see it as being greedy. In a way, it seems greedier to want Vyse all to myself at Aika's expense, or vice versa...
Yes, I like that idea, ~komisan~... Let's promise each other that we'll find the courage to pursue those dreams. And, perhaps we'll meet here again to share our successes and failures...
I didn't even realize that's what I was feeling until I experienced something better, but... so am I. With good friends who care for you, it's much easier to care for yourself as well...
No, no, I wouldn't dream of it... That would be against the Blue Rogue code of honor. We only target unjust authorities or other pirates, not innocent civilians, so please don't worry...
Don't worry, I wasn't offended... Being seen like this by everyone is... intense, certainly, but... I'm not concerned about it. And, it's all the more comfortable with your company...
He's a Silver animal, ~estelle~, maybe the last of his kind... He can change his shape, so he was hiding on my arm as a bracelet. He can also become a weapon to fight for me in battle...

Wheatley, it looks like Cupil has decided to come out now that my sleeves are off. He's an artificial creature made by the Silver Civilization... perhaps a bit like a robot. {Cupil}[Chirp, chirp!]{!reset}
Well, I was wearing a bra, in a sense... There are supports for my breasts built into that dress. Silvites considered underwear to be unnecessary and wasteful, so...
Um... Ignatz, is something the matter? I know my boots aren't much, but I won't drag things out too long, I promise...

This is Cupil, ~perona~... He was hiding on my arm as a bracelet before. He doesn't have teeth, but since he can change his shape, I suppose he could learn to assume a form that did have them... {Cupil}[Chirp!]{!reset}
Oh, dear... Cupil, what do you think of that? {Cupil}[Chirp!]{!reset} Maybe you should go back to being a bracelet, I don't think ~saki_zls~ appreciates you...

Meet Cupil, everyone... Dawn, he's the Silver animal I mentioned to you earlier. He can change his shape, and typically hides on my arm as a bracelet, but this is his normal form... {Cupil}[Chirp!]{!reset}
Say hello to Cupil, everyone... Oh, he's been with me since I was a little girl, Magma. He's a Silver animal, so it would be hard to find another creature like him.. {Cupil}[Chirp!]{!reset}
Say hello to Cupil, everyone... um... I'm not going to just give him away, Magma. He's been with me since I was a girl, and stays with me all the time as a bracelet on my arm...

They're wonderful people, ~saki_zls~... Vyse is so inspiring, he's optimistic even in the darkest times. Aika is so energetic and fun to be around... And, I know they'd both do anything to keep me safe.

That's likely because there aren't many Silver animals left in the world, but he's an excellent companion, Petra... He can hide on my arm as a bracelet, and even attack enemies for me in battle. {Cupil}[Chirp!]{!reset}

He's a Silver creature, Wikipe-tan... possibly the only one left in the world. When he's not a bracelet, he can transform into many other forms, such as weapons to aid me in battle... {Cupil}[Chirp!]{!reset}
This is Cupil, ~mari~... He's a Silver animal, an artificial creature created by my people. He can change his shape, so he was hiding on my arm as a bracelet... {Cupil}[Chirp!]{!reset}

Ah... well... that does seem only fair, Miko... I'd be quite interested in learning more of the techniques you have in mind, I think. Um... as long as your instruction isn't too... hands-on, that is...

Cupil is a Silver animal, ~rosa~... He was artificially created by my people, and he can change his shape for convenience or to attack in combat. Normally, he's a bracelet on my arm... {Cupil}[Chirp!]{!reset}

That doesn't surprise me, ~colress~... Cupil might be the last Silver animal in existence. He can change his shape as well... often into weapons that can fight for me in battle. {Cupil}[Chirp!]{!reset}

This is Cupil, everyone... I suppose he is rather interesting, ~colress~. He was created by my people, and I don't quite understand how he works myself, but he's my constant companion and can even fight for me...
This is Cupil... He's able to transform into many things, such as the bracelet on my arm he was previously. I don't think he's ever become a work of art, though, ~yusuke~...
...But please, don't worry, ~player~. As long as you keep winning, you'll find me to be quite... malleable to your wishes...
...Mmmm... For that matter, why don't you hold on to all the clothes I remove for now, ~player~? I think it's... appropriate... for my access to them to be under your control...

You'd better tread carefully, ~player~. While I, of course, remain entirely subservient to your will, I don't think I can say the same for Cupil. So make sure you treat me well to~background.time~, alright?

Mmm... but, I imagine you'd like to touch them as well, wouldn't you? Well... that seems like something you'd be well within your rights to ask for... After all, ~player~... I'm entirely at your service...

...And relinquishing that control is so... liberating... I've always longed to serve someone I can trust, who cares for me actively... For someone like that... well... I could obey their every command.
I hope you're prepared to undress me the rest of the way. I'm certainly prepared to do it for you... So please don't lose, alright?
Well, in that case, now's your chance to overwhelm me with your skill at poker. Show me what you can do, and I'll soon be falling at your feet... Well... doing something at your feet, anyway.

...Actually... you're not doing this on purpose, are you? Just to see how I'll react to it? I haven't forgotten all the silly things you've done at these games in the past, so I wouldn't be surprised...
I wouldn't agree to this with just anyone, ~marker.RemembersYourName~. I'm sorry, but it seems I'm a bit more difficult to dominate than you might have thought... I am a pirate, remember?
Well... Suspension of disbelief aside... here's what you've earned, ~player~. I'd say I still owe you at least a little of the shy and submissive behavior you seem to be interested in...
I really enjoy being vulnerable with you, ~player~. I like the idea of being... here to serve your pleasure... So, try not to make me work too hard to believe in that, alright?
...So, ~player~... You're not going to let me get away, are you? Put me on the ground with your next hand, and none of the rest of that will matter any longer...
Mmm... No, it isn't. That doesn't work for me at all... I'm sorry, but it's honestly just sort of silly.
If so, well, um... feel free to continue playing the way you are now, "~player~". As you've no doubt learned at our games together... I quite enjoy contributing to your sexual gratification.
How much effort might that be, you ask? Well, to be concise, more than you are currently. Isn't that right, Cupil? {Cupil}[Chirp!]{!reset}
Mmm... but it doesn't matter, does it? Because you're going to lose every hand from now on, and then we'll see who's really the "~player~" here...
We'll soon see, anyway. One more loss between the two of us, and we'll find out who really deserves to be in charge around here...

Um... I'm not sure what you mean, ~kyou~. My ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(do|does)~ have some Moon Stones embedded in ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it)~ to enhance my abilities, but I don't think there's a numerical value for it...
Oh, the floor feels so nice and cool when I'm not wearing them...
It feels pretty strange standing on the sand like this with my leggings still on.

Hmm, I hope my leggings don't get too dirty...
(...Though if this game goes the way I hope it does, I'll probably have to wash them anyway, right?)

Hmm, I hope my leggings don't get any grass stains...
(...Though if this game goes the way I hope it does, I'll probably have to wash them anyway, right?)
The road is pretty hard... I hope my feet don't get too sore from standing without my boots.

Oh, the grass tickles my feet... This is all a little overwhelming, but I think I'm having fun.
Oh, but it's lovely to feel the sand on my bare feet... and it's nice to think that I'll have something soft to sit on if, well...
It definitely feels like I'm doing something I shouldn't be, standing outside without any clothes on like this...
Ah, finally... My leggings were so cold and wet from trudging around out there. My boots aren't really meant for snow, so... I think I'll be much more comfortable from now on...

Honestly, I might be running out of these "accessories" everyone seems to have so many of. I hope you don't mind...
(I could take off my earrings next, but it seems as though the others are getting tired of accessories. I'll go for something a little bigger next time...)

Maybe I should just leave my earrings on for the rest of the game. I'm starting to feel guilty about having removed such insubstantial items so far, and they'd be easy to lose, anyway...
Don't worry about me... I'm ready to see this through to the end.
Well... I knew what I was getting into. Don't hold back... I'm ready to face whatever comes.
Everyone, I'd like you to meet my friend Cupil. He's usually a bracelet around my arm, but he must have decided to come off with my sleeves. {Cupil}[Chirp, chirp!]{!reset}
Say hello to Cupil, everyone... He's a Silver creature who can change his shape, so he was hiding on my arm as a bracelet, but this is his natural form. {Cupil}[Chirp, chirp!]{!reset}
Is that better, Cupil? He was hiding on my arm in bracelet form before, but it seems he's gotten over being shy and decided to come out. {Cupil}[Chirp, chirp!]{!reset}
This is... Thank you both... for sharing this moment with me. I, um...
Well... this is nothing you haven't seen before, ~marker.RemembersYourName~. I'll pretend you're the only one looking...
But it feels good to be out of them... It gets a bit uncomfortable wearing them for so long.
(Well... even if we can't seem to remember each other properly, this is much easier to do with people I've met before. We're... getting to know one another quite well...)
This is much easier to do with people I've met before. We're... getting to know one another quite well... Thank you all so much for coming along with me...
Well, ~kind~, I just want to say... You've been so supportive of me throughout this game, and I feel really comfortable here. Thank you so much... I hope you enjoy what I have to show you.
Well, here I am, everyone... I want to thank all of you for supporting me through this. Especially ~kind~, who's been so good to me for the whole game.

Well, ~marker.RemembersYourName~, I just want to say... You've been so supportive of me in all our games, and I feel really comfortable here. Thank you so much... I hope you enjoy what I have to show you.

Well, here I am, everyone... I want to thank all of you for supporting me through this. Especially ~marker.RemembersYourName~, who's been so good to me... ever since the very first game we played together.
At least I'm not the only one here who doesn't wear a bra... or rather, I have mine built into my dress. Thank you for, um, being the first to demonstrate that style of dress, ~braless~...
Well, I was going to explain to you all how I don't wear a bra because I have supports built into my dress, but... I suppose at this table, that's not as unusual as I would have expected...
Well... I do feel a little less odd about my... sparse... undergarments, thanks to ~commando~... The Silvites didn't really believe in superfluous things like underwear, so...
The Silvites didn't really believe in superfluous things like underwear, but... I suppose at this table, I don't really need to justify that to the rest of you...
This is... Thank you all... for sharing this moment with me. I, um...
...Well... here they are, then... I hope you like them...
I'll give you a proper view, ~marker.RemembersYourName~... I know it's nothing new for you, but... I hope it's an appropriate reward for your efforts.
I won't hide myself from you, ~marker.RemembersYourName~... There's nothing here you haven't seen, and if there were... I'd want you to see that, too.

Well, ~marker.RemembersYourName~, you've almost got me now. Don't act innocent... I know how much you want me to perform for you. It's... actually really nice, the way you never seem to get tired of that.

state.text: Then I suppose it's the Valuan tank's... turn to strip? Ah... I don't really understand how this is supposed to work...
Bite?! I don't understand what's going on, but this still sounds unnecessary!

You like to drink, right, ~jim~? There are a great many beverages sold here, but I'm not familiar with most of the available options... They don't seem to have any loqua. Do you have any recommendations?
You like to drink, right, ~jim~? I saw lots of drinks for sale back at the Inventory proper, but no loqua or anything else that I recognized... Is there anything you'd recommend for me to try?

So, um... Twisted Fate, you call yourself? I get the feeling this game is nothing new to you... I'm still relatively new to it, myself, but I think I'm improving, so I'm curious to see how well I'll do against you.

Um, ~colress~... you're a researcher of some type, is that correct? Would you tell me a little more about what you study?

So, um, ~jim~... may I ask where you're from, exactly? You actually look like you'd fit in well among the Blue Rogues, but I've never heard any of them talk about you, so I'm guessing you're not one of us...
If you don't mind my prying, ~jim~... could you tell me more about what it's like in the Koprulu Sector? I can't imagine how I could visit such a faraway place, but I'm quite curious...
Can you tell me more about this "Sentinel" you pilot, ~takatoshi~? Is it an artificial guardian created using ancient Silvite technology, like the Sentinels I'm familiar with?
Um, Colt, you're skilled with guns, I take it...? My friend Gilder has quite a similar fighting style... though I'm not entirely sure why you decided to bring them to the game with you.

So, um... Arash, you're an archer? We used to have an archer named Tikatika on our crew, though his incredible eyesight was what was most helpful to us. Are you also a lookout or a guard of some sort?
What's the cause of all this strife in the Koprulu Sector, ~jim~? Is it a factional sort of thing, or is there some sort of larger external threat?

~Takatoshi~, I'm still trying to wrap my head around how your time travel works... Do you mean that every time you go back and change something in an era, you create an entirely separate sequence of events?
So, ~Takatoshi~, I've gathered you're not alone in defending the planet... I think you mentioned an Okino once or twice. Does he pilot a Sentinel as well?
Um... ~basil~, I don't mean any offense by this, but... this is quite a new experience for you, isn't it? I... well, I do understand how that feels...
If you're defending Koprulu from gods and tyrants, ~jim~, you must need to take your mind off it now and then... Do you have any time for hobbies? Apart from strip poker, of course...
You're okay with continuing this, aren't you, ~takatoshi~? After all the dangers you've faced, bravely defending your homeworld on behalf of all nations... this won't be too unnerving, right...?

case.state: Oh, you're getting to this point, ~takatoshi~? Well... I know you've been looking at me, so it's only... gentlemanly of you to return the favor, I think... Not that I mind you looking at me...
