case.state: Don't give up, Supernova, I'm here cheering you on...
It's not over yet, Chara. Supernova will put an end to you soon enough!
You can still defeat her, Supernova. I believe in your power!
As long as you have clothes left to remove, Supernova, you'll still have a chance at defeating Chara. Don't give up!
Even against impossible odds, you have to be strong, Supernova. As long as you have that strength in your heart, you can accomplish anything!
I know you have the strength and courage to get through this, Supernova. Don't give up!

state.text: Chara, what is it about power that's so appealing to you and ~player~, anyway? I don't understand. Surely one only seeks power to accomplish some greater goal?
If you defeat every player in this world, ~chara_dreemurr~, and obtain every... reward... we have, what then? Will you destroy this world as well, and move on to the next?
You're so thoughtful, ~nagisa~, dressing up for us like this... May I order, um... one pair of shoes? Is that how this works?
Fluttershy, what is your home like, exactly? I gather it's not floating in the clouds, which is already a bit unusual to me.
So, Fluttershy... it sounds as though Twilight's home is more similar to mine than yours is, at least in your estimation... What exactly is your home like?
So, ~saki_zls~... if you call yourself "Number Two" among your idol group, then... presumably there's a "Number One" as well, right?
I like your outfit, ~nagisa~... You have a job as a waitress, right? Aika and I worked as waitresses in Nasrad for a few weeks... It was quite fun, as long as the customers weren't too rowdy.

I apologize if I'm dragging the issue out more than I should, ~saki_zls~... but, I'm still thinking about you and this "Egghead". Do you have any special activities that just the two of you do together?
Wh-What?! Zone-tan, what under the six Moons is happening to you?!
I'm so sorry, Aoba, that must be really frustrating... but it's mostly luck, right? I'm sure I'll lose before long...
I'm so sorry, Aoba, that must be really frustrating... but it's mostly luck, right? Someone else is sure to lose before long...

case.state: I'm so sorry, Aoba, that must be really frustrating... but it's mostly luck, right? And you certainly held out a lot longer than I did...

state.text: Um... well, the chance of this happening can't be that low, right? I'm sorry you're having such terrible luck, though, Wikipe-tan...
If it makes you feel better, ~nagisa~, I don't have much experience either. I've played before once or twice, but I'm certainly no expert... Perhaps we'll be evenly matched.
Don't worry, ~nagisa~... When I first started coming here, I don't think I even knew the rules, but I figured it out soon enough. You'll probably get used to it faster than you think...
Actually, neither do I, ~nagisa~... This is my first time playing, and I didn't even practice. So, at least you'll have an advantage over me...
Well, I don't see any reason you should have to, ~nagisa~... In fact, it seems a little silly to worry about your attire when the point of coming here is to remove it.
Oh, ~nagisa~? I also get cold easily... But, maybe that's my fault for not dressing in layers... I'm just not used to it. Is it comfortable to wear that many?
I promise I won't laugh at you, ~nagisa~, whatever it is you're concerned about. Even if you're hiding a Looper under your shirt, or you have dinner plates on your chest instead of a bra...
Well, of course I won't tell him if you don't want me to ~nagisa~... Do you think he'd be upset with you if he found out?
I think there are plenty of adults who don't do anything like this, ~nagisa~, but... I won't dissuade you. I can tell you're determined to see this through, no matter what...
I don't know, ~nagisa~... If you're going to undress for someone in a special ceremony, isn't it better to have some practice first? Though, I admit, I'm not very knowledgeable about weddings...
So, ~nagisa~... may I ask what exactly a "Student Council President" does? Or, for that matter... I'm not entirely sure what a "Student Council" is, either...
~Nagisa~, you seem a little nervous about this game. Is it your first time trying something like this?
So, I'm curious to know... Why were you interested in coming to this place, ~nagisa~? Did you just want to explore the new... experiences... that one can have here?

case.state: Well, I'm not sure what any of that means, ~wikipetan~, but I'm always happy to be educated...

state.text: Are you still doing alright, ~nagisa~? You're, um, pulling ahead of me a bit... I hope that's not too disconcerting.

case.state: Are you still doing alright, ~nagisa~? Things are starting to... um... progress a bit, so I'd like to be sure...
Are you still doing alright, ~nagisa~? It'll just be me and ~player~ watching, if that helps at all...

state.text: Alright, ~nagisa~... What can I do to help you through this? I'll happily support you however I can...
Oh, my... So we're at this point now... You know, you're really brave to have made it this far, ~nagisa~...
Ah... alright... Remember, ~nagisa~, it's not any different from any other part of your body. It only seems different because of the taboos and customs that most people have...
Chell, I'm so sorry... I understand how you must feel. I'm... not really sure if I ever had parents? The Elders must have created me somehow, but they never told me... and now they're gone.
Um, Fluttershy... I hope this isn't inappropriate to say, but you're quite beautiful in a... way that's rather new to me. What sort of... being... are you?
So, Miko... as I recall, you aren't currently acting as the Crown Prince of... what was it called again?
Um, Chara, if it's alright for me to ask this... how exactly do you know ~player~? The two of you seem very familiar with one another already...
So, Chara, it sounds as though ~player~ embarked on some sort of adventure with you, which resulted in your revival... What exactly was your mission together?
We did it, Supernova! We'll run her out of items sooner or later...
Well done, Supernova. She can't stop us if we work together!
We'll take you down one strip at a time, Chara...
Oh, thank the Moons. She can't hold out against us forever!
Looks like the odds weren't in your favor this time, Chara...
That's one step closer to your defeat, Chara.
You did it, Supernova! You'll run her out of items sooner or later...
Well done, Supernova. She can't stop you!
Take her down one strip at a time, Supernova...
Oh, thank the Moons. She can't hold out against you forever, Supernova!
So, how did you and ~player~ end up here, Chara? I suppose after all that you've been through, it makes sense to want some time to relax...
So, Natsuki, you belong to some sort of "Literature Club", is that... er... I'm so sorry, am I distracting you? It's your turn to strip, but you're still...
Um, Natsuki, it sounds like you didn't even intend to come here...? If you didn't agree to this, there's no need for you to continue playing... Not that I object if you decide to stay, of course...
Well, um... I suppose that's true, but you lost six times before revealing your tactics, didn't you? Not that I mean to criticize you, I suppose you are much more experienced at this than I am...
You seem a bit new to this sort of thing, is that right, Penny? I've gotten quite accustomed to playing here, but it wasn't so long ago that I was playing my first game...
~Estelle~, you mentioned there was a great deal of corruption in your Empire... That sounds like a difficult situation. Is anything being done to address it...?
How exactly does this "Guild Union" you mentioned work, ~estelle~? We have a Sailor's Guild in Arcadia, but I don't think it has much political power anywhere...
I wonder if this guild system wouldn't be a better model for Arcadia than kings and emperors, ~estelle~. Among Air Pirates and nationless sailors, we might be able to implement it quite soon...
Oh, you're going to do a magic trick? I don't think I've ever seen this sort of magic before...
Oh my, what's going on! You're summoning something, Lucy?
Oh, now it would be ~nami_szs~'s turn to strip?
Oh, I think this means ~nami_szs~ lost. Or would have, if she were still here.
It's kind of fun pretending ~nami_szs~ is still here, isn't it? Maybe we should invite imaginary players more often.
(I wonder what ~nami_szs~ would take off if she were actually playing with us... Oh no, I shouldn't imagine that! She didn't give us permission to undress her in our minds, either!)
Oh, ~nami_szs~, it's your turn. What do you want to take off? Nothing? I see...
Well, Miko, now that you're no longer... um, being an oppressive dictator, what do you typically do? You aren't still conquering people and forcefully spreading harmony, I hope...?
You seem a bit new to this sort of thing, is that right, Penny? It's new to me too, to be honest.

Tojiko, Miko, I want to apologize for my conduct earlier... I don't think we're going to agree on everything, but that's no reason we can't get along. Our conversation just... hit something of a sore spot for me...
You seem a bit new to this sort of thing, is that right, Penny? This isn't my first game here, but it's still relatively new to me as well.
Oh? I don't know much about liquid oceans, but I'd be quite interested to hear about the problems you're referring to, Magma.
Magma, the problems with your liquid oceans causing floods and destroying coasts sound quite serious. I'd never thought about how dangerous such large amounts of liquid would be before...
Magma, is there any... um... literature I could read concerning this aquatic creature problem? I just don't understand why they'd be any more dangerous than land or air-dwelling creatures...
Has your crew had much trouble with pirates, ~nami~? If your world is anything like mine, it seems you'd inevitably run into a few on the seas, and they can be quite dangerous... I'd know, I suppose.
Has your crew had much trouble with pirates, ~nami~? As the saying goes, where there is treasure, there will be Air Pirates... or Water Pirates, I suppose, in your case.
~Nami~, your crew must be quite well armed, to be able to compete against so many different factions... Fighting pirates can be particularly dangerous. I guess I'd know, wouldn't I?
So, ~rosa~, in your world, Trainers typically battle their Pokémon against each other... Are there organizations that regulate or support that, like a "Trainer's Guild" or something?

case.state: So, ~rosa~... what are the rules of a Pokémon battle? If I battled you with Cupil, how exactly would that work?

state.text: ~Monika~, if this isn't too personal of a question, what were the "difficult times" you said you and ~player~ went through together? Did you end up fighting together in some larger conflict?

case.state: Oh, no... Um, ~larachel~, do you think you'd like to take a break from this game...?
~Larachel~, gods or not, it's your own strength of will you should trust in. There's still a chance that you could win, so please, don't let this discourage you...

state.text: Well... what about you, ~hu_tao~? How would you prefer to be laid to rest? Though, I suppose the life of a funeral director can't be so dangerous, so perhaps thinking about that is a bit premature...

Well, if you're interested in talking about death... How would you prefer to be laid to rest, ~hu_tao~? Ah... though, perhaps that's a bit premature, since you seem quite young, and funerals don't seem very perilous...
Well, everything else aside... what are things like at your school, ~monika~? I don't know much about schools, but they sound like a much more enriching environment than the one I was raised in...

I'm so sorry for overreacting, ~monika~... I suppose you're not much different from any other sort of artificial lifeform, and my people created plenty of those. It just... wasn't really what I was expecting...

That was certainly an... impressive trick you did, ~monika~. It's... really just sleight of hand? If you're skilled in some sort of actual magic, I'm not sure why you'd conceal it in a place like this one...

Alright, ~barbara~, I'm ready to start... Moons, please give us your blessing and bathe us in your light as we play together. Red Moon, grant us strength and courage to overcome embarrassment and fear...

~Cynthia~, an archaeological expedition sounds like an excellent way to learn more about our past. Surely there are experts we could recruit to our crew to assist us with that... Actually, would you want to come along?
Um, Miko... I understand you're known as the "Crown Prince"? Does that mean you govern a kingdom?
Wait... what? Aimee, what are you doing?!
N-no, Aimee! You can't be serious... aaah!!!
No, Aimee, please don't... aaah!!!
Wait, Aimee, can't you reconsider... aaah!!!
No, hold on, Aimee, you really shouldn't... aaah!!!
Aimee, this really isn't safe at... aaah!!!
No, Aimee, what if you hurt some---aaah!!!
Aimee, please don't do th---aaah!!!
So, ~yuelia~ lost... um... I'm very curious to see what you're going to strip. Are you even wearing anything?

Um, ~saki_zls~... I think you said something about... not being a "zombie" earlier. It's a little embarrassing, but I'm actually not familiar with zombies... Can you tell me more about what you... aren't?
Um, Lux... I gather from your armor that you're a warrior of some sort. If I may ask... who or what do you fight for?
Chell, I hope this isn't inappropriate to ask, but... do you talk? Or does Wheatley do the talking for you? Um, I guess Wheatley can answer this too if you aren't able to...
Senko, um... may I ask why you are so invested in "pampering" others? Surely you must need some pampering yourself now and then, so to speak.
So, um, Wikipe-tan... you seem very learned about many subjects... It's quite impressive, actually. Do you belong to some sort of academic... council?
Lucy, is it true that you didn't know we were playing strip poker when you started the game? Um... shouldn't your guild be taking better care of you than that...?
So, ~nami~, you're a navigator on a ship, is that right? Actually, I also sail on a ship with my friends, Vyse and Aika.
Um, ~meia~, I'm not familiar with the clothes you're wearing... Is that a traditional outfit from your culture, or does it have some more specialized purpose?
So, um, Elesa... did you say you're a "Gym Leader"? I don't think I'm familiar with that occupation... Is that some sort of... exercise instructor?
Um, you said you're new to this game, isn't that right, Hilda? I'm also quite new to poker in any form, let alone strip poker... but the best way to learn something is to do it, I suppose.
~Lucina~, you mentioned you'd reached... the past? Did you mean you somehow... traveled back to an earlier time? I didn't think that was possible...
Um, Jura, you already seem very comfortable here... Are you accustomed to playing games like this? It's a relatively new experience for me...
Revy, I understand you're a pirate as well? You do look like the sort of person I'd expect to see at the tavern on Sailor's Island...

In addition to not being a zombie, there was something else you weren't as well, correct, ~saki_zls~? ...An "idol", I think it was? The only idols I've encountered have been ancient statues or figurines...
Um, so... "~critical_darling~" is what you go by? I think you said you have ice powers... Are you skilled in Purple magic? You're even wearing the appropriate color...
So, um, ~rosa~... I understand you're a "Pokémon Trainer"? What... does that consist of, exactly? I'm not very familiar with Pokémon...
Um, Yuri... is it true you belong to a "literature club" of some kind? I'd be interested in learning a bit more about that...
Um, Amy Rose, correct? I'm sorry if this is too personal, but... I think you said this "Sonic" person doesn't return your feelings for him. Why do you believe that to be the case?
So, um, ~asuna_yuuki~... I think you said before that you play games a lot. Are you already experienced at strip poker, then?
So, you help people exercise properly, um... can I call you Wii for short? I'm really bad at sticking to an exercise plan... Do you have any suggestions for how to do a better job?
Oh, Senko, so now you're going to ... no, wait, you were leaving your socks for last, right?
So, Bowsette, um... you're some sort of king? Or queen, I mean, or... um... I'm sorry, I'm a little confused...
Um, Y'shtola... if it's not inappropriate to ask this, where do you come from? I don't think I've seen anyone else with clothes or features quite like yours...

So, Wikipe-tan... Suppose that I'm interested in being intimate with someone I already know. How would I... well, initiate that? It appears this is a situation where simply asking is often unacceptable...

So, Bernadetta... um, you go by Bernie, right? You're here for a social interaction seminar? I thought ~player~ just invited us here to play strip poker... Though, I'd like to improve my social skills as well...
Um, ~monika~, you seem to already know ~player~ quite well. Are you a friend of ~player.ifMale(his|hers)~?
So, Miko, what I really wanted to ask earlier is... when you were ruling Japan, what sort of ruler were you? Um... what was your governing... philosophy?
So, um, Polly... am I correct in saying that you're a ghost? My friend Aika has told me all about ghosts, and is quite terrified of them... but you don't seem all that frightening to me...
So, you're called the "Spider-Woman"? I'm guessing that isn't your actual name... do you usually travel in disguise this way?
~Asuna_yuuki~, I've been wondering... is there a way for me to try playing one of these elaborate games you mentioned earlier? It sounds quite interesting, but I wouldn't know where to start...

Um, ~mercy~, I understand you're a healer of sorts? That's much the same as my role in the crew... it's my job to make sure that Vyse and Aika aren't badly injured, and heal their wounds during battle.
You know, I really like your hair, Fluttershy... It's such an unusual color to me, and it's very pretty, too.
Um, Magma... is it alright if I call you that? You said something about being on a "team". Are you an athlete of some variety?
So, Charlie... you're from a sort of afterlife, correct? This "Hell" is somewhere people are supposed to go after their death...?
Sucrose, did you say that you studied plants? I can't say that I know many... details... about natural plant life, but I do love flowers...
So, I've gathered you're a researcher, Y'shtola... May I ask what you're researching? I think you've mentioned aether, but I'm not very familiar with that... subject.
Are you planning to hold any performances in the near future, ~saki_zls~? I'm curious to see what they're like...
What sorts of plants do you produce in your experiments, Sucrose? Are they alive and growing, like natural plants?
Faye, I understand you're a bounty hunter? My crew does quite a bit of bounty hunting ourselves these days... mostly hunting Black Pirates for the Sailor's Guild.
Um, Mia, you're a sort of... enforcer of laws, is that correct? What sort of government do you work for...?
Um, so, Yang... you belong to a group called "Team RWBY", is that right? If I may ask, what exactly is that team's... purpose?
Um, so, ~yuna~... I'm curious as to why you and your friends are all playing as a team. The two of you are "ghosts", correct?

Is there a practical goal to your bioalchemical studies, Sucrose? They remind me somewhat of what Ilchymis did while he was in our crew, but his ultimate goal was to create affordable medicine for the poor.

~Nami~, is there a specific mission your crew hopes to accomplish? Our goal was originally to prevent the Valuan Armada from conquering the world, but now we're mostly hunting bounties and treasure...
~Perona~, do you have the ability to float? That seems incredibly useful... Falling overboard wouldn't be nearly as dangerous for someone who could simply hover back to safety.
~Amy~, you seem really comfortable with the... um... nature of this game. Do you often play games of this sort?

Um, ~cynthia~... you're interested in the history of your world, is that correct? I've learned a fair amount of ancient history myself, though it was part of my upbringing rather than a subject of study.
Um, May... did I hear you mention you participate in... "Contests"... of some kind? What sort of contests would those be...?
Um... ~wasp~, may I ask what the purpose is of your... well, wasp theme? Do you belong to a troupe of entertainers...?
Um, Ini... are you new to this game? You seem a little... disoriented.

So, ~critical_darling~, what inspired you to become a musician? It doesn't seem as though your ice powers are very useful in that context... Though, I suppose they would get your audience's attention.

Um... Aoba, didn't you say that you make models for a living? An... old friend... of mine also loved to build models. He had a wonderfully detailed model of a sailing ship... It's a pity I can't show it to you.
Um, Dawn... did I hear you say that you research these "Pokémon" creatures? What are you interested in learning about them...?
Um... you're really a goddess, ~neptune~? I'd never met a deity before coming here... unless you count looking at the Moons from a distance, I suppose?
Um... ~komisan~, you're going to use that paper instead of speaking? You should do whatever you're comfortable with, but... did something bad happen to you that's preventing you from talking?
So, ~mercy~, what sort of team do you typically work with, anyway? What goals are you fighting for...?
So, I'm curious, ~saki_zls~... how did your group get together in the first place? Are you all... um, not zombies, or is that just you?

Um... ~rin~, I don't intend to make any... assumptions... about what you might want, but... would you be interested in an artificial arm? Our old shipmate, Drachma, had one, and it was very effective...

Um, Emi... you run for sport, correct? That's really impressive... I've gotten a lot better at running since I started adventuring with Vyse and Aika, but I don't think I could handle it as a career...

Um... "Supernova" is what you go by, correct? My impression is that you often travel between worlds... That's a bit like what Vyse , Aika and I do, although we can only travel within a single world in our ship.
Well, Miko, setting aside... everything else... for the moment, what is it that you're doing at the moment, if not ruling Japan?
Um, Miku... I gather you're a "digital singer" of some sort. I understand what a singer is, of course, but... what do you mean when you say you're "digital"?

Um, Lyralei... I'm sorry if I'm jumping to conclusions, but... you use a bow like Tikatika's, you have brightly colored hair, and you live in a forest... You aren't from Ixa'taka, by any chance, are you?
So, you've said that you're interested in history in general, Cynthia, but what is your focus right now? Is there a particular culture or event that you're interested in studying?

case.state: So, Dawn, what kind of circumstances can lead to Pokémon evolving? Do they need to eat a special food? Silver animals can evolve by consuming enough Chams, which are tiny shards of Moon Stones...
So, Dawn, what kind of circumstances can lead to Pokémon evolving? Do they need to eat a special food? Cupil evolves when he consumes enough Chams, which are tiny shards of Moon Stones...

state.text: So, um... Petra, may I ask where you come from? I'm not familiar with the marking under your eye... Is that something specific to your people?
So, what other worlds have you visited, Y'shtola? I love hearing about new places, and perhaps I could tell Vyse and Aika about them as well when I get back...
So... what other articles does Wikipedia have, Wikipe-tan? Do they cover sexual behaviors of all kinds?
So, Yuri... What are the requirements for joining your club? Are you accepting new members... and is any previous experience required?
Um... you seem like a very busy person, ~noelle~. Do you not get many opportunities to relax like this?
So, ~perona~, about your ability... Ghosts are supposed to be the lingering souls of dead people, at least, according to Aika. Does that mean you're able to command the dead...?
So, ~neptune~, what exactly does a goddess do all day...? The Moons don't do anything obvious, other than send down their Moon Stones to us, but you seem a bit more... direct.
What sort of place is Brigid, Petra? I'd never heard of it before meeting you... I gather there are forests, at least.
Um... Adora, is it true you're involved in a rebellion? Are you fighting some sort of evil empire...?
Er... Myriam, is that box intended to disguise your true identity? It's working, I suppose, but... it looks a bit, um... inconvenient.
Who do you generally fight against, ~mercy~? You said you're dedicated to preserving world peace... Is there a particular group which often puts that in jeopardy?
Um... ~mari~, is it true you're being educated at something called a "college"? What is that like...? I've never encountered something like that on my own travels...
(Moons, I wonder what sort of being Zoe is... She's a little grotesque, but strangely compelling to look at. Oh dear, I probably shouldn't be staring at her, though...)
Would you tell me more about Gensokyo, Miko? It sounds like a fascinating place... Are there many other "hermits" there like yourself?

Y'shtola, it certainly is... interesting... that your form of travel between worlds functions independently of clothing... Does one locate something to cover themselves right away, or just... continue as is?
Well, given that you pilot a fighter craft, ~meia~... who is it that you're typically fighting? If you're pirates, I imagine there are local authorities you have to contend with...
So, um... Dark Magician Girl? Is it alright if I call you "Magician" for short? I'm curious about this "dark magic" you do... That isn't done using Black Moon Stones, is it?
So, ~komisan~, you go to a school, correct? What do you learn there? I haven't ever been to one, myself, so it's interesting to me...
Um... Jessie, you're a sort of performer, right? A "porn actress"? I'm not entirely sure what that is, but I'd be interested in hearing about your work...
Um, so... ~sakura~, you're a sort of celebrity singer, right? What sort of music do you like to sing?
Um... ~msfortune~, right? Your features are... quite different from anything I've seen in Arcadia... May I ask where you're from?
Um... ~reimu~, I understand you fight "youkai"? I'm guessing those are monsters or wild animals of some variety... Is that the case?
Um, so... ~syrenne~, you're a mercenary, right? We do quite a bit of mercenary work ourselves these days... Do you do a lot of bounty hunting?
Um... ~kumatora~, you're skilled in a sort of magic as well, right? Something called PSI? I'm not familiar with that variety... Does it involve Moon Stones, or something completely different?

Have you seen anything else new or interesting after passing through that wormhole, ~meia~? Whenever we visit a new place, we find all sorts of fascinating discoveries hiding in the sky, if we look hard enough...
~Kyou~, um... what is it like at the school you attend? I've never been to such a place myself... Maybe the Valuans had such institutions, but they're certainly not common where I'm from...
So, um... it seems ~player~ invited both of us to this game, ~noire~. Are you excited to see what it'll be like?
So, ~komisan~, I meant to ask you earlier... What's your favorite thing to study at school? And, is there... anything specific you're going there to learn how to do?
~Rouge~, I've gotten the impression you're eyeing more than just our bodies. I spend most of my time around other Air Pirates, so don't think you'll just swipe everything without me noticing...

So, um... ~hu_tao~, you're a funeral director? What are funerary customs like where you come from? Air Pirates generally return the body to the sky, but if you don't sail a lot, that seems inconvenient...
Um, so... ~stocking~, you said you fight ghosts for a living...? Are you a sort of bounty hunter, or is there some organization you work for?
Well, ~meia~... we haven't talked much about your crew so far. How do you get along with them? And, is there... anyone you get along with especially well?

~Yuna_ffx~, um, I... This is presumptuous, but something about the way you speak and carry yourself feels so familiar to me... You feel like someone who was raised to fulfill a single destiny, like I was...
I think you're right, ~hu_tao~... Risking your life makes it easier to appreciate what you have, whether you're sailing though a storm, or... ah... What's something dangerous you've done recently?
Well, it's your turn, ~samus_aran~... I must say, I'm very curious to see how this... works. I can only imagine what type of bounties you're hunting if you need this level of protection...
Little Innsmouth must be quite far from where I live, ~msfortune~... I've sailed all over Arcadia with my crew, but I've never encountered beings like the ones you're describing.
Given that you were concealing your identity, ~nami~... do you suspect we're in danger here? Perhaps I shouldn't have announced myself as a pirate quite so readily...
What type of games do you normally play, ~neptune~? Apart from strip poker, I suppose... I'm not used to games, so perhaps it'll give me some ideas for what to try myself...
So, ~sakura~, you like pop music because it makes you "feel something"... Is that also why you've decided to play with us? I imagine you'll be able to feel many things in this game as well...

Hmmm... ~reimu~, even if no one pays you outright for dealing with these "incidents", are there at least opportunities to find treasure along the way? That's where the bulk of our income actually comes from.
Um, ~miki_miura~... I apologize if you get this question a lot, but is there a reason you don't use a hook or something? I've met sailors who'd lost a hand, but they all used various prosthetics...
So, ~aaravi~, where do you spend most of your time? As an adventurer, I'd imagine you spend a fair amount of it traveling, but do you have some base of operations to return to?
Well, ~barbara~, I can see that you're a very devoted person... but, I don't know much about the tenets your faith seems to possess. Who or what do you revere?

Um, ~mikan~, you're called the "Ultimate Nurse"...? You must be very skilled at tending to injuries to have earned that name. It sounds like one of the titles famous pirates receive... Only less intimidating, of course.
So, um... you're not affiliated with any pirates, are you, ~nagamimi~? You certainly have the sort of... assertive attitude I'd associate with some we've met...
So, ~critical_darling~, who else is in your group? Have you been "shredding" together long?

state.text: (So... how much does ~name~ have remaining? Well, let's see... Assuming he's wearing underwear, I'd say...)
(So... how much does ~name~ have remaining? Well, let's see... I think he had underwear last time, so if that's still true...)
(So... how much does ~name~ have remaining? Well, let's see... I believe he had no underwear last time, so if that's still true...)

A mercenary? Well, I hope you wouldn't be the type who'll do anything for gold, but I imagine that could be quite rewarding. My crew sometimes does mercenary work, hunting Black Pirates who are harming innocents.
I'm so sorry, Leonie... I thought you said you wanted to be a "night-for-hire", and I didn't know how else to interpret that. But, now I know that "knight" has a meaning I wasn't familiar with...
Er... oh my, really? ...What did you do here to merit that? (I'm starting to regret agreeing to join this game with her...)
Er... that's right, you're here under, um, special conditions... (I'm starting to regret agreeing to join this game with her...)
Oh, I see... Well, if it makes you feel any better, I don't feel as confident as I appear. But, I imagine this game would lose its excitement for someone unaffected by nudity...

Hmmm, I see... I'm not very familiar with either the Golden Deer or the Leicester Alliance, but then, I don't think I'm from your world... I'm guessing the Alliance is a faction in some larger conflict?

case.state: Oh, really? Axes must take so much arm strength to wield properly... I could never do something like that. I don't even attempt to use a melee weapon, myself...

Oh, really? Axes must take so much arm strength to wield properly... I could never do something like that. I don't even attempt to use a melee weapon, myself... I just rely on Cupil in that situation.

state.text: I'm with you, Supernova... let's do everything we can to take Chara down!

Well, I... hmm... I was about to say I haven't flirted much, but actually, I think I do it with ~marker.RemembersYourName~ all the time. In that case, perhaps I ought to view these games as an opportunity to practice...

Well, that's certainly something you could do, if you wanted to... but there's something to be said for just coming as you are. I only came here in my Silvite robes because they bring back pleasant memories...
Haha... oh, my, such prompt service. Thank you so much... You can just put them wherever you'd like.
Is that so, Yuri? I know very little about liquid oceans, but it does seem a little dangerous to just remove them without fully understanding the consequences...
Salt pans...? Then these liquid oceans contain salt as well as water, Yuri? I can see how that would complicate things, if you need to access the land underneath...

I guess pirates are a bit of a diverse lot. ~Vandread~ and I are both pirates, but we operate in two entirely different environments, and---~Nami~? Oh, it looks like you've dropped your... wanted poster?

A "pirate" can be many different things, I guess. ~Perona~ and I aren't all that alike, and we're each even less similar to a more typical pirate, such as---~Nami~? Um, I believe you've dropped something...
Oh, I see... It was sailors and Air Pirates that we had to contend with, so it was a different sort of rowdiness... but, I imagine children must cause plenty of trouble as well.
Oh, I see... Well, then it makes sense that you're careful to stay warm! Have you fallen seriously ill that way before?
No, no, you don't have to leave... I'm so sorry, I didn't intend that to be a criticism. It's just something I thought we might have in common... since I'm quite new to this game myself...
I see... so your school has its own government of sorts, run by students? How fascinating... Are there also rebel students, who oppose the Council's decisions?
Princess ~larachel~? Wait... oh no!!!
Ah... ~larachel~, be careful with your staff! Moons, those things are fragile, aren't they?

Oh, really? I had no idea ~player~ was in a literature club... But, I suppose ~player.ifMale(he's|she's)~ a bit quiet, so there are probably a lot of things I don't know about ~player.ifMale(him|her)~.
Oh, that's right... You're in the same club as ~marker.firstLiteratureClub~? Facing adversity certainly brings people closer together... So, it makes sense you'd be comfortable with each other.
Oh, that's right... I think you've told me that before. Facing adversity certainly brings people closer together... So, it makes sense you'd be comfortable with each other.
Yes, and it's better to lose modesty than money if you're learning. I've been through a number of games with ~marker.RemembersYourName~ by now, and I think it's been a lovely way to ease into it...

Hmm... I've certainly heard of such behavior, but I've never... well... Actually, I suppose I have done something like that at these games before. Perhaps I should take this as an opportunity to practice?
Yes, that was my view as well. The, um... stakes... of this game are a little intimidating, but, well... also quite appealing... and much better to lose modesty than money if you're just learning.

Hmm... I've certainly heard of such behavior, but I've never tried it. Although... I suppose flirtatious behavior is likely to occur at a game like this, correct? Indeed, I'm fairly certain it's already occurring in ours...

Thank you so much, Miko... Your, um, approach doesn't seem so different from Admiral Belleza's, now that I think of it. She wanted Valua to unite the world so as to prevent bloodshed between nations...

Poetry? Oh, I'd love to see some... I'm barely familiar with the subject at all, honestly. In the Great Silver Shrine, I had nothing to read but books on ancient history... and even those belonged to Ramirez...
Ah, I see... that didn't, by any chance, involve conquering those quibbling warlords, and uniting them under the banner of a single... um... "Japanian Empire", did it...?

It sounds like you're doing your job well... Storms can be so dangerous. That was the most frightening thing about encountering the arcwhale, Rhaknam... he was constantly surrounded by fog and storm clouds.

We're actually looking for a new navigator... We used to have two, but then Don left to chart a safe route through the Dark Rift, and I'm... not sure where Lawrence went. I've been trying to learn, but...
Oh! Um... really? Perhaps normal people look different, wherever you're from... I haven't met anyone else with the skin and hair colors that you have.

case.state: Oh, I see... That explains much of what I was wondering about. But, um... why do you battle them against each other? Is it a sort of training exercise?
Oh, I see... that explains much of what I was wondering about. But, um... why do you battle them against each other? Cupil helps me in battle in a similar way, but we only fight if it's necessary...

state.text: Hmmm, I see... in that case, what games do you commonly play? I have to admit, I'm not all that familiar with games in general...
I see... I've never heard of Eorzea, and I'm not familiar with miqo'te either, so I imagine you're from another world altogether. I'm certainly not from anywhere that resembles the Inventory, myself.
~Player~ revived you after your death? That's very impressive... I didn't know you were that skilled at Silver magic, ~player~. But, I can see why the two of you might be close after that...

~Player~ revived you after your death? I can see why the two of you might be close after that... Vyse and Aika have saved my life now more times than I can count, and I certainly feel close to them as a result.
Oh? What kinds of animals do you usually work with? I'm not very familiar with "animal rescue centers", but it certainly sounds nice based on the name.
I see... there aren't many Moon Stones in your world, then, compared to hers? I think it might be embedded Moon Stones that cause our islands to float, so that would make some sense.
Thank you so much, I'd love to try one... I could pay you for it, too, assuming it doesn't cost more than my share of our last treasure-hunting expedition.
Oh, I know what you mean... I love my crew, but they can be a handful from time to time. Especially since Vyse insists on never running from a single fight, even if it's completely inconsequential...
Thank you, Fluttershy... I'm quite fond of it myself. Though, the strands in front can get in my eyes in the middle of a battle... that's a bit of a liability, I have to admit.

That's horrifying... I can't believe ~player~ would do something like that. But if that's truly the... nature... of you and ~player~... why are you playing strip poker instead of slaughtering and conquering?
I never imagined ~player~ would take part in something so... malevolent... but if you're a demon of slaughter, Chara, why are you playing with us at all? Strip poker doesn't seem very demonic...

Tojiko, I don't mean to suggest that there's never any cause for violence... but our fight against the Valuan Armada was to free people from absolute monarchs. People shouldn't be controlled like that...
Oh, I see... then you're a pilot of one of these "Dreads"? Is that a class of ship I'm not familiar with...? It sounds like a Valuan ironclad or something from the name...
Oh, I see! That sounds really courageous, then... especially if your government's laws are as unjust as the Valuan Empire's used to be. We had to defend innocent people from them all the time...

Oh, that sounds so exciting... What parts do you have left to map? Or are you not sure how much there is? We've mapped most of Arcadia, though it helps that I've seen Silvite maps of the ancient world.
Oh, how exciting, a treasure hunt... Our world doesn't really have a "greatest treasure", unless you count the Moon Crystals. What is this "One Piece" supposed to consist of?
Oh, I see, hunting a legendary treasure must be thrilling... But, if it's that famous, I imagine many others are trying to find it as well. Do you have a lot of competition?

Oh, I see... The idea of alternate worlds is fascinating to me as well. We've explored most of our own, but if I told Vyse that there were entirely new ones to discover, I can only imagine his excitement...
I see... That sounds quite dangerous. But I take it the two of you managed to escape the monsters, and return to the surface world?
I see... If that's the case, your abilities must be quite spectacular when combined. Is your producer some sort of powerful Silver mage...?

I see, ~amy_rose~... But he hasn't outright told you he's not interested, he just won't give you an answer? Well, it sounds like you're further along than I am... I still haven't even brought the subject up with Vyse.
I see... And what sort of competition does your team participate in? Do you compete in that "Pokémon League" I've heard alluded to by the regulars here?

Oh, that actually sounds similar to my group... We've had people from all over the world in our crew, from Ixa'taka to Yafutoma, and our battle against the Valuan Empire was to bring about peace as well...
Oh, that's right, your world has oceans of water, doesn't it? What would be so bad about falling in the water, though? You at least might be able to swim back to your ship...
Oh, I think I understand what you mean, Lux... I'm still proud to be a Silvite myself, although I disagree with most or maybe even everything they've done. What is Demacia like?
I suppose most people just aren't used to the idea---at least, not anyone I know... But, it's also rare for someone to meet a Silvite, so perhaps you're not so different from me in that sense.
I see... That sounds like a lovely tradition. What sort of beings are these "forest spirits"? Have you met one, or do they remain distant?
Well... how about starting with the First itself? What did you see when you... initially arrived there?
Oh, that sounds so useful... I'd love to attend one, though I don't know if they accept Arcadian students... What sort of music are you studying?
Then, that's really it? Just... to win, no matter who you harm in the process? Not even some grand plan for reshaping the world to suit yourself? Or just seeing everyone naked in this game?
Oh, I see... I guess I was thinking of a little girl we once met, who couldn't speak anymore because of what happened to her parents... Maria just rang a little bell whenever she needed something.
Oh...? Is that ~clothing~ of yours a sentient companion of some sort, ~msfortune~? ...Or are you just using colorful language again?
Oh... your collar's next... (Well, at least I know what's coming this time...)
Oh, I see... Well, that doesn't sound like such a bad way to handle things. A lot of people are more reasonable after a few drinks, in my experience... Though it does depend on the person.
Oh, I see... I'm sorry for the confusion. Was it one of your colleagues who caused the accident, then? How did something like that happen, anyway?
There are many different groups who call themselves pirates, I suppose. Some are just ruthless, some are only trying to survive, and some even... drop things? Oh, ~nami~, I think you've...

Yes, bad luck can be so deadly for a sailor... It sounds like you have enough luck to get by, even if things don't always... go as planned? Um, speaking of which, I believe you've dropped something...
Oh, I'm so sorry... I don't really have... servants, or want to have them, but I understand how hard it is to lose someone close to you... But, piracy is a dangerous life, I suppose.
Interesting... Do you know where that stone comes from? Moon Stones fall from the six Moons of Arcadia... I'm curious as to whether your Pitch-Black Power Stone's origin is at all similar.

Oh, interesting... That's a lot of variation. I can see why you're interested in studying this process, as it's not at all obvious to me why so many different species would experience it for such different reasons...
Really? You find it boring? I... well, fair enough, I suppose. I'd be very interested in attending such a place myself, but I suppose staying indoors for so long could get quite tedious...
I see... "Pop" music? I can't say I'm familiar with that... But, I'm not terribly experienced with music in general, for that matter. Does it involve instruments that burst?
Hmm, not as such... I've never seen a ghost in Arcadia, although Aika assures me that they exist. But, we do have experience hunting ordinary mortals for the Sailor's Guild...

Oh, my... That sounds like quite an undertaking. Such an event would have to be tens of thousands of years in the past, right? Perhaps even millions... At least, that's what I'd expect from my own world...
I see... I'm not sure what all of those things are, but that does sound like a challenging situation. Is there no one positioned to protect ordinary people from all that conflict?
Me...? Well, my people, the Silvites, typically vaporized the body entirely. That way, it could return to the void from which it first eme---oh, my... Is that an... um... occupational hazard?
I see... May I ask what you would have done if you had been chosen? I'm curious about your... philosophy of governance, I suppose...
Ah, you're quoting something, right...? So, the idea is to have multiple guilds with their own specialties, and have them collaborate to support one another?
You don't need a reason not to want one, I suppose. They're quite effective in combat, if Drachma's mechanical arm was anything to go by, but I gather you're not engaged in that often...
That's... quite a bit more structure than is typical where I'm from... I suppose you're like the Ixa'takan High Priest, then? Do your nuns guard some ancient ruin or forgotten secrets?
Oh... then it's not unlike the way my people raised Ramirez. That's... a great deal of responsibility for one person, isn't it? Even if you're tremendously skilled, just mentally speaking...
...Green Moon, grant us resilience and endurance for all that may come. Blue Moon, send your breeze to relax us and renew our breath. Yellow Moon, strike us with your energy to incite our passions...
I see... That sounds important, and not just logistically speaking. You wouldn't want to end up like the Valuan Empire, who dealt with their energy shortages by trying to conquer other nations...
I see... What other skills would those be? I assume the ability to fly is one of them, but... are you an experienced warrior as well?

Is that so? Valua is quite well known around the world, especially after they attempted to conquer most of it. You and I must be from different worlds altogether, or at least different periods of time...

How fascinating... Actually, I... have something similar in my own body, although it's not visible from the outside. It's even located in the same place, only embedded deeper... That's quite an interesting coincidence...
I see... We do some mercenary work ourselves, especially nowadays, but it's usually bringing in bounties on behalf of the Sailor's Guild. Are there specific employers you commonly work for?
Oh, I didn't expect your life to have so much in common with my own... Then, you're sort of like an adventuring monarch, who takes her people's well-being into her own hands?
Oh, I see... well, that does sound like a rewarding occupation, I suppose. I guess it's not so different from what we Blue Rogues do, stealing treasure to use to help people in need...
Oh no... Florina? I feel like we should do something, but honestly... maybe she'd be better off not staying in this game? I don't want anyone here to be uncomfortable...
Oh! Now you're a human? Or... certainly not a butterfly any more. I guess that will make stripping a lot more feasible...
That sounds really useful, ~yuelia~... I'd love to have something like that, myself...
That would be quite interesting, actually... um... I'm so sorry, Sucrose, but I couldn't quite hear that...
Oh, I see... That does sound consistent with what I know about farming. Although, I know very little about the subject, so that wouldn't be difficult...
Powers...? Oh, I think I see... you're dressed like a wasp because it's thematically appropriate for the unusual abilities you have? Is that a common practice where you're from?
Hmmm... oh, I think I see. In your world, a liquid ocean rests on top of solid land that then can't be developed. I see why that might be a concern...

Hmmm... does the water really serve no function, Magma? Surely it would be useful for drinking... although I suppose if water is so plentiful that it forms an ocean, its scarcity isn't much of a concern.
That certainly sounds like an improvement over my own upbringing. I wonder if---ah, remove it like what? Um... what...?

Oh...? Are you not an ordinary human, then? You certainly seem like one to me, but I suppose one can't necessarily tell just by looking... But, how exactly is this Immernachtreich "beyond comprehension"?
Well, I'm not surprised there's no Ultimate Pirate... It doesn't seem like an obvious subject to teach formally. I'm guessing it's a school for talented individuals?
Well... not really, but I at least understand being interested in efficiency, as my people were very concerned with it. They even controlled our reproduction, to avoid overpopulation...
Well, it depends on what you mean by "civilized". If the sort of arrogant disregard for life many nobles possess is more "civilized" than us pirates, I'd much prefer barbarity...
Just your ~clothing~? That seems fair, given how revealing your attire is in the first place... it wouldn't be much fun to show everything so quickly.
You know, you really know how to put together an outfit, ~name~. Your ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(go|goes)~ perfectly with the rest of your attire...
(~Name~ has such beautiful, dark skin... and her ~clothing~ complement~clothing.ifPlural(|s)~ it really nicely, ~clothing.ifPlural(don't they|doesn't it)~?)
Oh, did you forget about ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~? Or were you just... um... eager?
Ah, that's right... I had completely forgotten about your ~clothing~...
Oh... are you still going to remove your ~clothing~, then? I had almost forgotten you were wearing ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it)~...
Really? You're going to take off your ~clothing~, when we can already see everything?
Oh, you're not going to leave your ~clothing~ on for the rest of the game, then? Never mind...
Your ~clothing~? As a separate layer, when you're already so exposed? Isn't that a little silly?
You forgot you were wearing that, didn't you? Well, it's not too late, I suppose...
Are you trying to throw us off by undressing in an unexpected order, ~name~?
Oh...? It's your ~clothing~ you're going for, not your...
Um... your ~clothing~ is next? Isn't that a bit of an odd way to do things?
It's not a bad idea to let everyone see a little extra before getting around to little things like your ~clothing~, ~name~. Perhaps I should try that in the future...
I think it's easier to appreciate your ~clothing~ when we can see a bit more of you, ~name~. It really accentuates your natural beauty...
Well, so long as you don't go over the limit of eight items, I see no reason why you shouldn't count your ~clothing~ as a layer as well, ~name~...
Is there a particular reason you didn't remove your ~clothing~ earlier, ~name~?
Oh, I think I miscounted how many layers you had left, ~name~... I'd believed you were finished taking off items that small.
(~Name~ seems to be looking at ~man~ quite a lot. Well, I can hardly blame her... ~Man~ is certainly very attractive.)
(~Name~ seems to be looking at the men here quite a lot. I certainly can't blame her for being interested, they're all quite attractive...)
(~Name~ is... really looking me up and down, isn't she? Is she... interested in me?)

case.state: (~Name~ is... I think she's trying to look at my breasts? Does she... is she attracted to women?)
(It feels like ~name~ is looking at me a lot more now that I'm... like this... I'm not sure how I should interpret that...)
(I'm almost certain ~name~ is watching me intently... and she is really beautiful, isn't she? I think it's helping...)
(I really think ~name~ has been watching me do this... maybe she's just curious about my, um, technique? I thought she only liked men...)
Um, ~name~... I can see you're looking at me. It's alright with me if you stare...
(~Name~ seems awfully interested in watching me now that I'm exposed... well... I can relate a little, I suppose...)

state.text: Oh, but your ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(look|looks)~ so nice on you, ~name~... I'll be a little sad to see ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it)~ go.
Haha, so now ~name~ will take off her ~clothing~...
(It's too bad ~name~ is only taking off her ~clothing~, which hardly ~clothing.ifPlural(cover|covers)~ anything. But it would be ungrateful to say so, so I'll keep quiet...)
Just your ~clothing~? Well, fair enough, I suppose...
~Name~, ~clothing.ifPlural(are|is)~ your ~clothing~ studded with Moon Stones or some equivalent? I've found ~clothing.a~ ~clothing~ with special properties can be quite useful in a tight spot...

case.state: Wow, you've kept ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ on for this long? I should be taking notes...
I'm clearly lagging behind ~name~... do I need to change my strategy?
Is there still time for me to catch up to ~name~?
Cupil seems willing to help you with your ~clothing~, if you'd like. {Cupil}[Chirp!]{!reset}
Oh, you're counting your ~clothing~ as ~clothing.ifPlural(accessories|an accessory)~ as well? Maybe you ought to count as an accessory, Cupil, do you think that's fair? {Cupil}[Chirp?]{!reset}
{Cupil}[Chirp, chirp?]{!reset} No, it's okay, Cupil... I'm just a little disappointed because this round it's just ~name~ taking her ~clothing~ off, and I don't think that will arouse me very much.
(Really? Just her ~clothing~, even though I'm here masturbating? I guess she's more concerned about winning than being intimate with me...)
Oh, my... I really did lose rather badly, didn't I...?
...You're really rubbing salt in the wound, aren't you, ~name~? (That... helps a little, for some reason...)
I think I should have counted Cupil as an accessory, so ~name~ had something more interesting to remove while I was in this position. {Cupil}[Chirp?]{!reset}
I should probably be annoyed that you've still got your ~clothing~ on after all this time, ~name~, since I'm here and... well... you can see quite well enough...
You're really in a good position, aren't you, ~name~? I've already lost, so it doesn't much matter to me.
I lost awfully quickly, didn't I? I'll have to do a little better next time...
You're doing quite well, aren't you, ~name~?
Cupil, ~name~'s ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(are|is)~ all very well, but... you'll always be my favorite accessory. {Cupil}[Chirp!]{!reset}

state.text: You're taking off your ~clothing~? ~clothing.ifPlural(Those seem|That seems)~ like a prime example of an "accessory" from what I know about those. Which isn't much...
Even after all our travels, there's still much to discover in our world. Aika's been excited about a lost treasure believed to exist somewhere in an ancient ruin hidden on the Valuan continent...
We've seen a lot of Arcadia, but there's always more to discover. Aika suspects that a fabulous treasure is hidden somewhere at the bottom of the great lake atop Mount Kazai...
Though we've sailed all around our world, we can't have seen everything there is to see yet. Aika's heard of a magical fruit tree that supposedly grows only in a single grove somewhere in Ixa'taka...
(That's odd, ~name~ seems unusually nervous around me. Why might that be...?)

case.state: (~Name~ seems awfully interested in watching me now that I'm exposed... Maybe she's like I used to be. I hope I can... help her understand herself better...)

state.text: Counts the number of accessories a female opponent removes. Fina will comment if there are a lot of them.
A... "night-for-hire"...? I... didn't think that sort of work fell under the definition of a mercenary at all. I must still have much to learn about what the word means...
Ah, I see... so you're fighting on behalf of your nobility. Well... going to war for political reasons can be... destructive, for all sides involved, but... it's hard to avoid if you're under attack.
What?! ~Perona~, what did you do to ~nami~? You can't just attack other players like that!

I see, that does seem consistent with what I've seen before. Thank you so much, Wikipe-tan... I'll begin flirting more immediately. I'm sure you won't object to that, right, ~marker.RemembersYourName~?

In that case, ~nagisa~, I think your uniform was exactly the right choice... And, if you're concerned that you're wearing it too much, perhaps removing it with us will even help you feel better about that.
Of course, ~nagisa~... And the same to you, for that matter. Regardless of your outfit, you're here to enjoy yourself too, right?
Well, just let me know if you're getting too cold, alright? If you lose a lot of clothing and feel uncomfortably chilly, I'd be happy to share body heat with you...
Yes, it's so hot here that I doubt you'll be cold even if you end up completely nude... I'm glad we decided to play somewhere warm. It seems very appropriate for this game...
Oh, my... Well, those certainly sound like serious problems, and we don't have any of them with oceans of air... but you don't think this is the correct solution, Yuri?

But Yuri, surely there are fish living in the skies as well. Couldn't one fish there instead? Although... I'm not sure why aquatic creatures would be so much more dangerous than those on land or in the air...
Haha... Perhaps it's just because I haven't known many children before, but... that sounds quite nice. I don't think I'd mind that sort of trouble...
Yes, this is actually my very first time playing a game like this. I'm a little nervous myself, but I'm also excited... and I want both of us to have a good time here, so let's do this together...
Yes, I've attended these games in the past, but it wasn't so long ago that I was in your position. And, I want both of us to have a good time here... So, let's do this together...
Yes, it doesn't seem too cold here, so hopefully you're right. Just let me know if you're having trouble, and I'll do whatever I can to help...

Oh, my... Then, Sakagami relies on strength of arms to enforce the Council's will? Well, I suppose that's sometimes necessary, but... by itself, it doesn't seem like the best approach in the long term...

Oh, I'm so sorry about your staff... Um, but... you're not the sort of princess who rules with an iron fist, are you? I'm not... terribly fond of that variety... (And I'd be lying if I said she didn't have the right attitude...)
It must be so difficult having to replace your staves all the time... I can only imagine how often they must break in battle. I'm, um, still not sure how I feel about you being a princess, though...
Playfulness... I should be able to manage that, I think. In that case, I'll begin flirting right away. Thank you so much for your advice, Wikipe-tan...
In that case, perhaps I ought to use this as an opportunity to practice my flirting skills... Thank you so much for your advice, Wikipe-tan. I'll do my best to behave flirtatiously...
Oh my, really? What did it look like? Um... assuming it's not inappropriate to ask that.
A "piano"? I think I've heard of those... They're popular in Valua, I believe, though I've never seen one before. It involves keys that you press to produce musical notes?
Oh, thank you so much, ~mari~... I'd love to hear you play something on the piano. I've never even seen one before, though I understand they're popular in Valua.
Right, that's a Valuan instrument, I think... I'm sorry to hear it can be stressful, though. Is that because of all the expectations you have to keep up with?

case.state: Oh, I see... I hadn't really thought about combat as something fun in and of itself... But, I suppose if everyone involved is having a good time and no one gets badly hurt, there's no harm in it...
Oh, I see... Well, I'm not used to thinking of combat as enjoyable by itself, but if there's no risk of any serious harm... Does that sound fun to you, Cupil? {Cupil}[Chirp!]{!reset}

state.text: Oh, arcwhales are large flying creatures that look a bit like fish, with big rounded heads... and that sounds like a good idea. I'd love to hear about some of the things you've seen on your own travels.
Oh, that's an interesting staff... Is it magical, the way it extends like that? Um, but that sounds like a good idea... I'd love to hear about some of the things you've seen on your own travels.
Hmm, alright... Maybe I should do some research on traversing sky rifts. They weren't an issue in the Delphinus, but our current ship's an ordinary wooden one, not a steel-hulled Valuan vessel.
Oh... well, yes, Fluttershy, we're often engaged in battle... mostly against Black Pirates. But, it's part of our code to only attack armed vessels... typically those who harm or steal from others.
Oh, my... is that so? Moons, I hope I can actually get home again after this game! Do you know if I'll be able to, ~player~?
Oh, my... That does sound dangerous. Well, I've played games here before and always made it home safely, so the Inventory doesn't seem to be that sort... Not that it'd likely stop Vyse either way.

Oh, like the Dark Rift, perhaps... Our compasses didn't work in there at all, and the topology didn't even seem to make sense. We never mapped that, though our old navigator is trying to chart it now...
Oh, my, that sounds incredibly dangerous... How are you getting around in the Grand Line at all, if your compass doesn't work?
Oh, that's very unfortunate... Why did you eat the fruit if it was going to curse you? Though, I suppose you'd have to know it was cursed beforehand to avoid it...
Wh-what?! What under the six Moons?!
Wh-what?! Your head is.... (It's just like it was with ~marker.seenHeadOff~, but why...?)

Well, it seems people from many different worlds gather here... My world consists of floating islands in a vast sky, which is quite different from this world. So, I doubt you're any odder than the rest of us...

Oh, my... That actually sounds a little like what Vyse, Aika and I have been doing, though not in a game... but, I can certainly see the appeal of that, if one lacks a ship and crew to adventure with.
Yes, I find it quite fascinating... Even in the great city of Nasrad, we didn't encounter such diversity as can be found here. It's like a hundred worlds all meeting at a single point...
Determination...? I've never heard of someone returning to life by sheer willpower alone... Someone else's determination, no less.
Yes, I could imagine that returning from the dead would have to come in several stages... It sounds like a complex process. I can revive the recently fallen, but this sounds like more than that...

Oh! If you don't know what Moon Stones are, then I have to assume they aren't common in either your or Twilight's world. They're so useful for devices and working magic, you'd surely have heard of them.
I see... I'd like to see such creatures someday. I think I've heard patrons at the Inventory mention dogs and cats before, but I've never actually met one.

...That's what I was afraid of. Miko, your regime was surely little different from the Valuan Empire, power-hungry and ruthless. I can't say I'm sorry you fell from grace, as tyrants always do in the end.
Yes, fortunately... Vyse keeps the enemy focused on him, and I support him and Aika from the back. Your teammates do the same for you, I hope?
Well, if you're certain it won't be a problem for you... I suppose I don't even know whether your world uses gold as currency. It seems to be pretty much universal on Arcadia, but...
Tojiko, I'm still not convinced that founding an empire is the best way to achieve peace... but, hers does sound much less oppressive than the examples I've seen in my own world, I suppose.

I see... You're not a being of slaughter, so much as one of... victory. But... no victory is worth taking so many lives. Even if you aren't here to kill me this time... you're still a force that must be stopped.
I see... That sounds lovely. In that case, I can understand why my people didn't emphasize it... Silvites tended to only care about art that was also practical, like clothing or architecture.
Oh, my... Those do sound like serious problems, ones we don't have with oceans of air... Well, I suppose you probably understand your own world better than I do, so I'll take your word for it, Magma.

Um... but, surely there are also such dangers both on land and in the air? Our skies are absolutely filled with dangerous creatures that attack ships. I really don't understand this argument, Magma...
Well, I do worry that such governments inevitably become corrupt, but it's the expansion rather than the administration that concerned me most---Oh, um, what is that you were wearing, by the way...?
Hmmm... well, that's certainly odd. Perhaps he owns some sort of powerful Silver artifact, then? Anyone can use a Riselem Box to revive the recently fallen, after all...
Oh, my... That sounds very challenging. It was only the Valuan Empire that was interested in the Moon Crystals, so at least we didn't have to fight off other pirates while we searched for them.
Well, a mountain of jewels is certainly more what I'd expect from a legendary treasure, but I suppose something good to eat wouldn't be so bad. Perhaps it's a legendary fruit tree?
Oh, my... That sounds incredible. So if ~player.ifMale(he|she)~ was in mortal danger or made some crucial mistake, ~player.ifMale(he|she)~ could just... try again?

Thank you so much, Mercy, I feel the same way... Perhaps if our goals are aligned, we should consider working together? If there's strife in your world at present, maybe the Blue Rogues could assist you...
I see... Small and mobile, but powerful on offense? We had a ship like that once, but it was just a heavily modified fishing boat... These sound more like they're designed with that role in mind.
I suppose so... I'm certainly not likely to forget meeting you, ~neptune~.
Oh, my, that sounds incredible... um... and quite embarrassing. The sight sounds incredible, and the nudity embarrassing, I mean... Though actually, both of those...

I'm glad to hear you say that, ~monika~. I've gotten the impression myself that ~player~ is someone who can be relied on... So, it's good to know that you feel the same way about ~player.ifMale(him|her)~...

I see... Well, I can sympathize with ~player.ifMale(him|her)~... I certainly wasn't very outgoing myself when I first left the Great Silver Shrine. I'd be interested in learning more about ~player~...
Ah... I'm so sorry, I suppose you can't really write and undress at the same time, can you? Um... don't worry about responding to any of that. It was just an observation, anyway...
Oh my... ah... That's still kind of a shock when you do that...
Hmm... alright, that does sound quite complicated. I'm guessing Ala Mhigo was one of those defining events that sets a great many more things into motion than one could have anticipated...
Fair enough... I imagine there's much to recount. But, I gather it all had something to do with repelling these "Warriors of Darkness"?

Well, alright, I can't expect you to explain everything... Was it something hidden in this "Crystal Tower" that was responsible? That sounds like the sort of place you'd find ancient magic, or long-forgotten secrets...

Hmm... sounds like when there's a bounty out for a Black Pirate, we defeat them in combat, and they usually end up mending their ways and becoming our friends. It's surprising how often that works, isn't it?
Yes, extending your life doesn't render you immune to harm, I suppose. The Silvite Elders did something similar to themselves, and even lasted thousands of years, but... now they're gone as well.
I see. so it's designed to help people keep their spirits up... That sounds quite nice. You do seem like the sort of person who'd be proficient in such a style...
Er... ~monika~... what did you just do? Exactly what is going on in this game?

Oh, I see... Because ghosts are spirits unhappy with how they died, right? Or, so Aika says... Anyway, I think I'd rather die the Air Pirate way, and be released into the sky. That's where all my friends are now...
I understand... I'd never be able to trust myself with such power. I'm not convinced anyone should have it... But, perhaps the problem is that kindhearted people rarely seek it...
What an interesting idea... I'm not sure I've seen anything like that on Arcadia. Groups of sailors and Air Pirates collaborate informally, but using it to run an entire nation...
At least we can agree about that part of the game... Well, if that's all you want to achieve to~background.time~, I'll just have to beat you at your own game, and strip you of everything you have...

I suppose we at least have that interest in common... Well, I won't complain about having to do something I was already interested in when I decided to come here, but... nevertheless, I'm quite eager to see you fail...
I... see. Well... I can't deny that that sounds beyond my mind's capacity to... accept. Perhaps we should stick to more mundane and... grounded... matters from now on...
You know so much about the details... Perhaps the ancients were aware of such things, but today, I doubt even the Valuans have access to the kind of evidence that must be necessary to conclude that.
An "Ultimate Princess"? Does being a princess require talent beyond being born into the right family? I suppose one could be an exemplar of some ideal of royal behavior, but...
Oh, is that so? Well... if Yafutoman warriors like Jao and Mao can fight unarmed against skilled opponents, I suppose there's no reason you can't be dangerous in "unhanded" combat as well...

...Purple Moon, give us clear sight and cold reason to achieve victory... And Silver Moon, purify our souls, and let us fear neither death nor life... Calm our spirits, and let us not be swayed by the flesh, but grant us peace.

An... enterprise? Some sort of mercantile guild? I'm so sorry, I shouldn't interrogate you like this... You likely didn't come to this game with an entire speech prepared about your organization's purpose.

Well... it certainly doesn't sound like a good place to take a vacation. But, it does sound like there are bounties to hunt and corrupt authorities to rob... So, perhaps not such a terrible place for us to visit.
Yes, and countless innocents are inevitably harmed in the crossfire... So, I'm glad that Promepolis is interested in more, um... forward-thinking solutions than that... or, at least, that you are.
I can understand that. There's nothing like the feeling of the sun shining down on you, with a gentle breeze blowing through your hair... Perhaps they should just hold classes outdoors instead?

Yes, that's correct. It makes sense, I suppose... It's hard to get the gestures correct if you're weighed down by too much equipment. But, since I doubt I could handle that equipment anyway, it works well for me.
...Yes, I suppose that's true. All we can do at this point is make the most of what we've been given, and... make sure it's put to good use.
Well... perhaps. I don't know much about Blades, but there's not much that separates me from an ordinary human beyond my Moon Crystal. You seem a little more different than that to me...
I suppose if you can avoid detection well enough, you hardly need to fight. You certainly seem quite well-rounded... ah... Perhaps I shouldn't have chosen that... particular wording...
I suppose I feel similarly about my crew, although I work with them rather than for them. But, being... anchored... like that, by someone important to you, helps to give you purpose...
Oh, then you're a pirate too! Don't worry, ~nami~, if someone tries to turn you in, I'll help you escape. (Unless she's a Black Pirate? But she really doesn't seem like one...)
Don't worry, ~nami~, if someone tries to turn you in, I'll help you escape. We Blue Rogues should stick together...
In that case, ~yuelia~, it's a pleasure to properly meet you.
I see... Something more like the artificial plants the Elders made for us, then? I do prefer the natural variety, but I'd still be interested in hearing about your work sometime...
But, I imagine it'd be easier to understand firsthand... Would you be willing to show me some of your plants some---(Oh, she's trailing off again...)

Ah, well, I... I mean, you're right, of course. It all seemed normal to me at the time, but... Anyway, it's probably for the best that you're not concerned about making everything efficient, like they were...
Oh, those are your ears? I really like them, Sucrose... I wasn't expecting them, but there are certainly some... unusual... things about my own body, so...
Um, I hope your skirt doesn't fall down without---oh my! I'm really sorry, Lucy, but you see what I was trying to say...

That makes sense, but comfort isn't enough for me on its own... I had plenty of that when I lived in the Great Silver Shrine, but my existence there felt so... purposeless... compared to the way I live now.

Although, if we're going to Valua, hopefully we can do something for the survivors there as well. It's good that the Empire's gone, but now the innocent people who lived there are struggling to rebuild...
It's quite possible the fruit has special properties... maybe it even bestows powers on whoever eats it, like Moonberries. But, I'm still amused to see Aika so excited about legendary food...

Though, that's in Yafutoma, across the Dark Rift... we've crossed it before, but our current ship's just an ordinary wooden one. But if we can make it to one of the calm pockets, we still shouldn't get torn apart...
You're not going to get too much sun without your hat on, are you?
You know, it occurs to me that your tie looks sort of like a penis. So, it's probably better not to wear it while you're not wearing a bottom, or there might be some sort of accident.
Well, you certainly looked like a work of art with only a necklace on... but actually, I'm not sure that's changed...
Well, I appreciate that your ~clothing~ needs to come off before you can undress any further, but counting it as a separate layer? That's rather silly...
Well, that's certainly a unique way of doing things, but I'm not going to complain about getting to see more of you earlier...
Were you just, um, enthusiastic about showing yourself to us, ~name~? (Well... not that I don't sympathize...)
You've been very generous with your body so far, haven't you, ~name~? I'm sure it's making all of us happy...
(There's something strangely compelling about watching ~name~ remove ~clothing.ifPlural(little things|a little thing)~ like her ~clothing~, even while entirely... visible...)
Well, you looked quite beautiful still wearing your ~clothing~ in such a condition, but I suppose you're still beautiful without it...
Are you getting uncomfortable with this, ~name~? Or did you just want to give us... um... a preview?
(Well, that certainly isn't the order I would have chosen, but...)
It's sort of nice that you're keeping us guessing, ~name~. It's the unpredictability that makes this game exciting, after all...
Well, I certainly didn't expect that to be next, ~name~... you're full of surprises, aren't you?
I suppose I can't fault you for making... um... creative decisions about how to undress...
I almost wish you'd left your ~clothing~ on until you were nude, ~name~. That would have been quite striking, I think...
So, what are you planning for next turn, ~name~? Something big, or something small?
Thank you for making the game more interesting by letting us see some of your body before getting to your ~clothing~, ~name~... I'm sure everyone appreciates it.
Do you need to stop for a moment, ~name~? If you're removing things like ~clothing.toPlural~, I hope it doesn't mean we're going too fast for you...
Well, I don't want to rush you, ~name~... You can take off things like your ~clothing~ for a bit, if it makes you more comfortable playing with us.
Moons, ~name~, you have so many accessories! You didn't bring very many actual items of clothing, did you?
Um, be careful without your belt... You wouldn't want anything to fall off.
Do those glasses let you "zoom in", the way Vyse's glass eyepatch can? If so, I'm a little surprised you don't want to keep them, considering the nature of the game...
It feels nice to have your shoes off, doesn't it? My feet still get sore really easily, though it's a lot better than it was when I started traveling.
~clothing.ifPlural(Those ~clothing~ are|That ~clothing~ is)~ really beautiful, ~name~. People here wear so many different kinds of jewelry...
Gloves just make it harder to handle your cards, I imagine, so getting rid of them seems wise.

case.state: That's a lovely bracelet, ~name~. Does it have any special properties, or is it purely for decoration?
That's a lovely bracelet, ~name~... {Cupil}[Chirp?]{!reset} What, are you jealous, Cupil? Don't worry, you're still my favorite bracelet...

state.text: It seems removing various trinkets before getting to anything interesting is a key part of this game, yet everyone constantly complains about it. It's quite odd, when you think about it...
Well, this does put me one step closer to victory. It's rather exciting, even if it was only your ~clothing~.
Well, so long as you're removing something, I don't have any objections...
I won't complain about your removing something minor... It's all likely to come off in the end anyway, isn't it?
I sort of like going slow at first... it increases the suspense of the game, doesn't it?
(Vyse and Aika will be alright without me until this game is over, right? There's no reason to expect a Black Pirate attack...)
If things weren't slow at first, it would dilute the excitement of later rounds, don't you think?

case.state: Playing against you is like fighting a Gigas, ~name~... but I have more experience with that than you might expect. So, maybe you shouldn't let your guard down just yet...
(~name~ is going to be really hard to beat... but she hasn't beat me yet!)
I'm not sure if I'll be able to hold out against ~name~... ( But losing to her wouldn't be so bad...)
Maybe I should be annoyed, but I'm really just amused...
(Only one of us is going to get through this game without showing... everything... and it's far more likely to be ~name~ than me. It's so... thrilling...)

{Cupil}[Chirp, chirp!]{!reset} Oh, no thank you, Cupil... I'd rather you didn't transform into that just now, I'd be a little embarrassed for them to see that... particular capability. Though actually, thinking about that might be helping a little, so thank you...
You know, if you took off something better than that, ~name~, it could really help me...
Oh, I was hoping she was just going to leave that on for the rest of the game, like I did with my earrings...
